column3: Jiosh alithag at ab muh kots t ab t-wehhejed no pi t-hekaj si pihk e elith . Ith o hekaj tasho mo haschu d pihk elithadag . Kutt wo si pihk t-elithath ha hekaj g t-wepnag am hugkam matt chum hems wo t-muhkith am ha wehhejed .

D am him k am i e ai matt ba'ich tash wo mua g kahwal mad k wo wuhshath g t-shohshon ha-tho'ibiathag . Kuki s-mahch g Jesus mat am wa e ai matki ia wo thagito ihtha jewed k wo hih am e-ohg wui . D eda si pihk e elith wehs e-thoakagkaj ab ha wui hegam mat ab i s-wohoch .

Sh g Jiosh s-ha keh'ith ch hab kaij matsh pi wo ha hiwigi mas am wo i wahp amai mash hebai am chum ap'echuthch ha wehhejed k ho'ip wehs koi hegam ge'eged mash pi ab hu wohog elith . Kush heg hekaj am oiopo tohono jewed ch ed gi'ikko wehst-mahm ( 40 ) a'ahith ab .
Ab g wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh ch pi wo sha'i e hiwigi mams gd hu uhpam wo shul heg eda pi ap'ekam mam wa ab tatchua mam eda pi mahch g Jiosh .
Wehs hemajkam o d pi ap chu'ijkam am Jiosh nena ed . Kut g Jiosh wehs ha wepo wo s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab wui wo i e nohnogi .

K am hema neok ab ha shahgith hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hab kaij , “ T wo si s-namkigk g ha'ichu hugi . Mt chum hems wo ha namkith g e-nahtoi am chikpank hemako tashkaj mamt wo ha nolawt g al hemako s-wehch pilkani o g waik s-wehch si-wahyo . Mt wabshaba pi wo shohbi g manjeki ch nawait . ”
Ab g wo i e sho'igchuth wui g Jiosh . T heg ab wo si em-ha'ichuch .

Am at i ap'ech g tash mat wehs wo ha lothai g hemajkam k heki hu am hema si i kei mat hab wo juh g lothaita . Tsh ith ia mahsi t-shahgith k ia oimmelhim ch e muhkith . Tsh g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig t amjed mat wo wohokamch mo d si Kehshaj . ” Neh , bash kaij g Paul .
k am hahawa ge ho'i gihkot k ab wahki mo'oj ab k ab wahki g kownal kahba

Ha'i at heki hu hab masma hab e juh k am i oi g Jiawul . Ith o hekaj ba'ich i a-ap'e mat g wechij u'uwi ep wo kuhkunt k wo mahmadt k wo s-ap thagio'i g e-kihthag . T heg hekaj g t-obga pi wo e nako mas wo pi ap has t-ahgath .
Ab g wo s-wohochuth mach d hemako g ni-ohg wehm heg wabsh hekaj mani am em-ahgith , o amtp pi wo e nako hab masma k wo s-wohoch mach d hemako heg hekaj s-hasig ha'ichu mani hab junihim .

Pi o an hu o'ohanas g ha-chechgig heg eda o'ohana mo an o'ohanas g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig . Kumt hekaj am ha shul heg eda kahchki mo meihim . Ith at hab wo masmak mo g gokkokam muhkig . T g Jiosh am wo hugio g muhkig k am ep wo hugio amai mo am ha'ichug g ko'i .

Tsh wabshaba g Jiosh alithag wabsh hemho hab juh k pi mu'ikko e muhkith am t-wehhejed . Neh , k hab masma tasho mat s-ap nahto g e-chikpan mat gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig . Kush hemu hahawa e aihim mat g jewed wo huhug .
Kush an oiopo tohono jewed ch ed gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahith ab . Sh g Jiosh am s-hemajim ha nakogahim
Pegih , ni-wepnag , am amt wo a'ai e nenida k wehs e wehm hab wo juh g chemait hugi .

Tki gam hahawa ep wantsh k kuhpi'o g chuhthpokam cheposig hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch . Tki am sha'i si u'ugij g jewed . Kutki g tash ge chuku hab masma mo g s-kowk s-chuk ikus . Kutki g mashath wehsko ge wegih hab masma mo g eh'ed .

Jiosh atsh wa ab uhpam i ha chegitoich g ha-ko'ithag ha'i u'uwi mo ab s-wohochuth . Ha'i atsh wa wabsh s-ap e taht k e ko'ij pi thagitoimk g e-wohochuthadag no pi s-mahch mat g Jiosh ba'ich i s-kehg thoakag ab wo ha mah .

Kush wabshaba g Paul hab kaij ab ha wui g chich-lilihi , “ Pi att hab wo t-juh . Hemho wa at ab wo i hihi hegam s-has haha'ichu k ia wo i t-wuwhas am ha tahgio g hemajkam nat pi t-gewitta am ha tahgio wa chum pi mahchch mas haschu d t-chu'ichig . K heg pi d chum t-wuikam nach pi u'ukch g t-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am hemajkam . ”
Bo chu'ig g chehanigaj : Pi g wo ha ehsith g ha-wehm kihkam . Pi g wo ha mua'i . Pi g ha'ichu wo ha ehsithath . Pi g wo pihk e elithath g s-kaisthagkaj .
K eda hemu tasho mo d si hekia s-ap'ekam g Jiosh alithag . Kutt ahchim wo si t-nuhkuthath matt d wo s-ap'ekamk nach pi s-mahch mat ep wo jiwia . Kutt wo neith k wo wepo masmak .
S-mahch ach mo s-ap'e g Jiosh chehanig .
Si g wo s-hehgig ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ mani hab masma chum hekith hab chech'e .
Neh , nt ab si sikol i kekiwua mant wo nei mas hedai ab ni-wui neok k haha wabsh nei mo g wewa'ak ohla lalampa an thadha chuhchakud t an .
Hegam mo hab e a'aga mo d em-wanimedtham ch eda pi ab hu ni-wohochuth o d s-chu e'eskam ch d ha mu'akam . K wabshaba g ni-wohochuththam pi ab hu ha kaiham .
Ahpim pion , ab g wabsh wo i e thagitokchith e-a'amo ha wui ch ab wo has ha elithath , chum as ha'ijj wo s-ta kek'eithamak .

Mtsh am hahawa ha'i i ha wahpki g o'othham matsh am ha'ichu wo ha iattogi ab amjed . Sh hab kaij ihtham , “ Ihtha o'othham o chum hekith has ahg g hekia s-ap'ekam ge'e cheopi ch hegai mo ab t-chehani g Jiosh Mosesbad o'ohana ed .

Jiosh at wehs ith hab juh . Heki ach hu wa d obgaj . T wabshaba g Christ am gawul t-juh mach d hahawa naipijjuj g Jiosh k ab t-chehani matt am wo i ahgahi g ha'ichu ahgaj mat ha'ijj hab wa'ap ab wo i nawojt g Jiosh .
Am g wo i ha chegito g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam . Hegam ash wa s-e tahtk ch nakog g e-sho'igthag . Kumt am ha oithk hab wo chum masmak
Kut hedai ab wo i gei ni-wui k wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap e-namkithadag .
“ Ab ach si ho'ige'ith ch si hehgchulith g Jiosh no pi wehs edgith g amichuthadag ch gewkthag chum hekith . Amen . ”

S-ap amt ulinim d wo u'uwik ch wabshaba heg pi ab hu wo hiwgath mams ab wo si has masma e ap'ech . Pi at wo em-ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio mamt has masma wo ap'ech g e-mo'o o an hab wo juh g si s-namkig a'anilo ch sisishpakud ch eniga .

Pegih , pt pi has wo e elithath am wehhejed neokch g t-kownalig Jesus ch hab wa masma pi has wo e elithath ab ni-amjed mani wehhejed d lihso . Ab o t-mahkch g Jiosh g gewkthag matt am wehhejed wo t-sho'igch . Kupt wo si nako g e-sho'igthag am ahgachugch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj .
Ab ant si i ni-thagito m-wui mat ihtham wo s-mahchk g wohokam ch hekaj ab hab wa'ap wo i e thagito m-wui .
Neh , mt ab wo i nehnen k ab wo i gewkai hegai mam haschu wabsh kia edgith mat koi wo s-ap muh . Pi o hohho'ith g Jiosh hegai mam haschu am hab junihim .
Tki amjed g waikkokam anghil am epai iawua hegai mo wasibch an a'akimel ch ed ch shohshonkam shuhthagi ch ed . Kutki e eh'edch g shuhthagi .
Sho'o wa'i si s-hemajima a t-wui . Kuch si s-hehgig ch ab nenida mat ab wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed k ab wo si t-ha'ichuch .

Abrahambad ash ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch ab s-wohog el . Jiosh ash hab ahg matsh am hu hebai wo mah g mehk jewed . Kutsh ab wui wo hih . Tsh g Abrahambad woho thagito g e-kihthag k gm hu hih wa chum pi mahchch mas hebai wo hih .

Pi g wo nawkkath namt pi heg hekaj wo padch g e-thoakag mamt pi wo e tho'ibia . Am g wehs wo i e thagitokchith Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui . T heg an wo em-u'ukchith ch ab wo em-mahkchith g si ge'e s-ap tahhathkam .
Mu'ijj at am ha oithch hab wo junihith g s-bihtagi ha'ichu hab ha-juni . T heg hekaj mu'i hemajkam wo pad has ahgath g Jesus himthag .
K g Jiosh hab wa'ap ab em-mahkch g ap'ethag ahpim mamt hab wa'ap ab i s-wohochuth k ab wui i e thagito . K hab wa'ap an em-u'ukch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag .

P am wa s-mahch matt haschu am ha o'ohani hegam gawul mahs hemajkam mat ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Bo chu'ig g t-o'ohana mat hegam pi wo ko'ath g eh'ed ch hegai mo pi gm hu e iawua g eh'ed e mum'ajch kch hegai mo ab e to'ith hegai mo haschu hab chum e elith mo d jiosh . Kut wo si e nuhkuth hab masma mat hegai wa'i si e-hohnig o g si e-kun wehm wo kihk . ”

Sh hab kaij g Peter ab wui , “ Shahchu apt ahgk hiwigi g Jiawul mat am pad ha'ichu hab juh m-ihbthag ed . Pt heg hekaj iattogi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mapt heg wepogi mo ith d wehs g ha'ichu m-eniga namkig .
Pi att hab haha wo masmak mo g a'al machs in has a'ai gawul wo junihith g t-wohochuthadag . T hab pi wo e nako hegam mo am nahnko masma e nakog mat wo t-iattogi .

Mt wo chum s-mahchk mat g pi ap hemajkam pi am hu wo i wahp Jiosh kownaltalig ed . Pi g am wo e iattogith mams am hu wo i wahp mamtp ha wehm wo wo'iwupath mo hedai pi d em-wehm kihkam o hedai d em-wehm chechoj o g em-wehm u'uwi o amtp wo jioshgat k ab wo ihmath mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-nahtoi

Ha'i at ha'asa ha wehm e nam g e-wehm wohochuththam . Kumt wabshaba ahpim pi hab wo chum e juh k ab wo si a'ai i e gewkemhunath . E o aihim mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus . Kutt hekaj wahm ba'ich ab wo i t-gewkemhunath .

Mt gm hu hab wo i juh g pi kehg e-tatchui ch pi kehg e-chegitoi k pi wo wehmaj wo'iwua matp hedai pi d em-wehm kihkam k pi wo pihk e elithath mamt ge'e ha'ichu wo bei . Hegai mat wo s-behim mo haschu pi ab hu d wuikamaj o heg jioshchuth .

Kutt wabshaba ahchim s-ap wo t-nahtokchith hab masma mo g shonthal . T-wohochuthadag ch pihk t-elithadag o d wainomi lihwa t-wehhejed . Kuch ab wui t-gewpkathch mat g t-tho'ibiathag s-ap wo e nahto . K ith hab sha masma mo g wainomi wonami t-wehhejed .

Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat an wo t-u'ukchith ch ab wo t-mahkchith g gewkthag ch pihk elithadag ch thotholimadag ahchim mach d hemajkamgaj . Kutt heg hekaj pi ha'ichu wo sha'i ehbithath .
Hegai mat pi am hu oithk hab wo e junihith g Jiosh chehanig o pi mahch g Jiosh , chum as hems hab wo chum chei mo s-mahch .
Nt heg hekaj ab wo si i em-gewkemhu mamt wo i hemakoj g e-chegitoithag k ab ba'ich wo i e tatchuath ch ba'ich wo i s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui . Nt heg amjed wo si s-ap ni-taht .
Kumd am hahawa chum bei . T wabshaba pi koi e ai g tashgaj . D pi e nako ihtham .
Ab g i ha chehani mat am hab wo i junihi g s-kehg chikpan ha wehhejed hegam mo tatchua g i wehmta k pi wo chu tha'ath ch wo ha'ichu ha ho'ithath g sho'igkam . Ith o d woho s-kaisthag .
D hab kaij ab wui , “ Pi att woho ia wo u'apa ahpi m-wui hegai matt pi koi wo s-mai mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam . ”

Matp hedai ab wo si has elithath hema tash ch hab e wua mat heg eda ab wo si i ihm g Jiosh . Tp hedai wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath ch ab wo si has i elithath g Jiosh nat pi ab wo si i ho'ige'el heg hekaj ha'ichu hugi . Kutp hedai pi wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath ch hab wa'ap wo si has elithath g Jiosh nat pi ab wo chum ho'ige'el g Jiosh heg hekaj mo haschu i ko'a k ab wo si has i el .
Mt wo si s-hehgigk heg hekaj mo haschu g Jiosh ab em-wuichuth . Am g wabsh wo i s-thotholimak e-kudutadag ed ch chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath .
Neh , bo kaij ch am hahawa cheha g shonthal ha-ge'ejig mat am wabsh wo i u'ukchith g Paul ch wabshaba hi wo wa hiwgithath matp hems am wo neithath g naipijjuj ch am wo ha'ichukaj i wehmtath .
ch s-ap hab wo ha elithath g hemajkam . Chum as pi ap hab wo e junihith , tt hab wo ha elithath matp hems wo wa a'ap'et ch hekaj wabsh s-ap wo nakogath matp has wo e juh .
Bo chu'ig an Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed mash hema hab kaij : Am ant neo nani pi ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga .

Ab ach si em-tahni mamt wo ha ahgithath hegam mo s-papadma mat wo chikpanath . Ab g wo i ha gewkemhunath hegam mo pi wihnam gegok am e-wohochuthadag ed . I g wo ha wehmtath hegam mo pi ha gewpthag ch ab wehsijj wo si ha bahbgi .

Tki amjed g hetaspokam anghil am iawua hegai mo wasibch an thahm g s-ta Ehbithamakam kownal thaikud . Kutki g s-chuhugam an gei wehsko s-ta Ehbithamakam kownalitalig ed . Kuki g hemajkam si e kihk'ishch pi nakogch g s-ko'ok
Ith o d hahawa t-himthag . T g Jiosh ab wo s-em-ho'ige'ithath ch ab wo em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam ahpim mamt am oithk hab wo e junihith hab masma mo wehs hab ha wua g e-hemajkamga .
Kumtsh heki hu mashcha ab amjed g Jesus . Kush si s-hohho'ith ch am ahgahim ch si s-ap ha mashcham ch eda heg wa'i s-mahch John pahl wakona .

Pegih , woho o wa mach ap'ethag matt wabsh chum haschu wo ko'ath . K wabshaba ab t-ab matt ab wo si ha'ichuch g Jiosh wabsh chum haschu k ed , chum hems heg hekaj mach haschu i ko'ath ch haschu i ih'e .

Pi o hab chum mahs mams wabsh chum hasko amjed wo i e gahgithahi mam haschu i pi amichuth . Jiosh alithag at ab em-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Kut heg chum hekith am wo em-wehmajk ch wehs wo em-mashchamath g wohokam . Kumt ab wo kaihamath g mashchamaj ch ab wo s-wohog elithath g Jiosh alithag
Pegih , am ach t-chehgithch g ha'ichu hab t-junikaj mach haschu ab i s-wohochuth . K hegam mat pi am hu hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh .
Neh , bat che'iok am ha hekaj bei g pahn k ab si ihm g Jiosh wehs ha wehhejed k am hahawa i hahain k huh .

Tt hi wabsh wo ha ahgi mat has wo e junihith . T hab ab ha wui wo si s-ap e tahtkkath hegam t-wehm o'othham mo am ha wehm kihthag . Tt wabsh wo ha cheha mat wo si e nuhkuth g hejel e-wehm kihkam wehhejed ch pi ab hu wo ihm hab masma mo d Jiosh hegai mo pi d Jiosh ha'ichu ko'athch mo ab e to'ith ha wui k pi wo ko'ath g eh'ed ch hegai mo pi gm hu e iawua g eh'ed e mum'ajch .

K hab kaij g Paul , “ Jiosh at hemho ab wo wa uhpam i nodagi ihtha am m-wui ahpi map s-chu iattomk . Ab ap thak ch ni-lothait g t-chehanigkaj ch eda ep melchkwuhim g t-chehanig map ab ha chehani mat ab wo ni-shonihi . ”
Pi o ab hu hahawa t-abchuth g Jiosh g ha'ichu t-chu'ichig ahchim mach ab si hiwig g Jesus Christ .
Pi at hab ahgk ab i t-gawulkai g Jiosh mas wo t-namkith heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig k wabshaba hab ahgk mat g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wo t-tho'ibia .

Kutki am wo him k am ep wo ha iattogi g hemajkam an wehsko jewed thahm . Ihtham hemajkam at ha'i hab wo e a'agath Gog O'othham ch ha'i hab wo e a'agath Magog O'othham . Kut g Jiawul am wo i ha hemapai mat hab wo juh g cheggiadag . Kutki hab sha masma wo mu'ijk mo g o'od an shuhthagi bahsho
Ha'ijj am hab chu'igkahim . T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag gm hu hab i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig k am i em-ap'ech g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehhejed .

Kuni heg hekaj hab mu'i ni-sho'igchuth ch pi sha'i has ni-elith ith amjed nani pi s-mahch hegai mani ab s-wohochuth . T heg wo e nako mat s-ap wo ni-nuhkuthath mant wehs am hab wo juh mat haschu wehhejed ab i ni-gawulkai k ab wo ai mat ep wo jiwia .

Kumt chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab wo tahnith g Jiosh g i wehmtadag . Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i t-wehmaj t-ho'ige'ithahuna ed . Kumt wo s-nenenashank ch wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ha wehhejed g Jiosh hemajkamga .

T-wepnag mam am kih Thessalonica t am : Am ant ha'ichu wo i em-o'ohani ahni Paul . K ia ni-wehmaj g Silas ch Timothy k ch am i ni-wehmaj . Tham woho hemajkamgaj g t-ohg Jiosh ab i e thagitok t-kownalig Jesus Christ wui . Ab o wa si s-em-ho'ige'ith g t-ohg Jiosh g t-kownalig Jesus Christ wehm ch ab wo wa ba'ich i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam .
E o aihim mat ep wo jiwia . Kumt heg hekaj wabsh wo i s-hehemajimak ab wehs ha wui g hemajkam .
Kuch hekith am hab i wua ihtha chemait hugi ch am tasho wohokamchuth mat t-wehhejed muh ch ab aihim mat ep wo jiwia .
s-wohochuthch mat g Jiosh wo em-thoaj . Kut woho hab wo e juh . Mamtp g pi ap e-chu'ichigkaj kok'o , t g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g em-chu'ichig .

Chum ani hekith ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh mani hekith i ni-ho'ige'ithahun m-wehhejed . Jiosh ash wa am ha tashogith g t-shohshon matt has masma wo himath g t-thoakag ch ab wo si has elithath . Kuni hab masma hab ni-wua ch hab pi sha'i ni-kudut .

ch ab si hihnk thohtha'ag ch hohothai wui hab kaijch , “ Ab g wo i shulig t-thahm mat pi wo t-neithath g Jiosh . Oi g wo t-e'esto ab amjed hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch mat pi wo s-ko'okam t-namkith .

“ Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i maskogith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am em-wui ahpim mam ab si ni-hiwig ch am kihthag ha e'eda hegam wewa'ak kihhim . Kumt wehsijj ab wo kaihamath . “ Ab ant wo ha mah hegam mat wo gewito g pi ap'ekam hegai pi ta behima ha'ichu hugi mo hab e a'aga ‘ manna . ’ Ab ant ep wo i ha mahkhi ihtham g s-toa Hothai . T hegam ha ab an wo o'ohanask g wechij chehgig . T hegam wo wa'i hehe'ejel s-mahchk g chehgig mat hedai i bei . ”
Hegam mo em-iattogith ab amjed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o wabsh s-u'imkch g em-lialiga . K wabshaba am e nahtokch g Jiosh mat wo ha lothait k im hu hab wo i ha juh .
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed : Gawul mahs hemajkam o s-ko'okam has ahg g Jiosh ha hekaj g Tutuligo .

Hegam mo ha iattogith o ab wui gegok g wohokam hab masma mo wa Jannesbad ch Jambresbad ab wui gegok g Mosesbad . Ho o wabsh pi ap ha'ichu chegito ch d ep hegam mat pi e nako am Jesus wohochuthadag ed .
Ha'ichu ani shohbith ch ha gewittan hegam mani ab si ha tatchua mat hekaj gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi .
Am at i t-ap'ech g Jiosh e tahgio ahchim matt ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ . Kuch heg hekaj ab wui si s-ap t-tahtk .
Si g s-e nen'oith map has e junihim ch haschu ha mashcham k hekaj pi wabsh wo heki wua g e-thoakag . T hegam mat ab wo m-kaiha hab wa'ap pi wo heki wua g e-thothakag .

Kunt wa mu'ikko am ap'ech mamt wo ha sho'igch an i a'ai ha-chechopi ed k am chum ha chehani mat hab wo chei mo pi ap'e hegai Jesus . Kunid wa sha'i si s-ha keh'ith ch am i ni-nako mant am i wah gawul jewed kihhim ch ed mant wo ha sho'igch amai .
M o tasho g wabsh o'othham tatchui . Hegam mo hab wua g hejel e-tatchui atp hems wo'iwup hema i wehm mo pi d ha-wehm kihkam o hab wua g nahnko mahs s-uam ha'ichu .
Kuch heg hekaj pi d si ha'ichu ahchim mach am eshath ch wapga am ahgch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Jiosh o d si ha'ichu no pi heg am i wuhshath g t-esha mam ab s-wohochuth ahpim mam kah g ha'ichu ahgaj .
Kum wehs ab i neith g ho'ige'ithadgaj ch ep nenida mat ep wo jiwia .
Kuni kah mo ab hema neok thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaithag mo g ge'e shuhthagi s-kaitham med ch hab kaithag mo g tataniki an thoahim . Hegai mani kah o hab kaithag mo mu'i a'alpa am e gew .
Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig wehs hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus . Ith o wehsijj wohokamchuth g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam . ”
Heg att wo cheh mach haschu i gahg . Am g hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch wo e gahgithath g Jiosh ap'echutha . T g Jiosh am wo i em-wahpki e-kihthag ed mamt chum hekith an wo wehmajk .

Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahpim wewa'ak thakam Jesus Christ ihmtham am Asia chekshani ch ed . Ab at wo wa ba'ich i s-em-ho'ige'ithath ch ab ba'ich wo i em-mahkath g i wehmtadag ch s-ap tahhathkam g t-ohg Jiosh ch Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch Jesus Christ . T-ohg Jiosh o chum hekith an ha'ichug . K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wehmaj ch wewa'ak masma e chehgithch am t-wehhejed . K g Jesus Christ si s-ap am i t-tashogith g wohokam ch d hegai mat si wehpeg ab uhpam s-ap i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed k am hahawa ha thahm g wehs kokownal ith thahm jewed . Ab o si t-tatchua ch heg hekaj e muhkith t-wehhejed k t-tho'ibia ab pi ap t-chu'ichig amjed

Sh hab hahawa ep kaij g Paul , “ M o wa woho mash heg am ha ahgith mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi ch wabshaba am ep ha ahgith mat ab wo i s-wohoch hegai mat am epai wo i e maskogi . K heg d Jesus . ”
Wehs ihtha o am t-tashogith mo g Jiosh e nahtokch mat wo ha tho'ibia g s-ap'ekam o'othham ab amjed g ha-kudutadag k s-ko'okam ab wo ha namkith g pi ap'ekam mat wo e ai g ge'e lothaita tash .
K wabshaba am e gewpkathch heg wui jewed mo ba'ich i s-ap'e , pej hegai thahm kahchim kihthag . Jiosh o s-hohho'ith mo hab a'aga mo d ha-Jioshga nat pi am heki hu nahto g kihhim ha wehhejed .
Pi g am hab masma hekaj g hoho'oki a'agitha mas d Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Pi at hab wo em-juh mamt wo s-a'ap'ek am Jiosh nena ed . Am apt wo si e mashchamath mapt am hab wo junihith s-ap'ekam himthag .
ch am wehskojed wo i e hemapath k an wo e keshwua ha wehgaj hegam mo d Jiosh hemajkamga ch am kih Jerusalem ch ed . T oi wa g mehi ab wo i hud thahm kahchim t amjed k wo ha hugio .
Kumtsh wa woho ha pahl wapko am chehchegch g Jesus Christ . Sh ihtham ab hahawa si ahgith g Peter mat am wo sha'i ha wehm thakahim he'ekia i tash .
Bo e elith mo d ha wanimedtham ch ab ha mahkch g tonlig hegam mo pi edgith g Jiosh chehanig .
Heki o hu hab kaij g Jiosh matsh ab wo t-mah ihtha wechij thoakag matsh pi hekith wo huhug .

Kuch wabshaba ahchim mach u'ukch g amichuthadag ab Jiosh t amjed d hekia s-ap'ekam ch s-thotholima ch ab ha o'othhamchuth g hemajkam ch s-ha ho'ige'ith ch ha wehm s-hemajim neneok ch pi ha iattogith .
Jiosh o si pihk e elith ab e-alithag wui ch wehs ha'ichu ab mah .

K wabshaba am hemajkam t-wehhejed shahag wepo mo si chewaj g tash mat g Jiosh am hab wo juh hegai mash hab s-t-junithamk . K eda g Jiosh si s-ha bahbgi g hemajkam ch ab chum ha nenida no pi pi hab chum sha'i elith mas hedai wo huhug am pi ap'ekam ch e d pi gm hu s-ohhothk g pi ap e-chegitoi .
Mamt hu'i pi wo ha wehm kihkamk hab masma mani ahni . K wabshaba g Jiosh pi wehs hab masma em-ap'echuthch ch ha'i em-ap'echuthch mamt wo e hohont .

Pegih , mt am wo e nakogath mamt ab wo si pikh e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo i ha wehmtath heg hekaj mo haschu ab t-makiog g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag matt hab wo junihith . T ith d wo si i ha-wehmtadagk matt am wo ha ahgithath mo haschu g Jiosh am i t-tashogith .
Jiosh atsh am wa i tonlith g s-chuhugam gd hu'i si wehpeg . K heg ha wepo mat am epai i tonlith g t-thoakag nat pi t-mahtchul g Christ . K heg am t-chehgithch g Jiosh .
Tsh am hema jiwia g Tuhligo Ephesus kihhim t am k hab chehgig Apollos ch ab d mahsikam Alexandria kihhim t ab ch si s-e mahch ab s-neokimakam t ab ch ash si ge'e s-mahch g Jiosh o'ohana .
Pegih , t g Jesus heg hekaj gm hu jeg ed e muhkith k g e-eh'ed iawua mat im hu hab wo i juh g hemajkam pi ap ha-chu'ichig .

Pegih , am g si ha ahgith wehs ihtha k i ha gewkemhun mat hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam k ep i ha shohbith mat hedai hab wo i wuath g pi ap'ekam . Pi at hedai wo chum pi m-ha'ichuchuthath nap pi gewkthag mapt ith am hab wo junihith .

Jiosh at ab i wuhshath g si hemako e alithag ith thahm jewed . T heg ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mach heg ab beihog . Kut hab masma ab t-mah g wechij thoakag . Bat wa masma am t-tashogi g Jiosh mo si pihk e elith ab t-wui . Kutt heg amjed i s-mai g pihk elithadag k hahawa si pihk t-elith ab Jiosh wui .

“ Ni-ohg , ab apt i ni-mah ihtham mo ab si ni-tatchua . Kuni si tatchua mat am wo ni-wehmajk anai mant anai wok . An apt ni-mah g si s-kehg ap'ethag nap pi si ni-tatchua mat eda koi e nahto g jewed . Kuni ab m-tahni mat ihtham am wo ni-wehmajk ch heg wo neithath map haschu ab ni-mahkch .
Chum o hebai gantan g sho'igthag ch padchuth g s-ha-hehgig .
Tho si uhgchu t-pahlig ch d Jiosh alithag g Jesus ch an i wah Jiosh kihthag ed am t-wehhejed . Kutt heg hekaj ab wo s-wohochuthath chum hekith .
An achd wehmaj g Jesus . Kud g ohgaj Jiosh ab mah g si has elithadag k ab neok ch hab kaij , “ Ith o d si ni-tatchuithch ni-alithag . ”
Neh , wehs ihtha o ab d amjedkamaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . K heg ab hehe'ejel t-mahkch mo has i mahs chikpan am hab s-junimk ab gai t-wuhshanim .

Tki g gi'ikkokam anghil am hahawa epai kuhu g e-kuikudkaj . Kutki g hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g tash ch mashath ch huhu'u ge chuku . Kutki heg hekaj ha'as huhug g ha-tonlig ch ha'as tash pi tonod tash oitham ch chuhug oitham .
Kutsh ihtham an wabsh si bei hegai mash d ha wanimedtham am cheopi ch ed ch hab chehgig Sosthenes k am si gewitta ge'e kih bahsho . Tsh pi ab hu has sha'i e taht g Gallio .
D g haha'ichu am hahawa ep chum cheha g cheopi nuhkuththam mat am wo hihim k wo bei . D wabshaba ep e tho'ibia ab ha amjed .

Heg att hekaj pi hekith ha'ichukaj an hu wo t-shohbi matt am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan . Ab o hi wa chum aihim g muhkig g t-chuhkug nach pi hekitahim . K wabshaba g t-thoakag wehs tashkaj ab i e wechijith .

D g Mary gd hu jiwia Jesus wui k g si s-namkig uhw shuhthagi u'a ch an iawua Jesus tahtad an . K eda d hemako s-wehch . D an i thagio wabsh g e-che'echew mo'okaj . D wehsko uhwa ihtha uhw shuhthagi am kih ch ed .

Jiosh atsh pi oi ha mah hegai jewed . Kush am wabsh i e chiwiapadath ch am kihkahim ikus kih ch ed am ha wehm g e-amjedkam . Kush g Jiosh am hab wa'ap ha ahgith ihtham Abrahambad amjedkam matsh am hu hebai wo ha mah hegai jewed .
Am ani si s-gewkam oith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am em-chehgith mamt has wo masmak . Mt wo si ha nenashanath hegam mo am hab e wua mani has i masma em-chehgith ch am ha oithk hab wo e junihith .
Nam hig woho am oithch hab s-e junimk g chehanig ? Pegih , k ab t-chehani g Jiosh alithag matt am a'ai wo i t-wehmajk .

Neh sh g Jiosh am hahawa hab masma ihm mo d nawojij . Pegih , ith o am t-chehgithch mo pi d e tho'ibiakam hegam mat hab wabsh wo kaijjith mo d wohochuththam . Hemho wa att am hab wo junihith g t-wohochuthadag ch hab wa masma am wo t-chehgi mach d t-tho'ibiakam .
Pegih , na'ams ha'i hab elith mat pi ap chu'i g Jiosh . K wabshaba pi hab chu'ig
Ha'i atp hems am wabsh kia pi gewpkthag g em-wehm wohochuththam am e-wohochuthadag ed . Kumt wabsh wo ha tatchuath ch pi wo ne'owi heg amjed mo haschu al i s-mahch .

Tki an haha wabsh g cheggiadag hab e juh Jiosh kihthag ed . Hegai anghil mo hab chehgig Michael g e-anghiliga ha wehm oki cheggia g Nehbig Hujud . K wehs g jijawul am i wehmt g Nehbig Hujud . Tki wabshaba hegam Michael ha gehg . Kumtki hahawa pi ha hiwigi mas an ep wo ha'ichugk Jiosh kihthag ed .
Hemho wa amt wo babgat ab pi ap'ekam wui k wabshaba pi heg hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam . S-hohtam g wo thagito g e-bagatalig .
Pi g am wo e agwua g pi ap'ekamkaj k pi ab hu wo i nodagi g pi kehg ne'oki . Ab o t-ab matt ab wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el . T g Jiosh ab epai wo i s-t-ho'ige'el nat pi heg hekaj ab i t-wai .
Chum ani hekith ab s-wohog elith . K heg hekaj ni-wehmaj . ” Neh , bo kaij g Jesus .

Neh , mt wo si e nahtokchith wehhejed ihtha cheggiadag . An g wo u'ukchith g wohokam . T ith heg wo wa wepok mo g cheggiakud giwud . Am g hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam . T ith heg wo wa wepok mamt ab hab juh g wainomi lihwa .

Am ant wo m-ahgi g s-a'agi ha'ichu ab amjed ihtham wewa'ak huhu'u mani in u'ukch ch ihtham wewa'ak lalampa . Ihtham wewa'ak lalampa o d hegam ni-ihmtham mo am kihthag hegam ha eda wewa'ak kihhim . K ihtham wewa'ak huhu'u o d ha-wanimedtham . ”

Neh , bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana ch hab d ahga mat wehs g Jiosh nahtoi am wo ha wechokath g hemajkam . Pi o hab chu'ig ithani . Kuch wabshaba s-mahch matsh heki hu i shonwua ab Jesus amjed matsh hab wo e juh . Heg atsh wa i e jumalkath k t-wepo e juh k he'es i tash ha wecho g anghil ch chum hems e thagito muhkig wui am wehs t-wehhejed . Ith o d Jiosh hab elitha no pi si s-t-ho'ige'ith . T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab si ha'ichuchuth k an thai mat d wo t-kownaligk .
Chum o hekith em-makiog g Jiosh g tatchuithag ch gewkthag mamt am hab wo junihith g hab elithaj .
Ith ani em-ahgith mamt wo bei g s-hehgig am hab junihithch g ni-chehanig hab masma mani ahni s-hehgig am hab junihithch g ni-ohg chehanig .

Ni-wehnag Timothy : Ia ant ha'ichu wo i m-o'ohani ahni Paul mani d kehshaj g Jesus Christ . Jiosh at ni-cheha mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj Jesus Christ . T hab ab wo hiwgath g hemajkam mat heg am wo ha u'apa Jiosh kihthag wui .
Kunt hab ep wo chei mat g u'uwi wabsh s-ap ab wo e enigadathch ch ep s-ap hab wo juhkchith g e-mo'o mat pi heg hekaj wo chum si e hahaschuthath .

Kud si pi hohho'i g Jesus mo ith am hab e wua ge'e cheopi t am k hekaj hema gewikudt g wijinakaj k gm hu wehs si ha shahmuth g haiwani ch kahwal k am gai ha shul g ha-mimsa hegam mo g lial kammialt k gm hu si gantad g ha-lialiga
Ab at i t-mah g Jiosh ihtha wechij thoakag . Kuki hab d elithaj matt hekaj am hab wo junihith hegai s-ap chikpan mat heki hu am i ap'ech am t-wehhejed .
Ni-tatchuithch ni-wepnag , pi g am wo has elithath mam ab nakog g sho'igthag .

Ab att wo si i s-hehgigk ch wo s-ap t-tahtkkath ch ab wo si has i el g gewkthaj . E at ai mat ab wo i ha hemapai g e-hemajkamga hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch . T heg wo wa wepothagk mo g si ge'e hohnta . T g hemajkamgaj ab si e nahto wehhejed

Ab g wo s-wohochuth mat em-tho'ibia g Jiosh k pi hekith wo em-thagito . T ihtha em-tho'ibiathag hab wo wa masmak mo g wainomi wonami . An g wo u'ukchith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga hab sha masma mamtp hems g is-pahyo . Ith o ab em-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mamt hekaj wo gewito g Jiawul .
Kush hema g Egypt t am o'othham am hema sho'igchuth g Tuhligo . Tsh g Mosesbad am i wehmt g e-hajuni k mua ihtha Egypt t am o'othham mat wo agwua
Kumt ahpim mam wabsh s-ap am hab e junihim am hab wabsh wo i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo thagito
Am g wo s-e nen'oithath ch s-wihnam wo gegokkath am e-wohochuthadag ed ch s-ge'ehogam am wo chikpanath
Tho hejel ha-nahtoi jijosh mo ab ha ihm . Bo ha a'aga Molok ch Rephan ch hab ha elith mo an kih huhu'u t an . Nt heg hekaj gm hu mehk wo em-shul Babylon jewed t am .
Pegih , am ach wa em-mashcham ihtha wohokam ch am ep em-o'ohanith ab amjed . Kumt s-wihnam wo gegokkath ch an wo u'ukchith .
Jiosh at am i t-ap'ech ith wehhejed k ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat wo t-wehmajk ch am wo i wohokamch mo haschu ab t-makiog .
Ab o d ep ha-wuikam mat wabsh s-bahbagi ch s-thotholim ab wo kaiham k wo mahchith g Jiosh himthag .

K hab d ahga ihtha mamt hab wa'ap wo ha namkithath hegam mo hab junihim g chickpan , chum hems g Jiosh pionag . Pi g ab hu kaiham g ha'ichu abchutha ab hema i ha ab ihtham kekel , heg hi wa mat gohk o waik hab wo chei mo si s-ap s-mahch ha'ichu ab ha amjed , mt am haha wo i mamche .
Ab g wo e chehgith mam a'ai s-e ho'ige'elith . Wehsijj hegam mo an a'ai e nanmek ch ab ihm g Jesus Christ o ab s-em-ho'ige'ith .

T ihtham ab hahawa iawua g jewed e-mo'o ab k si s-kaitham hihnk ch si shoani ch hab kaij : “ Sho'ig , sho'ig , ihtha si ge'e kihhim . Ihtha kihhim o wud mat ia s-e kakaisch hegam mo e'edgith g wapalko . Sha'i si s-hohtam at wehs ha'ichu heb hu shul ihtha kihhim . ” Neh , bo kaij ihtham pi ap'ekam hemajkam .
Jiosh at hab t-juh mach d hahawa a'aligaj no pi si pihk e elith ab t-wui . Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh alithag o pi mahch mach ahchim hab wa'ap d Jiosh a'aliga .

Ab amt wo ha kaihamath g e-wanimedtham . Wehsijj amt wabsh wo i e sho'igchuthath . Neh , bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana : Jiosh at ab ha wui wo kekiwua hegam mo chum si e haschuth k wabshaba wo ha mah g ho'ige'ithalig hegam mat ab wo i e sho'igch .
Chum o hekith ahg g wohokam , chum as wehs hemajkam g iattogi hab wua . Neh , bo chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed : Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o d hekia wohokam , chum as ha'ijj hab kaij mo pi woho .
Kutsh heg hekaj ia jiwia mash u'ukch g ap'ethag ab ha amjed g u'ugchu papal mat wo uhpam i ha ui hegam mo ab m-ihm . ”

An atsh wa ha'i i wuwha mash wa e wepogith g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wabshaba wabsh ha iattogith g hemajkam . Kut hab wa'ap in wo i wuwha em-shahgith hegam mat wo chum em-mashcha g pi wohokam k wo padch g em-wohochuthadag . Jesus Christ o d t-tho'ibiakam . K wabshaba ihtham pi wohokamchuth . S-hohtam at im hu hab wo i ha juh g Jiosh mat hekith wo e ai g ha-tashga .
D am hahawa i si e gewpkai mat wo mua nad pi am i kah mo hab masma ihm g Jiosh ch heg hekaj e wepogith g Jiosh .
Ab ani si has em-elith mamsh chum hekith s-ni-chegito ch am oithch hab e junihim ihtha himthag mant am em-wui u'apa .
“ T an wa o'oha g t-kownaligbad David mat hab wo chei g Jiosh si Kehsha : Chum ap hekith ni-wehmaj , ni-Jioshga ! Ni heg hekaj pi sha'i ha'ichukaj ni-kudut
Pi at hekith wo huhug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Kutt ab i s-wohochuth k hekaj ab bei g wechij thoakag . T ith hab wa'ap pi hekith wo huhug , chum as g t-chuhkug wo huhug .

Kumt heg hekaj ab a'ai wo e ahgi g pi ap e-chu'ichig k wo e ho'ige'ithahu a'ai e wehhejed . T wo em-thoaj g Jiosh . Mu'i at ha'ichu hab wo ha juni g Jiosh hegam mat ab wo tahnith ch d wo s-ap'ekam o'othhamk .
“ Neh , hegam mat ab wo i s-ni-wohochuth k wo ni-bei at hekaj wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag .
“ Pi ant ia hu hejel wo em-thagito k wabshaba ia wo wa em-wehm ha'ichugk am i thahm mant im hu wo uhpam hih .
Nt wabshaba wo em-ahgi mo mu'i ha'ichu d t-ap'ethag . Hema o d ihtha mat g Jiosh ab t-hiwigi g ha'ichu e-ahga matt wo ha ahgi g nahnko mahs hemajkam .
Ahpim nenehol amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-a'amo ch ab wo si has ha elithath ch ab si e-tatchui amjed hab wo junihith g e-chikpan hab masma mamtp hems g Christ hab masma wo chikpanthath
Ithani o wabsh ab si s-t-bahbgi g Jiosh ch s-hemajim ab t-nenida no pi tatchua matt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap t-chegitoi .

Si ach s-mahch mat ab wo t-kaiha g Jiosh matt ab ha'ichu wo tai matp ith am tatchuij oithch d wo ha'ichuk . Kutt heg hekaj ab wo i t-gewkemhunath ch ab wo ha'ichu tahnith nat pi woho am hab wo t-junithahith .

Jiosh at hab em-juh mamt wabsh wo nenidath matp haschu am hab wo i em-juni . Kuni ab tahni mat ab wo i gewkai g em-wohochuthadag mamt hekaj wo si s-hehgigk ch wo si s-ap e tahtkk ab wui . Bamt masma ba'ich i s-ap wo nenidath g e-ap'ethag . T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab ba'ich wo i em-mah g wohochuthadag .

Kumt bei hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam ch heg ehp s-chu Iattomkam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam . Tho ihtha mo wa ha iattogith g s-hasig ha'ichukaj hegam mo ab hab juhkch g s-ta Ehbithamakam cheposig ch hegam mat ab i shul wui g wepogithaj . Kumt ha ui hegam gohk k wabsh thoakk am ha nehnich heg eda kahchki mo chum hekith meihim .
K hab ep chu'ig g o'ohanaj : Mt wo gegos chum hems g e-obga matp d wo bihugimkamk . Kutp d wo tonomkamk , mt wo wasibi g shuhthagi . T hab masma am hejel wo i e chegito g em-obga .

Mt am wo s-chegitok g Christ ha'ichu ahga . Jiosh o ab em-makiog g amichuthadag . Kumt ab a'ai wo i e mashchamath ch wo ahgath g Jiosh o'ohana ed nen'ei ch mihshmetha nen'ei ch wo ne'ichuthath g Jiosh ch ab wo i mahkchith g ge'e ho'ige'ithadag .
Kumt ahpim chechoj wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-wehm kihkam ch ab wabsh wo i s-ha bahbgi .
Am g ha ahgith g u'uwi mat wo i ha thagio'i g hehe'ejel wihpkam e-hajuni k pi ab hu hedai wo mohto'i . Hegam mo am hemiap e mihshmath at hegam wo wa'i ha thagio'i mo d si hehe'ejel wihpkam
Ab o i t-tashogith g Jiosh mo ab t-makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag .
Ahchim mach ab ihm g alithaj ach edgith hegai thoakag . K hegam mo pi ab hu ihm pi edgith .
Nt ahni woho wo i em-wul'o mamtp ab wo i e thagito ni-wui . Kumt hahawa pi d wo neneholk namt pi d wo a'aligajk g ni-ohg Jiosh .
Ab ani shoak em-wui mamt am wabsh wo si i e gewpkath k pi has wo e tahtkkath mani ni-sho'igchuth em-wehhejed . Wehs o d wabsh em-ap'ethag ihtha ni-sho'igthag .

Ihtham o wabsh hejel e wehhejed hab wua g pi ap e-tatchui ch pi ab hu chikpanith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ . Ho o iattogith hegam mo pi ap mahch g wohokam wabsh si s-kehg neneokch ch s-ap has ha ahg .

Ab at wabsh i si ha shuhth g nahnko mahs pi ap'ekam mo ha'i si pihk e elith g s-kaisthagkaj ch ha'i s-ta kek'eithama o s-chu hehgamk o s-ha mu'amk o s-chu cheggiamk o s-chu i'attomk o s-chu padhog eh'elithamk o s-chu ahgamk .
Am o t-eda g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag . Kutt hekaj am wo si s-ap nuhkuth g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh .

Mt wo s-ko'okam e namkith am i muhk mamtp hab wo sha juh g hejel e-tatchui k wabshaba chum hekith an wehmaj wo kihkath g Jiosh mamtp wo e thagito Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui k hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui .
Am hu hebai ehp , tsh ha'ijj bagach g Jiosh . Tsh heg hekaj am ap'ech matsh wo ha ki'ikka g kohk'oi k wo ha hugio .
ch pi am hu wo ha edawua ch pi wo chu tha'ath ch wo s-bamuistk . Pi att wo kuint mat hema pi ap has wo e juh
Kuki g ha-babsho ab ha'ichukaj mam'aishch mo hab sha mams mo g wainomi koktoni . K g ha-a'an hab sha kaithag mo g mu'i cheggiakud kakalit an wohpo mat wo ha cheggia .

Ia ant jiwia ha wui k am ha ahgi ab amjed g ni-ohg k am ha chehgi g s-hasig chikpan mat pi hedai hekith hab juh . K wabshaba s-ni-keh'ith . K heg hekaj tasho mo s-keh'ith g ni-ohg . Kut hab masma mahsko wua g pi ap e-chu'ichig .
Am g si s-e mamachim hab wo e junihith am ha-nena ed hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh . Ab o em-mahkch g Jiosh g ap'ethag mamt hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam . Am g s-ap wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag .
Am att i thagito g heki hu t-thoakag . Kut hab gm hu hab i e juh g pi ap t-tatchui . K pi an hu hahawa t-wulshch g pi ap'ekam .

K ith hekaj tasho mo hedai d a'aligaj g Jiosh ch hedai am oith g Jiawul . Pi o d sha'i a'aligaj g Jiosh hegam mat hedai pi hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch pi ab hu wo pihk e elithath ab ha wui hegam mo d chum ha-wepnag .
Tho obgaj g Jiosh hegai mo hedai g hejel e-tatchui hab junihim no pi pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch pi wo sha'i e nako mas am hab wo e juh .
ch wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch s-hehgigam ha'ichu ahg . Ab o e aihim mant wo muh . Nt wabshaba wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch wo m-nenida .
Ab o wabsh ha ihm g jijawul pi e mahchch mas has e wua . Kuni pi em-tatchuith mams wo ha wehm ab ha ihm g jijawul ko'athch hegai mo ab ha to'ith .

Sh am ha'i ep d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam Antiok t am . Hema ihtham ash hab chehgig Simon ch wabshaba hab e a'aga S-chukchu . Kush hema d Lucius ch ab Cyrene t amjed . Kush hema d Manaen ch am wehmaj ge'etha g kownal Herod . Ihtham ash am ha mashcham am ha wehm g Barnabas ch Saul .
Ha'i oki hab kaij mo am wa s-ap'e hegam mo hab masma hab e junihim . Kumt wabshaba pi ab hu wo kaiha g pehegi ha-ne'oki . Jiosh at hemho wa s-ko'okam wo ha namkith hegam mat pi ab hu wo s-wohog el .
D hab ep kaij g Jesus , “ No hig pi woho mat g s-chu ehskam wabsh s-a'agi haskojed ab wo i wah heg eda kolhai mam am ha nuhkuth g kahwal k wo s-ha ehsitham ?

Heki at hu i e mehkoth ab amjed g s-ap'ekam hab masma matsh wa hema hab e juh mash hab chehgig Balaam . Ihtha Balaambad ash d chum Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch wabshaba s-u'imk g lial am hab junihithch g pi ap'ekam .
Tsh wehsijj hegam mat ab ha wui gegokiwua g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa i e ap'ech g e-wanimedtham ha wehm mat wo ha sho'igchuth k wo ha ma'ichshul .

D ith d i waikko mad hab kaij g Jesus , “ Simon , nap ab si ni-tatchua ? ” D si pi ap e tahtk g Peter mat waikko ab wa'i kakke ch hab kaij , “ Ni-kownalig , wehs ap ha'ichu s-mahch ch s-mahch mani ab si m-tatchua . ” D hab kaij g Jesus , “ Am g i ha nuhkuth g ni-wohochuththam .

T wabshaba pi am hu wo hiwgithask g s-uam ha'ichu . T pi ab hu wo i wahp g s-chu i'attomkam ch hegam mo hab junihim g s-ta edam ha'ichu . Hegam at am wo wa'i wahpkath heg eda kihhim mo g ha-chechgig an o'ohadag heg eda mo g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig an o'ohadag . Ith o d o'ohanaj hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch .

Ihtha uwi o si s-ihbhaimagim ch s-wegima e enigadathch ch g ohlakaj ch s-kehg hohothaikaj e hehosithch . K an nowij ed hab chu'ig g ohla tahsa ch shuhthags g si s-uam ha'ichu . Ith o hab d ahga mo d wabsh tohnto ihtha kihhim .
Ab o t-ab matt a'ai t-hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath ch hab s-ap d wo hemakok .
D hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui , “ Ithani at e ai g ni-tashga mat g ni-ohg wo ni-maskogi mani d si Kehshaj .
ch pi wo ha wehm wo'iwua hegai mo pi d ha-wehm kihhim ch eda hejel hab masma hab e wua . Si o pi hohho'ith mat ab wo ihmath g hemajkam nahtoi k ch eda wo ha ehs mo haschu an hab chu'ig ha-cheopi ed .
Kuch wa am hahawa ba'ich i s-gewkam si pihk t-elith g ha'ichu t-enigakaj . Matp pi an hu wo ha'ichugk g chehanig , t d wabsh wo pi ha'ichuk g pi ap'ekam .
Nt wo m-tho'ibia ab ha amjed g m-wehm o'othham . Kupt am wo ahgahith g ha'ichu ni-ahga am ha wui g gawul mahs hemajkam . Nt am ep wo m-nuhkuth k wo m-tho'ibia ab ha amjed .

Neh , heki ach hu wa hab masmakahim mo hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh . Pi ach wa ab hu kaiham g Jiosh ch pi ha'ichu amichuth ch hab s-junimk g pi ap'ekam ch pi a'amdag ch s-chu hehgamk . Ha'i o s-t-keh'ith . Kuch ab epai s-ha keh'ith .

Am g wehs wepo masma hab ha juhni ihtham mani m-shelinith k pi hedai sha'i gm hu wo i gawulkai . Ith ani si s-bahbagi ab m-chehani am ha tahgio g Jiosh ch Jesus ch am ha tahgio g hekia s-ap'ekam anghil .
Pi g am wo heb hu wua g e-wohochuthadag . Ith at wo em-u'apajel g ge'e em-mahkigdag .
Ha-pionag at heg am hab wo wa'i junihith mo haschu g ahmoj chehani ch s-ap wo nuhkuth g e-nuhkutha .
Sh mu'i tashkaj am thakahim g Peter Joppa t am heg wehm mash hab chehgig Simon ch ash g hogi chikpan hab wua .
Heg o wa wepo mach d Jiosh cheopiga no pi am t-eda kih g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Ith amt wo chum s-mahchk .
Ab ach hahawa si ap'ethag matt ab wo i miabi g Jiosh nat pi muh g Jesus am t-wehhejed . Ith o heg wa wepo mach ap'ethag matt am wo i wahp heg eda Si Hekia S-ap'ekam Kih .
D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui , “ Am ant hu wo hih . Kumt an haha wo i chum ni-gahghim k wabshaba wo koi pi e tho'ibiak . Pi amt wo e nako mamt am wo hihi mant hebai wo i hih . ”

Jiosh o si pihk e elith t-hekaj ch ab i t-gawulkai . Kutt heg hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath ha hekaj g hemajkam ch wo s-hemajimak ch s-t-tahtk ch wo nakogath ha'ichu ch pi hab wo chum t-wuath machs d s-has haha'ichu am ha-nena ed .

Bat wo junihith g ni-tatchui hegai matp hedai hab e elith mat d wo ni-pionagk . Kunt hab wo juh mat an wo ni-wehmajk mant hebai wo i ha'ichugk . Ni-ohg at ab wo si has i ha el hegam mo hab junihim g ni-tatchui . ”
S-hemajim at am wo ha thahmk g e-wehm kihkam . T g a'aligaj ab wo wechok ch ab wo si has elithath .
Mt heg hekaj ab wabsh wo si a'ai e gewkemhunath ch ab a'ai ha'ichukaj wo i e wehmajk mam am hab wa e junihim .
Ihtha mani em-ahgith o d hegai mam kaichug gd hu i amjed mamt wehpeg kah . Ab g wo si pihk e elithath a'ai e wui .
Sho'o wa'i si ge'ej g t-kudutalig hemu . Kuni heg hekaj hab elith mo ba'ich i s-ap'e mamt am hab wabsh wo i chu'igk mam has i masma .
Am ad hema d si s-has ha'ichu am t-himthag ed ch d ge Palasi ch hab chehgig Nicodemas .

Am g wo s-chegitok mo haschu an o'ohanas ab amjed g Rahabbad . Heg atsh wa ha'i ha tho'ibia g t-shohshonbad mash eda g wehmaj o'othham s-ha kokthaimk . Ith at am wohokamch mo ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh . Kutsh g Jiosh tho'ibia .

T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab ha mah g u'uwi mat wo e sho'igch hekith am i ha mamsijith g a'al . T wabshaba ab ha amjed wo mahsi g t-tho'ibiakam . Kut wo e tho'ibia matp ab wo s-wohochuthath g Jiosh ch wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo s-ap'ek ch wo s-e neimakath .

Jiosh atsh ab i ha gawulkai g t-shohshonbad matsh d wo hemajkamgajk . Kutsh am i mu'itha mash eda am kihkahim Egypt jewed ch ed . Tsh ab hahawa i ha tho'ibia ab ha amjed g Egypt hemajkam g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj .
Jiosh o s-mahch g o'othham chegitoi ch ab ep ha mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab wa masma mat ahchim hab t-juh .

An o hab chu'ig mamt wo si e nuhkuth heg wa'i wehhejed hejel e-wehm kihkam ch an hab ep chu'ig mamt pi wo mua g hemajkam . Kumtp hems s-ap wo e nuhkuth g e-wehm kihkam wehhejed k wabshaba d wo pi ap chu'ijkamk mamtp wo hema mua .
Ab ani ha mahkch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag . T hegam pi hekith wo huhug . T pi hedai wo sha'i ni-wohppo'i .
Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam ch s-hohtam wo em-mah g gewkthag mamt wo gewito g Jiawul . Ab ani tahni g t-kownalig Jesus mat wo em-wehmajk ch ba'ich ab wo i em-mah g ho'ige'ithadag .
Hemajkam at hi wo wa e mihshmethath ch wabsh pi wo wohochuthath hegai mo haschu ab chum kah ch im hu hab wabsh wo i juh g Jiosh gewkthag . Pi g am hu ha wehmajk ihtham hab mahs hemajkam .
Pegih , tt hab wa masma nahnko ha'ichu wo junihith mat a'ai d wo i t-wehmtadagk ahchim mach ab t-hemakochuthch g Christ wehm .

Tho wohokam ihtha mani haschu m-ahgith . Kupt chum hekith am wo ha ahgithath g wohochuththam . T hekaj wo e nuhkuth mat wo s-wapagimak ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam . Ith at d wo i ha-wehmtadagk g hemajkam .
T hekaj am e wohokamch hegai mo an o'ohanas : Abraham at ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh . K heg hekaj hab kaij g Jiosh mo d e tho'ibiakam ch pi ha chu'ichig .
Ab am s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus Christ . Pegih , k pi hab chum chu'ig mams pi ab hu wo ha ha'ichuch g sho'igkam .
S-ko'okam o neneok hab masma mo s-em-mu'amk ch g iattogi hab kaij . Pi kehg ha-ne'oki o hab masma i wuhshani mo g hialwui ab ko'oi amjed .

Kumt ahpim chechoj ab wo si ha tatchuath g e-hohonig hab masma mam ab si hejel e tatchua no pi heg wa wepo mam d hemako e wehm . Hejel e hekaj o si pihk e elith matp hedai g e-hohnigkaj si pihk e elith no pi d wa'i hemako .

Pegih , pi am wa am hu e gahgith g Jiosh ap'ethag ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ch wabshaba am i kah ab amjed g Jiosh alithag k ab i s-wohoch . T g Jiosh am i em-ap'ech e tahgio gm hu hab i juhk g pi ap em-chu'ichig .
Tho si ha'ichu mat am wo si wehs s-ap oithath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch heg hab wo wa'i junihith mo haschu s-mahch mo d s-ap'ekam .
Hegam mo g ha-a'amo hab wa'ap d wohochuththam at ba'ich ab wo i si has ha elithath ch ba'ich i s-ap wo ha chikpani nat pi g ha-chikpan d wo ha-ap'ethagk g ha-wehm wohochuththam .
K hi wa chum woho mo ha'ijj g ni-wehm o'othham pi ab hu wohog elith g ha'ichu ahgaj . T wabshaba g Jiosh woho am hab wo juh hegai mo has i kaij .
D hema g shonthal g e-is-pahyokaj chu'akad g Jesus ab hudaj ab . Kud ab ha hekaj si e iawua g eh'ed ch shuhthagi .
Ab ani em-chehani mamt ab a'ai wo pihk e elithath hab masma mani ahni has i masma si pihk em-elith .

Wehs amt am wo i e-thagito Jiosh wui namsh pi d e tho'ibiakam ab amjed g muhkig . T am haha wo i em-hekaj g Jiosh mamt am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam . Pi g wo sha'i e hiwgith mas wo em-hekaj g pi ap'ekam has i masma .
Neh , bash kaij g Jiosh . Tt ahchim hi pi wo sha'i kuhkam gegokiwua machs im hu hab wo i t-juh ab amjed g Jiosh k wabshaba ab wo i s-wohochuth k wo t-tho'ibia .
T haha wo e tho'ibia g Tutuligo . An o o'ohadag mo hab kaij g Jiosh : Ab ant wo i wuhshath g hemajkam ha-tho'ibiakam ab ha amjed g Tutuligo . T heg gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig .

Tho hegam ni-wehm o'othham mat wa mua g t-kownalig Jesus . Kush d t-shohshon mat wa ha koktha g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam . K hegam ni-wehm o'othham t-sho'igchuth ch gm hu i t-wuwhas ahchim mach am ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh . K g Jiosh pi hohho'ith mo has e wua . Chum o hems ab wehs ha wui gegok g hemajkam
Pi at gm hu hab wo sha'i e juh g chu'ichigaj hegai mat am hab wo kia junihith g pi ap'ekam ha chum s-mahchch g wohokam . Pi o am hu hahawa ha'ichug mas haschu am wo e iagchul heg wehhejed .

k am uhgk i t-u'u k an e-hugith an t-toa hab masma matsh hab juh g si e-alithag . Kuch hemu in melchuth g Jesus kownaltalig jewed thahm hab masma mattsh an hahawa hab wo junihith thahm kahchim ch ed .
Thach t-wehm wohochuththam ch heg wa wepo mach d Christ honshpadag . K pi hab chum mahs machs a'ai wo t-iattogithath o hedai i ehp . Am g hab wo kaijjith g wohokam .
Hegai mat hedai wo gawul kaitham nenneokath at hemho wa wo chum e ho'ige'ithahun k ab wo tai g Jiosh g amichuthadag mat s-ap wo i tashogi g gawul kaitham e-ne'oki .
Kush eda ith oitham g Saul wabsh kia ha oith hegam mash am oith g Jesus himthag ch s-gewkam ha ebkioth ch s-ha kokthaimk . Sh am hu hebai i , sh ab si tahni g uhgchu pahl
“ Ith ani hab kaij mani ia wabsh kia ha wehmaj ch koi ab hu m-wui hih mant hekaj ab wo si ha mah g s-ap tahhathkam .
Jesus Christ o wa heg ab nakog . Kumt wo si s-hehgigk mam hab wa'ap nakog am hab junihithch g chikpanaj . Ab o him g tash mat g gewkthaj wo i e maskogi . Kumt hahawa ba'ich wo i s-hehgigk .
Kunt am si i nei eda k nei g nahnko mahs ha'ichu thoakam , chum hegam ehp mo s-thothajk ch wahammad ch u'uwhig .
An o wa em-u'ukch g bagatalig ch hehgamthadag ch keh'ithadag . Mt wabshaba hemuch im hu wehs hab wo i juh ihtha pi ap'ekam ab e amjed k pi hekith pad wo neokath
Tsh g Paul am i ha chehgim k am ha wehm i thahiwua k am ha wehm chikpan no pi hab d wa'ap ikus kihttham .
Pi g wo hiwgithath g pi ap'ekam mas am ep wo i chikp g em-thoakag mamt hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap e-tatchui .
Ch ab si ha chehani g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gewkthagkaj ch ab ha gewkemhun mat am wabsh wo i e bahbgi k wo chikpanath ch hekaj wo e thagio'ithath .
“ Tsh ihtham wa s-hehgam g e-wehnag Josephbad k ab ha'i ha wui gagda mat d wo ha neholigak am Egypt jewed ch ed . Sh wabshaba g Jiosh am nuhkuth

Sh ihtham hema hab chehgig Agabus . Tsh g Jiosh am i tashogi ihtha mat g bihugig wo gei an wehsko jewed thahm . Kutsh am ha ahgi g Jesus ihmtham amai Antiok t am . Tsh amai i amjed am i e nakog k am wehsijj i shuligahi g lial am ha wehhejed hegam e-wehm wohochuththam mo am kih Judea jewed ch ed . Kutsh gei hegai bihugig mash eda g Claudius am d kownal .
I am i ha'asa neo g Paul k am hahawa wehs ha wehm tohtonwua ihtham k am e ho'ige'ithahu .
Ahchim mach d Christ hemajkamga att hab i t-ah matt pi am hu hab wo junihith g hejel t-tatchui .
Am g wabsh wo si s-ap e tahtkkath mat hekith ab wo em-a'ahe g sho'igthag .
T wo ha iattogi matp hedai hab wo chei mo s-mahch g Jiosh k eda hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam . Ith o am s-chuhugam k ed him .
matsh ab i e kuhpi'o g thahm kahchim . Kutsh ab ha'ichu i e huduni jewedo k hab mahs mo g lohna ch sha'i si ge'ej ch an a'ai e u'ukch chuhchpulij an ch ab i tadanich .
Kuch eda mu'ikpa jejewed amjed , ha'i ab Parthia t amjed ch ha'i ab Media t amjed ch ab amjed g Elam ch Mesopotamia ch Judea ch Cappadocia ch Pontus ch Asia
Bamt masma ab wo si ha'ichuchuthath g t-kownalig Jesus ch ab wo hehgchulithath am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam namt pi ba'ich i s-ap wo s-mahchk g Jiosh .

Pegih , ni wehnag , Timothy , heki o hu am i t-tashogith g Jiosh maptki am hab wo junihith ihtha chikpan . Kuni ab ep i m-gewkemhun mapt hab wo wa junihith . Hegai Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab m-wui at hab wo masmak mo g s-kehg cheggiakud . Pt hekaj ab wui kehkkath g ge Jiawul .

Nt amjed hahawa ha'ichu kah . K ith hab kaithag mo sha'i mu'i hemajkam am neneok an thahm kahchim ch ed ch hab kaij : “ Ab ach si has elith g Jiosh . Tho'ibiathag ch ab has elithadag ch gewkthag o ab d amjedkamaj g Jiosh .
Heki am hu pi edgith ihtha wechij thoakag nam pi d pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi ab hu kaiham g Jiosh .
T-kownalig Jesus Christ o ab t-mahkch ihtha t-mihshmetha chemait hugi . K pi sha'i hiwgithas mams wo ha wehmajk amai mo ab ha ihm g e-jijoshga ko'athch hegai mo ab ha tho'ith .
Thach Jiosh hemajkamga . K pi hab chum mahs machs wo ha wehm wo'iwua matp hedai pi d t-wehm kihkam o achs wo chegito g s-uam ha'ichu o achs wo s-behim matp haschu pi ab hu d t-wuikam .

Wehs o s-kehgaj g Jiosh ha'ichu nahtoi am ha wehhejed hegam mo s-kehg ha'ichu chegitoithag . K wabshaba pi ha'ichu s-kehgaj am ha wehhejed hegam mo pi kehg ha'ichu chegitoithag ch pi wohochuth g wohokam no pi g pi kehg ha'ichu ha-chegitoithag wehs ha'ichu padchuth ha wehhejed . K pi has ab hu sha'i tahhathag g ha-i'ibthag mo am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam .

Tsh si has i el hegam mo hedai i kah k hab kaij , “ Aha no pi d ihtha mash an ha kokthahim hegam mash am oith hegai himthag Jerusalem t ab ch heg hekaj ia jiwia mat in wo i ha u'ihim k am uhpam wo i ha ui u'ugchu papal ha wui . ”

Neh , hegam u'ugchu papal o am i chum ha wehmt g hemajkam heg hekaj heki hu hab elithaj g Jiosh . K wabshaba ihtha wechij ha'ichu hab elithaj ba'ich i s-kehgaj no pi g Jiosh ba'ich i s-kehg ha'ichu ab t-makiog . K g Jesus ba'ich i s-ap i t-wehmt heg hekaj .
Neh , pi o has d ahga g ni-thoakag ni-wehhejed . Chum ani hi wa s-wehmjimk g Christ . K heg hekaj chum s-ap'e mant hu wo i muh .
Kuni heg hekaj s-mahch mat am wo himchuthahith g Jiosh ihtha tho'ibiathag em-wehhejed . Am at i shonwuich em-thoakag ed k wo nahto mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia g Jesus Christ jewed thahm .

K g Jiosh alithag ab t-mahkch g amichuthadag matt wo s-mahchk g wohokam Jiosh ch wo edgithath g wechij thoakag . Heg at hekaj ia jiwia g Jiosh alithag jewed thahm . Heg o d wa'i t-Jioshga mo d si wohokam Jiosh .
Am g wo i e nakog mamt s-ap e tahtk ch ab wo ha neithath g hemajkam mamtp he'es wo i e nako .
Jiosh at woho ab wo t-juni mash has i kaij . Kutt heg hekaj si s-wihnam wo t-u'ukch heg ab .

“ Am g wabsh wo i s-ap e tahtkkath . Ab ant wo i em-mah hegai hab mahs s-ap tahhathkam mani ahni edgith . Pi at hedai wo e nako mat hab mahs s-ap tahhathkam wo em-mah . Pi g wo sha'i e kudutath ch pi ha'ichu wo ehbithath .
Pegih , si ach s-ap t-tahtk ch ia chewed ,
Mu'ijj o pi ab hu ni-kaiham ch pi ab hu ni-hiwig . Nt wabshaba pi heg hekaj ia jiwia manis wo ha lothai . S-ha ani tho'ibiamk .

Neh , hema ash wa d Cain ch hab junihim g Jiawul tatchui . Kumt pi oithk am hab wo e junihith . Cain cheoj wehnag ash wa hab junihim g s-ap'ekam . Sh g Jiosh si tatchua . Tsh g Cain heg hekaj s-hehgam k mua .
Kutki wehs g si'iskod jejewed ch thohtha'ag wo heb hu hihi .
Neh , sh wa g Abrahambad d si keli mat pi ep wo chum e nako mas wo alitht . T eda ab amjed i hih mu'i hemajkam mo pi ta kuintama hab masma mo g huhu'u ch hab masma mo g o'od an ge kahchki babsho .
Neh , wehs ha'ichu thahm o d kownal g Jiosh ch pi ta neithagma ch pi hekith im hu hab wo i e juh . Kutt ab wo si uhgk i ulin k ab wo hehgchulithath chum hekith . Neh , woho o wa ihtha .

Si o s-kaitham hab kaij , “ Ab g wo si has elith g Jiosh ch ab ihm . E at ai mat wo ha lothai g hemajkam . Ab g wo i tohtonwua k ab wo i ihm g Jiosh . Heg at nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed ch ge shuhthagi ch g shohshonkam shuhthagi . ”

Kush am i mu'ithahim hegam mash am oith g Jesus himthag . Sh am ha'i neneok g Greek hemajkam ha-ne'okikaj nash pi tash gm hu kihkahim ha-jewedga ed . Kush ihtham hab kaij mash pi ap ha thagio'ith hegam hehe'ejel wi'ikam u'uwi mash d ha-hajuni . Kush heg hekaj am a'ai pi e ap'et ihtham Greek neneoktham ha wehm hegam mo g hejel e-ne'okikaj neneok .
no pi hab d elithaj matt s-ap ab wo nako . Ith o wa am t-chehgithch g Christ mo wa eda s-ap ab nakog g sho'igthag am t-wehhejed .
Bach wa em-ahgith mach eda am em-wehmaj mamt pi wo ha gegos hegam mo pi tatchua mat wo chikpanath .

Pegih neh , ab o si t-tatchua g Jiosh ch hiwigi g e-alithag mat am i e thagito k e muhkith am t-wehhejed mach d pi ap chu'ijkam . Kut pi wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag matp hedai ab wo hiwig k wabshaba g pi ha huhugetham thoakag wo bei .
Sh wabshaba hab kaij g jiawul ab ha wui , “ S-mahch ani g Jesus ch ep s-mahch mo hedai wud hegai Paul ch wabshaba ahpim pi sha'i em-mahch mams hedai wud . ”

Ni hahawa ep neith hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wa heki hu in i wuhsh . Wehs g kokownal an jewed thahm at am i ha hemapai g e-shonthalig k am i wehmt g s-ta Ehbithamakam mat wo cheggia hegai mo g s-toa kawyu cheshaj . Kut ith g shonthaligaj i wehmt .

K am hema thaha g ge'e wahlko ch atsh am gahi wo i wua Asia jewed wui . T g Julius g e-shonthalig ha wehm am ha ui g lilso k am i chehchsh heg ab wahlko . Nt ahni Luke ep ha oi . T heg ha oi Aristarcas mo ab d kihkam Thessalonica t ab am Macedonia jewed ch ed . Kutt am gahi i shul g ge shuhthagi .
Am g wo wa s-ha chegitok hegam mam gd hu si ha kuhpch hab sha masma mamtp hems ahpim am ha wehm kuhpi . Am g wo s-ha chegitok hegam mo e sho'igchuth hab sha masma mamtp hems ha wehm e sho'igchuth .
Wehs amt hab wo junthath g t-kownalig Jesus hegai mamt haschu hab wo junihith . Kumt ab wo ho'ige'ithath g t-ohg Jiosh am gahi wuhshanim g Jesus .
K ab em-ab mamt ab ha'ichu wo ha mah hegam mo am em-mashcham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga mamt hekaj am epai wo i ha wehmt .

Tsh eda koi ab hu he'es sha'i mah ihtha jewed k wabshaba am hi wa ahgith mat wo mah . T d wo ha-enigak g amjedkamaj mat he'ekiajj ab wo i oi . Kush eda pi koi ha a'aliga g Abrahambad mash eda hab ahg g Jiosh .
Kush ihtha nahnko ha wua hegam t-shohshon ch ha sho'igchuth ch hab ha ahg mat gm hu wo ha shul g chu'uchum e-a'aliga hab ahgch mat wo koi .
Kuchd g Peter wehm am ha hekaj wohp .
ch hekaj chum hekith am si ni-nakog mant am hab wo wa'i junihith g s-ap'ekam ch hab pi wo sha'i ha'ichukaj si ni-el am tahgio g Jiosh ch am ha tahgio g hemajkam .

S-ta edam ha'ichu ash am wabsh e chehgith ab ha amjed hab masma mo g totshagi am e chehgith an shuhthagi hugith an . Ihtham o wabsh pi thotholima ch ab aihim mat g Jiosh gm hu wo ha shul ge'e s-chuhugam k ed .
Pi at hedai o'othham ni-ahgi o ab ni-mashcha . Tho Jiosh alithag mat ab mahsko wua ni-wui .
Am o wabsh ha chu'amun g chehanig hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh . K ba'ich hab i junihim g pi ap'ekam . K g s-ko'ok ha-namkithadag ab ha aihim .
Kut heg hekaj am i ni-kei mant wo i ahgahi ab amjed g alithaj k wo ha mashcha g gawul mahs hemajkam g wohokam . S-mahch ap wehs ihtha .
Mach hedai ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh att ab si t-hemakoj heg wehm . Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . K ith d Jiosh ch t-wehmaj . Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mach d a'aligaj .
Am g wo s-chegitok g chum hedai ha-ap'ethag ch pi wabsh hejel e-tatchui .

Am g wabsh s-ap e wehm wo kihkath . Pi g am wo chum e ha'ichuchuthath ch ab wabsh wo ha tatchuath g sho'igkam ch am hab wabsh wo junihith wabsh chum has mahs chikpan . Pi amt hab wo e elithath mam d s-chu a'amichuththam .
Im g hu hab wo i juhni g keh'ithadag ch pi amkadag ch bagatalig ch kawhaina ch has ahgadag .
Am at i ni-kei g Jiosh mant wo em-ahgithahi ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj . Ni heg hekaj d em-pionag ch am em-ahgith .
K g mo'oj si s-tohta hab masma mo g s-wihs gew . K g wuhpuij si s-masma tonod hab masma mo g s-toni nahtha .

Pegih , ni ab nakog g sho'igthag am em-wehhejed ch am ha wehhejed hegam mat hab wa'ap wo e tho'ibia am kahk g ha'ichu ni-ahga . K heg hekaj mu'ithahim hegam mo ab ho'ige'ith ch ab si has elith g Jiosh .
T wo edagi g wechij thoakag hegam mat ab wo ni-bei . Am ant ha eda wo ul g ni-thoakag .
Kud hab kaij g Martha , “ Heu'u , ni-kownalig , s-wohochuth ani map d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d Jiosh alithag . An o o'ohadag Jiosh o'ohana ed maptsh ia wo jiwia jewed thahm . ”
Sh g Jesus chuhchai am hahawa ha mashcham . Kush am ha wehm e mihshmath ch e ho'ige'ithahun ch ha wehm huhuga g chemait .
S-hohho'ith ap g s-ap'ekam ch g pi ap'ekam pi hohho'ith Nt heg hekaj am i m-kehsh k ab m-mah g si ge'e s-hehgig wehs ha ba'iwechkim .
k ab ha chehani g e-shonthalig . Tsh ihtham an bei hegai James mo d John wehnag k mua g is-pahyokaj .

Ha'i at thagito g wohokam k ha mashcham mat heki hu ab i wuwha g ko'i muhkig amjed . Gohkajj ihtham mo ith hekaj ha iattogith o d Hymanaeus ch Phyletus . K g ha-mashchama padchuth g ha-wohochuthadag hab masma mat g pi kehg hihwthag wo em-cheawuagi . Pi g ha wehm a'agath g ha-mashchama . Gm at hu hab wo i m-juh ab amjed g Jiosh .
Heg o wa wepo mo d ha mu'akam matp hedai s-ha keh'ith . Kuch s-mahch mo pi edgith g wechij thoakag hegam mat hedai d wo ha mu'akamk .

Kuchd am i t-nahto t-gegosithk . D hab kaij g Jesus ab Simon Peter wui , “ Simon map d Jonas alithag , nap ba'ich i si pihk e elith ni-hekaj mo hi ihtham ? ” D hab kaij g Peter , “ Heu'u , ni-kownalig , s-mahch ap mani ab si m-tatchua . ” D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui , “ Am g i ha nuhkuth g wechij ni-wohochuththam no pi hab wa'i masma mo g kahwal mahmad . ”
Ab o ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo s-chu a'amichuth k am wo tashogi g s-hasig ha'ichu ch ab ha'ijj t-mahkch matt wo si s-mahchk ch ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga .

“ Tsh am ep i huhug g ha'ichu ha-hugi . Kutsh am ep hunio . Tsh g Josephbad am hahawa ha ahgi mo d ha-wehnag nash pi pi amichuth . Tsh g ha-kownalig g Egypt t am hemajkam ab s-ha mai g Josephbad hajuni .
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed : Pi g am wo pad neneokath ch pi ha'ichu wo ha iattogithath mamtp wo tatchuath mamt s-ap e tahtk ch in d wo thothakamk ch wo s-hehgigk .
Wehsijj ash ab a'ai si e tatchua g Jesus ihmtham ch ab si i hemakoch g e-chegitoi k pi hedai sha'i s-tha'a g ha'ichu e-eniga ab a'ai e wui .
Am ant em-ahgi mant haschu bei . K ith d si s-has ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh ch hab chu'ig mat g alithaj muh heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig
Kumtki s-ko'okam wo namkith g kihhim nat pi ia e ko'ij g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ch Jiosh hemajkamga . Chum o hems d chu'ichigaj hegam mat gn hu a'ai jewed thahm e ko'ij .

Neh , bash kaij g Jiosh . ” Tsh am i kah ihtham gawul mahs hemajkam k si s-hehgigam ab ihm g Jiosh nash pi ab ha makiog g e-tho'ibiathag ahga . Kutsh hegam ab i s-wohoch mat hedai g Jiosh i ha ap'ech mat wo e tho'ibia .
Hegai mo am s-mahch ch ahg wehs ihtha o hab kaij , “ Woho o wa . S-hohtam ant ab wo i hih . ” Pegih oi g . Ab g i hihm , t-kownalig Jesus .
Am g wo i e mashcham k hab wo junihith hegai mam haschu i kahk ch ab bei ni-amjed . Kut wo e chehgi mo am em-wehmaj hegai mat t-tho'ibia k ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam .
Am g wo s-chegitok mo pi d em-obga ch wabshaba d em-wepnag mamt ab wo shohbithath ha'ichukaj .

S-e g wo nen'oithk mat pi hedai wo em-iattogi . Ha'i ash chum s-em-mashchamamk hegai mo haschu d wabsh o'othham ha-mahchig ch em-ahgith mamt heg ab s-ap wo himath g e-thoakag . Tt wabshaba ab wo beihith g t-mashchamadag ab amjed g Christ

Neh , mo g s-melithkam am e gewkathch mat wo ha gehg k wo bei g s-ap e-namkithadag . Kuni ahni am hab wa'ap ni-gewkathch mant wo bei g s-ap ni-namkithadag . K d ihtha mant an haha wo wehmajk g Christ an Jiosh kihthag ed .
Heg at am i e thagito mat s-ko'okam e muhkith k hekaj t-tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap'ekam k i t-kegch mach d hahawa si hemajkamgaj k si tatchua matt hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam .

“ Tho si wohokam ihtha mant hab wo chei . T wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k am wo wehmajk g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo kaihamath g ha'ichu ni-ahga ch ab wo hiwgath g Jiosh . Pi ant ab hu wo ha mohto'i g ha-chu'ichig mas hekaj gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Jiosh .
Hegai anghil mo ab ni-wui neok o g ohla kuintakud uhs an u'ukch mat hekaj wo kuint g kihhim ch g kolhaidaj ch g kihkijeg .

Ihtham o heg wa'i ab si has elith hejel e-tatchui ch heg wa'i s-hohho'ith jewed t ab ha'ichu . T g Jiosh gm hu wo i ha shul Jiawul kih ed no pi e hahaschuth heg hekaj mat hekaj wo chum si e eh'elithath .
Pi at d wo hema hegamk mat hemuch ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga nat pi am hu wo chum si e haschuthath ch wo i gei hab masma matsh wa g ge Jiawul hab e juh .

Ab ant ha'ichu wo i chum em-o'ohani ab amjed g t-tho'ibiathag . T wabshaba ha'i i wuwha mo d s-chu i'attomkam ch am chum gawul s-junimk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g tho'ibiathag ch ab wui gegok g t-kownalig Jesus Christ . Ihtham o hab s-junimk g pi ap'ekam ch heg hekaj hab kaij mat g o'othham wabsh chum haschu has wo junihith ab i s-wohochuthk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . K wabshaba heki hu an o'ohanas mat s-ko'okam wo ha namkith g Jiosh hegam mat ab wui wo gegokiwua . Heki o hu t-ahgith g Jiosh matt haschu ab wo chum s-wohochuthath . Kum ahpim ab s-wohochuth g ha'ichu ahgaj . Nt heg hekaj am wo i em-o'ohanith k ab wo i em-gewkemhu mamt si s-gewkam wo u'ukchith .
Sh eda wa ihtham Peter ch John am ha mashcham g hemajkam mat ab i wuhsh g Jesus e-muhkig amjed . Sh ihtham Sajusi pi hohho'ith nash pi pi wohochuth mat ep wo e chegito g ko'i .
Pi ap chu'ichigaj o sha'i si uhgk sipulkas . Kuni s-chegito g pi ap chu'ichigaj .

Kuchd oi wa gm hu ha'ab hihi Cana kihhim wui mat wa am si wehpeg hab juh g si s-hasig ha'ichu mat wa wabsh g shuhthagi nawaitt . D am hema jiwia g kownal pionag ab Capernaum kihhim t amjed am i kaiok mo am ha'ichug g Jesus . Sh ith alithag muhkhim . D hab kaij ihtha ab wui g Jesus mat am wo hih Capernaum wui k wo thoaj g alithaj .
Mt wo si chikpanath ch pi wo papadmak . Si e-ihbthagkaj amt ab wo ihmath g Christ ch wo chikpanthath .
Pi am hi wa chum neith ch wabshaba ab si tatchua ch ab ep si s-wohochuth . K ith hekaj si ge'ej g s-em-hehgig . Kumt pi wo sha'i e nako mams wehs s-ap wo ah .
Jiosh at ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . K heg d Jiosh ch ab t-wehm kihthag . Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mach d a'aligaj .

D an hema thaha g ha'a mad am shuhthagi g pad nawait . D am hema g shonthal ha'ichu wakch pad nawait ch ed k an ha'ichu k an uskon k ab uhgk i be k ab kams hab masma mo an o'ohadag Jiosh heki hu o'ohana ed .

Jiawul o an wehs ha u'ukch hegam mo hedai pi mahch g Jiosh . K g kownaltaligaj d hekia s-chuhugam . T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i t-wuwhas ab gewkthaj amjed k am i t-wahpki si e-tatchuithch e-alithag kownaltalig ed .

Neh , am ant ha'ichu wo em-ahgi , ni-wepnag . An o ha'i oiopoth ch am gawul junihim g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch am ha'ichu hab ahg mat hekaj wo e kudu g t-wehm wohochuththam k ab e wui wo gegokiwua . Kumt wo si s-e nen'oithk ab ha amjed k pi ab hu wo i ha miabi .
Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt ha'ichukaj wo i ha wehmtath g e-wehm wohochuththam o wo ha'ichu ha mashchamath
“ Mt hahawa pi ab hu wo ge ni-kaiamath ha'ichu ch wabshaba ab wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab wo kakke g ni-ohg am ni-chehchegch . T wa woho wo em-mah .

K g shondaj ith hekaj hab junis nahnko mahs si s-kehg hohothai . Wehpeg shondaj o d hegai hothai mo hab e a'aga jasper . K g gokkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga sapphire . K g waikkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga agate . K g gi'ikkokam d hegai mo hab e a'aga emerald .
Kut d wo pi ap chu'ijkamk matp hedai pi am hu hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam mo eda s-mahch mat has wo chum e juh .

K ab hahawa hema neok miajed g Jiosh kownal thaikud ch hab kaij : “ Ab g wo si has i elith g Jiosh ch ab s-wohog elith ahpim piongaj ch ahpim wehs hemajkam mam ha'i d s-has haha'ichu ch ha'i pi d has haha'ichu . ”
Hebaichujj ach si i shahshani nach pi am chum s-hihimimk thahm kahchim wui ch s-behimk hegai s-kehg honshpadag mat g Jiosh ab wo t-mah .

Pi att hab wo chei machs ba'ich i s-ap hab wua g t-chikpan mo hema ehp . Tho wabsh hehe'ejel t-chikpan hegai mach hab wua . Kutt heg wo wa'i a'appe hejel t-chikpan k wo si s-ap t-taht mattp s-ap hab wo wuath .
Mt wabshaba wo ha hiwigi g u'uwi e-a'aliga mat wo ha kunt mamtp hab wo elithath mo d si tatchui nat pi s-ap ge'ege'ehogat . Am o wa s-ap'e mat am hab wo e juh .
T wo i em-wuwhas ab amjed g cheopi . K ab him g tash mamt wo em-mu'a k hab wo e ahgath mat wehhejed hab juh g Jiosh .

Ntki hahawa ep nei g si ge'e chehgitha an thahm kahchim ch ed . Wewa'ak anghil oki u'a g wewa'ak sho'igthag . Ihtham oki d si ha oithchkam sho'igthag . Jiosh atki ith hekaj am wo i kuhgi g s-gewk e-a'appemadag .
D hab hahawa kaij g Jesus , “ Am g hig wehs wo ha ahgi manis ha'ichu pi ap hab kaij . Wohokam ani em-ahgith . Pt haschu ahgk ab ni-shonikka ? ”

Ihtham u'uwi o am si i ni-wehmajkahim mach wa am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Ni heg hekaj am ep s-m-ahgithamk ahpi map hab e chechcheg I-ha-Wehmttham mapt woho am wo i ha wehmajk map hab masma i ni-wehmajkahim . Clement ch ha'i ehp o hab wa'ap i ni-wehmajkahim . Pi o wehs s-e mahch g ha-chechgig ch wabshaba an o'ohadag heg eda mo an e o'ohan g e tho'ibiakam ha-chechgig ch an kahch Jiosh kihthag ed .
Iawua at g ha-eh'ed g m-hemajkamga ch hegam ha'ichu i m-tashogiththam . Kupt heg hekaj g eh'ed ab ha mah mat wo ih . Ith o wa si e gahgith ihtham . ”

K eda pi hab sha'i chum mahs machs am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam . Am att i thagito g pi ap'ekam . K pi am hu hahawa ha gewkthag t-thahm . Ith o heg wa wepo matt heki hu muh natt pi pi hab hahawa ep wo junihith g pi ap'ekam .
Hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam mat e muhkith at d wo gigi'ikkokam kownalk . Ith o ha wehm chikpan hegam wehpeg wewa'ak kokownal ch gm hu wo him k wo e muhkith .
An o o'ohadag mash hab kaij g Jiosh ab Abrahambad wui : Gam g hu i ha wuwhasith ihtham e-neneholiga . Pi at wo enigak g m-eniga am wehmaj hegai mo d madaj g m-hohnig .
Hegam mo s-e kaischuthamk at heg hekaj hab wo s-junim g pi ap'ekam . T g ha-tatchui gm hu hab wo i ha juh ab amjed g Jiosh . Kut ha'i ep wo ha padch .

Kut g Jiosh hab wo ha juh hegam wehst-mahm kokownal mat ab wo wechokath g s-ta Ehbithamakam . Kut e wehm wo si s-keh'ithath hegai ge'e kihhim mo wepogithas g pi ap'ekam uwi ch wehs ha'ichu wo wohppo'i . T heg gm wabsh wo i thahpkath . T ihtham wo huh g chuhkugaj k wo hugio g meikaj . Neh , bat wa masma am oithk hab wo e juh mo has i kaij g Jiosh .
Jiosh o s-t-mahch ahchim mattp ab si tatchua .

Neh , pi o sha'i ba'ich i s-ap'e g Tutuligo mo g gawul mahs hemajkam . Wehsijj ach wa ab mohtois g pi ap'ekam . K ith an t-u'ukch . Kutt pi hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs pi hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam .
“ Kush wa am hema wisilot g ohlakaj k ab wui iagchul heg wepogithch mo d ha-jioshga k am ep piast mat heg hekaj ab wo si i ha'ichuch hegai e-jioshta .

Kutki wabshaba hegam hemajkam mat an wih pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chu'ichig k ab wabsh kia ha ihm g jijawul ch ab ep ha ihm g e-jijoshchutha . Kuki eda ihtha pi am hu ha'ichu d i ha-wehmtadag . Ha-jijoshchutha o d wabsh ha'ichu ha-nahtoi ch pi ha'ichu neith ch pi ha'ichu kah ch pi sha'i oiopo no pi d wabsh ohla ch plahtha ch kohwli ch hothai ch uhs .

S-to'o ehbitham hab mahs g Jiosh lothaita . Kuni heg hekaj ab si i ha chehani g hemajkam mat wo hiwigi mat g Jiosh am wo i ha ap'ech e tahgio . S-mahch o g Jiosh mo ith d wohokam mani em-ahgith . Kuni hab chum em-elith mam ahpim hab wa'ap s-mahch .
Wehsijj ach hab wa masmakahim ch am hab junihim g hejel pi ap hab t-elitha . K wa ab t-wui him g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag .
Sh tash am neok g Peter ch am chum ha ahgith ch hab kaij , “ Am g wo e tho'ibia . Si s-ko'ok namkithadag o ab ha aihim hegam t-wehm hemajkam mat pi gm hu wo ohhoth g pi ap e-chu'ichig . ”

Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i t-juh mattp am hab wo sha junihith g hejel t-tatchui . Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am i em-wehmaj . Kumt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap ha'ichu hab e-juni k hab wo edgithath g wechij thoakag .
Bo chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana : Mat hedai ab wo s-wohochuth k wo e tho'ibia .
Wehsko o am e a'aga mamtsh ab i s-wohoch g Jesus Christ . Ni heg hekaj ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh .
Jiosh o ab si em-tatchua ch ab i em-ui mamt d wo a'aligajk .
Ith o d i si ha'ichu mamt ab wo si ha tatchua g e-wehm wohochuththam k hekaj wabsh wo pi chegito g pi ap ha-chu'ichig .
Mt am hahawa thagito g Paul ch ha'i ep lilso shonthal ha-ge'ejig wui mat am wo i ha ui ge'echu kownal wui . Ith o hab chehgig Julius ch d ha-ge'ejig hegam mo hab e a'aga Ge'echu Kownal Shonthalig .

Mosesbad ch hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch oki ab ha mahkch g ne'i . K ith am a'aga : “ T-kownalig Jiosh , thap si s-gewkthagkam . K g ha'ichu hab m-juni d si ge'e ha'ichu ch sha'i si s-kehgaj . T-kownalig an wehsko jewed thahm , tho si s-ap'ekam ch wohokam g m-himthag .

Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o d s-kehg gegosig g em-thoakag wehhejed . Ab at em-wui chehgi g e-ho'ige'ithadag . Kumt ab wo si tatchuath hab masma mo g s-moik ali tatchua g wihbi ch hekaj wo i ge'elhith am e-tho'ibiathag ed .

Ni hahawa hema ep kah . Kuki ith ab neok thahm kahchim t amjed ch hab kaij mantsh an wo o'oha ihtha , “ T wo si s-ap e taht hegam mat wo koi , ab s-wohochuthch mo g Jesus d ha-kownalig . ” K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab kaij , “ Tho si wohokam ihtha . T wo si s-ap e ulinihogi ihtham heg amjed s-wehch e-chikpan k ab wo bei g e-mahkigdag heg wehhejed . ”

Bo d elithag g Jiosh mat g t-wohochuthadag ha'ichu wehhejed wo s-kehgajk . Hemho wa att wo si t-nuhkuthath mat pi wo t-padch g jewed t ab ha'ichu . Kut hab ep wo t-juh g t-wohochuthadag matt ha'ichukaj wo i ha wehmajk hegam mo d hehe'ejel wihpkam u'uwi ch a'al . T hab pi wo e sho'igchuthath .
Ha'i o chum ha iattogith ch gm hu ha wanchshulig ab amjed g Christ . Kumt wabshaba pi ab hu wo ha kaiha , chum as hems hab wo e wuath mo s-ap'e .

Kuni ha kah g wehs ha'ichu thoakam an thahm kahchim ch ed ch an jewed thahm ch am jewed wecho ch am ge'e kahchki ch ed . Wehs ihtham o am ne'e hab masma : “ Tho ha wuikam g Jiosh heg wehm mat kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch mamb ab wo si pihk e elithath ha wui ch ab wo si has ha elithath ch ab wo ha hehgchulithath ch ab ha wui wo thagitokchith g e-gewkthag chum hekith . ”

Tki g gokkokam anghil am hahawa epai kuhu g e-kuikudkaj . Tki am ha'ichu e tha'ich ge shuhthagi ch ed ch hab sha mahs mo g ge ge'e tho'ag ch meihim . Tki hemako tahpani mo waik e tahpanch g ge shuhthagi wabsh e eh'edch .
k an be k gm hu i wuhshath kihhim t amjed mat wo ma'ichkwua . Sh am hema ha wehmaj g wechij o'othham ch hab chehgig Saul . Kutsh heg nuhkuthach g e-liliwa hegam matsh wo ma'ichkwua g Steven .
K an hab ep chu'ig : Ab g wo ihmath g Jiosh wehsijj ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ch wo si hehgchulithath .
Wehs ha'ichu at an nahto . K wehs ha'ichu an hab chu'ig wehhejed . K hab mahs matt chum hekith ab wo si has elithath g Jiosh !

Am ba'ich d i tash , d am jiwia g Jesus John wui . D heg an a'aga ch hab kaij , “ Neh , ith o d hegai mat wo e wepogi g kahwal mad k ab wo e iagchul Jiosh wui mat gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig .

Tsh am i wahp k wehs ha koktha hegam mo pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh . Tsh wabshaba hema ab s-wohoch g Jiosh , chum as d chehpa'awi , k wa ha tho'ibia hegam Tutuligo mash wa am s-a'agi chechga g jewed . Kumtsh heg hekaj pi mua mamt hekith ha gewito .
S-chu ehskam at wo jiwia mat wo ha u'u k wo ha koktha . Nt ahni ia jiwia mant s-ba'ama ab wo i em-mah g thoakag
Kuch wabshaba ahchim am chegito g thahm kahchim ch ed t-kihthag . Ab at amjed wo jiwia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus Christ . Kuch ab nenida .
S-ap o ab t-neith g Christ . Kutt ahchim hab wa masma ab a'ai s-ap wo t-neithath ch hab ab wo has elithath g Jiosh .

Pt am wo ha oith k am ha wehm wo e thagito Jiosh wui ge'e cheopi t am . Am apt ha wehhejed wo namkith mat haschu wo i chum ha namkith heg hekaj . Kumt am haha wo hih g e-mo'o . Pt hab masma wo ha chehgi g t-wehm o'othham map am hab junihim g t-himthag . T heg amjed wo s-mahchk mo pi woho hegai mam haschu ab m-abchuth .
Tsh am hahawa i ha tashogi mat d wo Mattiask ch d wo si kehshajk .
Sho'o wa'i s-ap e tahtk hegam mat hedam g Jiosh gm hu hab i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k pi ab hu wo ha mohto'i .

Neh , t am hahawa ni-chehgi matki has wo masmak ihtham gohk . Kutki hab wo masmak mo hegam gohk olive u'us wuhshanig mo wa heki hu o'ohanas ab ha amjed ch hab ep wo masmak mo hegam gohk lalampa mo am chuhch ge'e cheopi ch ed .
Am g wabsh wo si pi ap e tahtk k wo iawua g e-oh'og heg hekaj pi ap ha'ichu hab e-juni ch pi wabsh wo hehemath ch pi wo s-e tahhathchuthath heg hekaj .
Matp hedai hab masma hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ch pi mahch g Jiosh . Pi g am hu s-ha wepom k wabshaba hegam s-ha wepom mat hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam . Ihtham o d Jiosh a'aliga .

Ab ash wa s-wohochuth g Jiosh . Sh g Jiosh heg hekaj hab kaij mo d s-ap'ekam . T heg i thahm am hahawa e pahl hikuch mat hab masma am wo wohokamch g e-wohochuthadag mat heg hekaj am i ap'ech g Jiosh . T g Jiosh hab masma wehs am wo i ha ap'ech hegam mat hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohoch , chum hems hegam mo pi pahl hikuchkas . Heg o wa wepo mach ahchim Jiosh wohochuththam woho d Abrahambad amjedkam nach pi hab masma ap'ethag . Hemho wa att ab wo s-wohochuthath ch ab wo hiwgath hab masma mash wa g Abrahambad .
Nat hig hab ep wo juh g pi ap'ekam hegai mat heki hu muh ? Pegih , tt ahchim hab wa masma am i thagito g pi ap'ekam ab i s-wohochuthk mat g Christ am t-wehhejed muh .
Chum o hekith am hab chu'ig g muhkig t-wehhejed mamt wa hab masma hab juh g Jesus . K hab masma am tasho e neith g Jesus thoakag am t-thoakag ed .
Ha'i o hi g hejel e-tatchui am hab elith ch wabsh pi ab hu ha'ichuchuth g hab elithaj g Jesus Christ .
Abrahambad ch Sarabad ash wa ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh mash wa hab ha ahgith matsh wo hema mahsith g ali matsh eda heki hu kekelit . Sh g Sarabad pi ha mamdat .

Ch ahchim hi s-mahch mo d hemako g Jiosh t-ohg . K wehs ha'ichu d amjedkamaj . Kuch heg wehhejed in d thothakam . K g t-kownalig Jesus Christ d hemako ch wehs ha'ichu nahto . K heg gahi wuhshanim g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g wechij thoakag .

T hemuch ia ep jiwia ab em-amjed k ia u'apa g s-ta hohho'itham ahga ab amjed g em-wohochuthadag ch pihk em-elithadag . Am o t-ahgith mam chum hekith si s-ap am t-chegito ch hab wa masma chum s-t-neithamk mach ahchim has i masma chum s-em-neithamk .
T g Jesus Christ ab wo em-mah g pi ha huhugetham si has elithadag mat hekith ia ep wo jiwia jewed thahm no pi heg wehsijj d t-nuhkuththam .
Ith ach ab ab t-gewpkathch ch hekaj am si s-t-mahch ch ahgachug .

K eda hegam s-chu i'attomkam pi ha'ichu am hu chegito hab masma mo g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch s-ko'okam has ahg hegai mo haschu pi amichuth . T g Jiosh wo ha hugio hab masma mamtp hems wo mua g ha'ichu thoakam .
D eda pi woho s-ha ho'ige'ith g sho'igkam ch wabshaba s-behimk g lial nadki pi s-chu ehsk ch chum nuhkuth g t-lialiga ch wabsh hejel hekaj .
Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo si pihk e elith g Jiosh ab t-wui ch ab si t-hemakojithch e wehm . Jiosh o ab si t-tatchua . Kuch s-mahch mach d a'aligaj nach pi ab a'ai si t-tatchua .
Kutsh ha'i hegam matsh wa e gantad matsh hekith i e muhkith g Steven gm hu ahgahi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga Phenicia ch Cyprus jejewed t am ch Antiok kihhim t am k hegam an wa'i ha mihshmath Tutuligo .
K wabshaba ith d s-wohokam s-t-kaisthag matt wo himath g s-ap'ekam ch wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath , chum achs pi ha'ichu wo edgithath .
Ab amtki hiwigi mat wo ha cheggia g Jiosh hemajkamga k wo ha gewito . Kumt ab ep mah g gewkthag am ha thahm g wehsko thakam hemajkam mo has i kaitham d neneoktham .
Ab o d t-wuikam g s-ko'ok namkithadag mattp hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam . Ttp wabshaba s-ap wo nako g sho'igthag am hab chum junihithch g s-ap'ekam , t g Jiosh ab wo wa s-t-ho'ige'el ith hekaj

Bash kaij g Jiosh matsh ab wo t-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k ab wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed . T g alithaj am i ap'ech ihtha wechij ha'ichu ahgaj t-wehhejed ahchim mo g Jiosh ab t-waith . Muhkigaj at am i t-wuwhas matt pi wo ai g t-namkithadag heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig ab wecho hegai heki hu apchutha .
Pegih , tp hems ha'i hab wo chei matt hig ba'ich am hab wo i junihith g pi ap'ekam . T g Jiosh ba'ich wo i s-t-ho'ige'el .

S-mahch am mat pi am hu wo i ha wahpki g Jiosh hegam mo hab wa masma . Hegai mat wo s-behim mo haschu pi ab hu d wuikamaj o heg jioshchuth .K pi hab chum mahs machs s-bihtagim wo neneokath o achs pehegi wo neneokath . Ab g wo ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh .

Nt ab i chum nei . Tki g s-kohmagi kawyu ab i wuhsh . Kuki hema cheshaj ch hab chehgig Muhki . Kuki ab si mia oithch him hegai mash hab e a'aga Jiawul Kih . Mtki ihtham ab ha mah g gewkthag am thahm g hemako tahpani mo gi'ikko e tahpanch ( ¼ ) ihtha jewed . Kutki ha koktha cheggiadag ch ed ch g bihugigkaj ch mumkithagkaj . Tki g mischini ha'ichu thoakam hab wa'ap ha'i wo ha koktha .

Pi at ahchim am wa'i i t-ap'ech g Jiosh mach wa an u'ukch g heki hu chehanigaj . Ahpim at am ep i em-ap'ech mamt hab wa'ap ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj . Batt masma am oithk hab t-juh g Abrahambad k ab hiwig g Jiosh hemajimatalig . Ith o heg wa wepo mo g Abrahambad d t-ohg . K g Jiosh heg hekaj am t-chehgithch mat has wo chum masmak .
T hegam Rome t ab haha'ichu ab ha'ichu ni-kakke k chum s-ni-thagitoimk nat pi pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh manis heg hekaj wo ni-muhkith .
K heg hekaj tasho mo s-ha ho'ige'ith heg wabsh hekaj mo hab ha elith . Pi at hedai heg wabsh hekaj wo nei g Jiosh ho'ige'ithadag mas haschu i tatchua ch haschu am hab juni him .
Am hu hebai ehp , sh ha'ijj wabsh chum hedai ha wehm wo'iwup . Tsh g Jiosh am ha'i ha cheha matsh wo ha koktha . Tsh gokko gamai waik mihl ( 23,000 ) e ko'ij hemako tash ed .
K wabshaba g pi ap'ekam an t-u'ukch ch hab t-wua mach ab wui gegok .
Gd hu i si wehpeg att am em-mashcha mamt gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh

Pi amt wo pi ap hab elithath mo d wabsh wechij o'othham ch wabshaba am wo i wehmt . T hab s-ap e taht k ab uhpam wo i hih . Si ani nenida mat ia ep wo jiwia hegam ha wehm mat am wehmaj wo hihi em-wui .
Pi o woho d Jiosh wohochuththam hegam mat pi hab wo junihith g tatchuij . Kut pi wo ha tho'ibia . Ha'ichu hab t-juni at wo t-wohokamch machs d wohochuththam .
D ha'ijj hab kaij g Jerusalem t am kihkam , “ Aha no hig pi woho d ihtha mam chum s-mu'amk .
T hab chei ihtha k ab t-thahm ihbheiwua k hab kaij , “ Ab g wo i beh'i g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag .
Jiosh at am i ap'ech matt has masma wo s-ap'ek am tahgio . K g ni-wehm o'othham wabsh s-ohhothamk g apchuthaj ch wabsh hejel am chum s-e apchuthamk
Kutt hedai ab wo s-wohoch g Jiosh alithag k wo si s-ap s-mahchk mo d wohokam . Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag at t-wehhejed wo wohokamch . Hegam mo pi wohochuth g Jiosh oki hab elith mo t-iattogith .

Nt wo si shel em-ahgi matp hedai ab wo s-ni-wohochuth k wo e nako mat hab wo junihith g s-hasig ha'ichu hab masma mani ahni , pej ba'ich i ge'e hab wo juh g s-hasig ha'ichu nant pi ahni hi wo hih am ni-ohg wui .
Ab g ha ahgith wabsh chum hedai ha-pionag mat ab wo kaihamath g e-ahmo ch pi ab hu wo ne'owinath
Am at wo i wah g bagatalig em-shahgith mamtp wo thagito g Jiosh hemajimatalig . Am g a'ai wo si e nuhkuthath mat pi hab wo e juh .
Heg amt am wo i kei mo chum hems g pi wohochuththam ab si has elith . T hab pi hedai ab hu ha'ichu wo chu'ichigch mas heg hekaj wo i wua g ge Jiawul .
Christ at wehsijj ab i t-mahkhi hegai matt hekaj ab a'ai wo i t-wehmajk .
Tki amjed g gokkokam anghil am hahawa epai iawua hegai mo wasibch an ge shuhthagi thahm . Tki g shuhthagi hab masma e eh'edch mo g muhki eh'ed . Tki wehs ha'ichu koi am ge shuhthagi ch ed .
