ch d wo piongajk . Pi amt hab wabsh wo junihith mas heg hekaj wo em-neithath g em-ahmo ch wo s-em-hohho'ithath ch wabshaba hab wo junihith wehs g e-ihbthagkaj , chum as hems pi am hu wo em-neithath . Ith o em-tatchuithch g Jiosh .

Kumt wabsh si s-ap e taht k wabsh s-hemajim ab wo ha ahgi . Ha'i atp hems pi ap has wo em-ahg k ab wo chum em-abch g pi ap'ekam k wabshaba wo si e el mamtp chum hekith am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam .
Kutsh pi ha shohbi g Herod k pi am hu has el g Jiosh . Tsh heg hekaj g anghil ab ab hab juh g mumkithag mat waptopad k muh .
T-kownalig Jesus Christ ohg o hab wa'ap d t-ohg Jiosh ch si s-hemajima ab t-wui . Wehs g i gewkemhunadag o ab amjed him . Kutt heg hekaj ab wo si i ho'ige'ithath .
Ha'i at thagito g e-wohochuthadag k hekaj wabsh ha wehm e ne'owin .

Wehs at wo ha tho'ibia g Jiosh hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ . Kuni heg hekaj wabsh si s-ap ni-tahtk ch am ahgachug . Tutuligo at wehpeg ab bei e-ap'ethag mat wo e tho'ibia k g gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa bei .
Shondaj o heki hu nahtois ch d Jesus Christ . Kumt pi haschukaj ab ep wo shondath .
K wabshaba hab wa'ap tasho mat g cheoj hemho wa ab wo si tatchuath g e-wehm kihkam hab masma mo ab si hejel e tatchua . T g uwi ab wo si has elithath g e-kun .

Neh , ahpim mam d gawul mahs hemajkam ch pi edgith g t-chehanig am wa si gawulkthas ab Jiosh t amjed heg hekaj pi ap e-chu'ichig . T wabshaba g Jiosh ab em-wui mahtchul g e-alithag . Kumt ab i s-wohochuth k hab bei g wechij thoakag . Jiosh alithag at ab nako g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag kots t ab k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig .

Neh , ha wanimedtham at was e ho'ige'ithahu m-wehhejed k ab m-taht . T wa hegam mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam am ah mat has mahs chikpan ab m-mah g Jiosh . Pegih , am g i e nakogath ch heg am hab wo junihith .
Ni hahawa ep neith g si wechij thahm kahchim ch si wechij jewed . Hegai wehpeg thahm kahchim ch wehpeg jewed at wa heb hu hihi . T g ge shuhthagi am wabsh i huhug .
Chum g hekith wo s-ap e tahtkkath .
Kutki heg oitham hetasp mashath ihtham hemajkam wo chum si s-ko'im k wabshaba pi wo koi .
Neh , ab at i wuhsh g Jesus muhkig amjed . Kuch s-wohochuth ihtha ch hekaj ab wui nenea mat g Jiosh ab ep wo i ha wuwhas hegam mat koi ab s-wohochuthch g ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g Jesus .
Wehsijj ach d a'aligaj g Jiosh matt hedai ab s-wohochuth k ah mo g Jesus d si alithaj .
Im g hu hab wo i juhni g pi ap e-tatchui . Heg o wa em-iattogith ch em-padchuth .

Heg ani wepo mo g kihjeg . Kahwal o am wapke kolhai ch ed . K pi ha'ichu has e wua am ha tahgio . Kumt ahpim ab wo s-ni-wohochuth k hab wa'ap wo e tho'ibia . Kahwal o ab mahks g s-kehg ha'ichu hugi . Kum ahpim ab ep mahks mam haschu i tatchua .

Ha'ijj amtsh wa ha ma'ichshulig k ha'ijj an ha eda si ha hikuch k ha'ijj g is-pahyokaj am ha koktha . Mu'ijj ash sha'i si sho'ig ch wabsh g ha'ichu thoakam e'elithagkaj e e'enigadathch . Msh wa mu'i ha sho'igchuth ch pi ab hu ap ha neith .
Tho hekia s-ap'ekam g Jiosh . Kumt heg hekaj wo s-mahchk mamtp hedai hab junihim g s-ap'ekam ch d a'aligaj .

Bo wa masma am t-chehanig Jiosh . An o o'ohanas mash hab kaij : Am ant i em-gawulkai mamt am wo i ha tashogi g ha'ichu ni-ahga g nahnko mahs hemajkam wehsko jewed thahm . T ab em-amjed wo s-mai mat has masma wo e tho'ibia .
Pi ach hab wua g s-a'agi ha'ichu ch pi ha iattogith ch pi am hu gawul wua g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Jiosh o s-mahch mach am ahg g wohokam ch am i t-nakog matt wo s-ap'ek am hemajkam ha-nena ed .

Jiosh at am i wahkith k an kei si e-hugith an . Kut ab bei g ap'ethag k cheha g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat ab t-wui wo hih . Heki ash hu hab kaij g Jiosh mat hab wo e juh . K d ihtha mam am neith ch kah hemuch mat hab t-juni .
Ab amt i e thagito Jiosh wui . T heg ab em-mah g wechij thoakag k em-tatchuith mamt wo wepo masmak ch ab wo s-ap s-mahchk .

D am i kah g ha-ahga g Jesus k am t-ahgith , “ Lazarus ash mumku . K wabshaba pi hab d ahga mat gm hu hab wo i e juh . Nt wo tho'ibia mamt hekaj ab wo ihm g Jiosh . T g Jiosh heg hekaj ab epai wo ni-ihm . ”

Jiosh ha'ichu ahga o am t-tashogithch mat hedai g Jiosh am wo i ap'ech e wehhejed . An o o'ohadag : Am at wo i ha ap'ech g Jiosh e wehhejed hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj . Kut hegam wo wa'i bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag .

D am hab hahawa e juh g ha-tatchui mamt ab ha mah g Jesus . D gm hu i wanim . D g Jesus am kushwiot g hejel e-kots . Kuchd am thatha amai mo am e koktha . Bach a'aga amai Golgotha mo hab d ahga Koshwak .

Am g wo hekaj g e-gewkthag a'ai e wehhejed hab masma mo g Jiosh am ap'echuthch mamt hab wo e juh . Ha'i o ab em-mahkch g gewkthag mamt am wo ahgahith g ha'ichu ahgaj . Kumt ab wo s-wohochuthath ch wo ahgahith .
K hema hab sha mahs mo g mawith . K hema hab ep mahs mo g wisilo . K hema g wuhioshaj hab mahs mo g o'othham wuhiosha . K hema hab mahs mo g ba'ag ch an tha'a .
Am g wo si s-e nen'oithk mamt has masma wo himchuthath g e-thoakthag ch pi hab wo masmak mam d wabsh pi ha'ichu a'amichuththam .
Pi o ahchim wa'i Tutuligo hab t-ahg . Wehs hemajkam o d ha-kownalig g Jiosh ch wehsijj s-ba'ama ab wo s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mat ab wo tahnith .
ab s-wohog elithch g Jiosh chehanig . K wabshaba g Jiosh am t-chehgithch matt ab wabsh wo i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj k ab wo i hiwigi g Christ . T heg am wo i t-ap'ech am tahgio .
Pi g wo sha'i e kudut heg hekaj mam haschu i chum tatchua k ab wabsh wo i tai g Jiosh k ab wo i ho'ige'el matp haschu hab wo i t-juni .
Pegih , wehs ihtha o d wabsh chehgitha mat wo t-shohbi matt pi ab hu wo i tatchua g pi ap'ekam mash wa hab e wua ihtham
Kutki ihtha hu'u am kuhpi'o hegai wag . Tki g kuhbs hab masma ab i wuhsh mo ab amjed g si ge'e nahthakud . Kutki g tash tonlig wabsh wehsko chuku heg hekaj kuhbs ab amjed g wag .
k hab pi ab hu hedai wui pi ap has wo chu'i . Heki ach hu am em-ahgith mat g Jiosh s-ko'okam wo ha namkith matp hedai am hab wo juh ihtha pi ap'ekam .
Tho si wechij thoakam matp hedai ab i e hemakoj g Christ wehm . Im at hu hab i e juh g hekiukam ha'ichu . T g wechij ha'ichu ab i wuhsh .
Ni-ohg o ab si pihk ni-elith ch am ni-chehgith mant has wo chum juni . T ab wo ni-mah g gewkthag mant ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu hab wo juh mo ihtha . Mt ab wabsh wo i haha'athka .
T wo ha'asa ha'ichu ha ehs hegam matp hedai ha'ichu ha ehsith . Ab o hab wa'ap ha ab mat wo chikpanath ch heg amjed ab wo edgithath mat haschukaj am wo i ha wehmt g sho'igkam .
Jiosh at ab wo kaiha g em-ho'ige'ithahuna k ab wo i ni-wuhshath ab amjed g kukpaikud . Nt am ep wo i em-chehgim . Kumt heg hekaj am wo i ap'ech g kih ni-wehhejed .

Kumt pi wo sha'i hiwigi mas g gawul mahs mashchama im hu hab wo i em-juh ab amjed g s-ap'ekam himthag . Ha'i o an u'ukch g heki hu t-himthag chehanig hab e elithch mat hab masma wo i gewkai g e-wohochuthadag . T wabshaba ith pi wo sha'i i ha wehmt . An att wo u'ukchith g Jiosh hemajimatalig . Bat wa masma wo i gewka g t-wohochuthadag .
Ab ach si em-tahni mamt s-ap ab wo ha neithath g e-wanimedtham ch hegam mo am em-mashcham ch ab shohbithch g pi ap'ekam em-shahgith . Tho Jiosh hab elitha mo hab wua .

Hegam haha'ichu ad wa am heki hu ap'ech mat pi wo ha hiwigi mat am hu ep wo i wahp cheopi ch ed hegam mat hedam hab wo chei mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha . D heg hekaj s-ha ehbith g ge'egedgaj ch hab kaij mat ab wo kakke , t hejel am wo e ah .

Pi am tatchua mamt wo e pahl hikuch hab masma mo heki hu chehanis matt ahchim Tutuligo hab wo t-juh . Jiosh at heki hu i em-ap'ech e wehhejed namt pi ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k ab i hiw g Jesus Christ . K ith heg wa wepo mam pahl hikuchkas . Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o ab t-mahkch g gewkthag ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Kuch hekaj ab si ihm g Jiosh ch ab si has elith g Jesus Christ ch pi ab hu sha'i hejel t-hiwig machs am oithk hab wo t-juh g chehanig k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia .
K ith d chehanigaj g Jiosh matt ab wo s-wohochuthath g alithaj ch ab a'ai t-wui wo si pihk t-elithath mo hab masma t-chehani g alithaj .

Ni hahawa ep neith matki ab hema ep i wuhsh gd hu jewed wecho amjed . Ith o hab wa'ap mahs mo g s-ta ehbithamakam ha'ichu thoakam ch ge gohk a'ag hab sha masma mo g kahwal a'ag ch hab masma neok mo g nehbig hujud .

A'alkaj am hab e junihim , ni-wepnag , ab si ha'ichuchuthch ihtha al mahkigdag ch heg hekaj ab si e haschuth . Am g wabsh wo thagito ihtha pi ap'ekam . Neh , a'al o pi mahch g pi ap'ekam . Kumt hab wa'i masma hab wo masmak mo g a'al mamt pi wo mahchk g pi ap'ekam .
Nam am hu ha'i ha'ichukaj i e kudut ? Pegih , e g wo ho'ige'ithahun . Nam ha'i s-hehgig ? Pegih , ab g wo si hehgchulith g Jiosh g nen'eikaj .
Mt hekaj ab wo si e gewpkai Jiosh wui k wo s-gegokim gegokiwua .
Bam masma ihm g Jiosh ab e ho'ige'ithahunch wui mo d em-ohg . Kut heg wehs wo ha a'appe . Pegih , mt ab wo si has elithath chum hekith mamt he'es i tash ia d wo thothakamk .
Bamt wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui ch wo s-chu nakogath . T g Jiosh am hab wo em-juni mash haschu hab s-em-junimk .
T-wohochuthadag o hab d ahga mach s-mahch mo woho hegai mach am wui t-gewpkathch , chum achs hems pi t-wuhpuikaj neith .
Pi g am hu ha oithk hab wo masmak hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh . Ith o d t-kownalig Jesus chehanig . Hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh o wabsh pehegi ha'ichu chegito

Jiosh ash wa hab masma ha chehani g Tutuligo mat am wa has mahs ha'ichu hugi wo ko'ath ch am hab wo junihith g mihshmetha piast . Ihtham chehanig o am chum t-tashogithahim mat has wo masmak g Jiosh si Kehsha mat hekith wo jiwia . T wabshaba ia hahawa jiwia g Jiosh si Kehsha k am hejel i e tashogi t-wui . K hahawa pi hab mahs machs am hab wo junihith hegai hab mahs ha'ichu k ch hekaj wo chum s-mahchk g Jiosh si Kehsha .
Heg o hekaj ia gegok Jiosh ba'ich ch ab ihm wehs tashkaj ch s-chuhugam oithk . Kut g Jiosh wo ha nuhkuthath chum hekith .
T wabshaba g Paul am i huduni k an si kohm k hab kaij , “ Pi g am wo has e tahtkkath . Tho thoakam . ”

Am ani wabsh i ni-thagitokch mantp haschu ab wo i nako ha wehhejed hegam mat g Jiosh am i ap'ech mat wo e tho'ibia . Ihtham at ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Jesus Christ . T g Jiosh chum hekith ab wo si has ha elithath .
Ab g wo a'ai si e ihmath , ahpim e wehm wohochuththam . Ab at wo wa ba'ich i em-mah g Jiosh g s-ap tahhathkam .
Ab g a'ai wo i e thagito e wui mamtp woho ab si has elith g Christ .
Am am wa heki hu s-mahch wehs ihtha , ni-wepnag . Hegam mat pi ab hu wo wohog elithath g Jiosh at gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed . Kumt wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi am hu ha oithk hab wo e junihith .
Ahpim u'uwi mam ab ihm g Christ amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-wehm kihkam . Bo masma em-tatchuith g Jiosh .
Am apt hemajkam ha kailith k wo si s-ha keh'el hegam mat hedam pi gm hu wo thagito g pi ap'ekam . T hab masma wo s-e gihugath ha'i ehp .
Pegih , mt hig wo ha'asa a'ai has e ahgath . Ith amt am hab wo elithath mamt pi am hu wabsh has wo e wuath . T hekaj pi wo heki hih g em-wehm wohochuththam o am wo gei pi ap'ekam ch ed .

T g Jiosh ab wo si t-ha'ichuch ahchim mach hab junihim g s-ap'ekam k ab wo t-mah g has elithadag ch s-ap tahhathkam . Ahchim Tutuligo att wehpeg bei ihtha s-ap'ekam . Mt wabshaba ahpim gawul mahs hemajkam ab hahawa bei .
ch ab amjed mam chum s-ha kokthaimk g meikaj ch is-pahyokaj . Tho wabsh o'othham ch eda ab bei g ge'e gewkthag k am s-chechojim ha gewito g e-obga ab a'ai jejewed amjed .

Pi ant hahawa ha'ichukaj wo sha'i ni-kudu nani pi ab s-babaliwuani heg amjed mat g Jiosh alithag obga mu'ikko ni-gewittan k ni-ma'ikka . Heg o wa wepo mant ni-nakpi mani d piongaj g t-kownalig Jesus .

Kut am hahawa hema i e chehgi g si s-gewk anghil k am hema bei g hothai . Ihtha hothai oki ha'as ge'ej mo g si ge'e chu'ikud . T g anghil am tha'ich ge shuhthagi ch ed k hab kaij : “ Bat masma am wo si e tha'ich ihtha ge'e kihhim mat pi hekith hedai ep wo neithath .
Tho si hekia s-ap'ekam g t-wohochuthadag . Kumt heg ab ba'ich i s-wihnam wo e u'ukchith . T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo em-mahkchith g gewkthag mamt hekaj am wo neneokath Jiosh wui .

Pi g am hu ha oithch hab wo masmak hegam mo pi ab hu ihm g Jiosh ch wabshaba ab wo i e thagito Jiosh wui . T heg am gawul wo juh g em-chegitoithag . T hab wehs wo i e wechijith g em-thoakag . Bamt wa'i masma wo s-mahchk mo haschu d Jiosh tatchui . K heg d wa'i si hekia s-ap'ekam .
Pi g wo sha'i si pihk e elithath heg ab mo d wabsh jewed t ab ha'ichu . Hegam matp hedai wo si pihk e elithath ith ab ha'ichu at pi wo sha'i pihk e elithath ab Jiosh wui .

Na'ams ha'ijj ahpim hab kaij “ Hah , sho'o wa'i si pi ap d hehemajkam hegam map am ha a'aga k ch hemho wa wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag , ” ch amtp eda hems hab wa'ap junihim ihtha . Neh , m wabsh hejel e-ne'okikaj ab e mohto'ith g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag .

Bamki ha elith hegam James ch Peter ch John mo d ha wanimedtham . T ihtham am wohokamch mat g Jiosh ab ni-mah ihtha chikpan k t-nowi-bebhe . Kutt am i t-ap'ech ab t-wui mat hegam am wo ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga Tutuligo hemajkam ha wui . Nt ahni hi g Barnabas wehm gawul mahs hemajkam ha wui wo ahgachugath .
D hegam shonthal mad am naggia g Jesus d gi'ik ch hekaj am gi'ikpa e tahpath g Jesus wepschuga . K am hema d si s-namkig ha'ichu eniga ch pi hebai ha shohmas .
k ch eda pi hejel am hu hab wua g e-mashchama . Ha'ijj o ha mihshmath mat pi hedai ha'ichu wo ha ehsithath
Mt wo chum s-mahchk mo g Jiosh ab em-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . K heg am em-eda kih . Pegih , k d cheopigaj g em-honshpadag ch pi d wabsh hejel em-eniga .
E at muhkith g Christ wehs t-wehhejed no pi ab si t-tatchua . Kuch hekaj ab aigo si tatchua ch hemho wa am hab s-junimk g tatchuij . Ith o heg wa wepo matt ahchim wehmaj koi
Pegih , ni-wehm wohochuththam , ab at i em-gawulkai g Jiosh gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag Jesus . Heg o d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d uhgchu t-pahlig . Kumt wo oithahith mo has chu'ig .

Ni hab wa masma am em-chehgith mamt wo i ha wehmt hegam mo pi e amichuth . T-kownalig Jesus o hab kaij , ‘ T wo s-em-hehgigch hegai mat ab wo ha'ichu em-mah . Mt wabshaba ba'ich wo i s-hehgigk mamt ab wo ha'ichu ha mah . ’ Kumt ith wo s-chegitok mo has i kaij . ”
Ab amt wo si has elithath g hohnta ch wo si e nuhkuth a'ai e wehhejed . Jiosh at ab wo ha mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag hegam mat pi wo e nuhkuth ch hegam mat wo ha ehs g ha-wehm kihkam .
Nid am i koachsh k nei mo am wehch hegai s-kehg ikus k wabshaba pi am hu i wah .

Tki am si tohonno g wepgi k am si kokp g tataniki . Tki g jewed si s-gewkam u'ugij . Pi oki hekith hab sha'i masma u'ugij g jewed am i amjed mat an e nahto g o'othham . Ith oki d si ge'e jewed u'ugij mo pi hebai hab sha'i masma .

Kunt am hahawa si i gei wecho k ab si has i el . K wabshaba hab kaij ab ni-wui , “ Pi g hab masma ab si has ni-elith mani d Jiosh . Ab g si ihm g Jiosh . Thani wabsh piongaj hab masma mam ahpim mam ab s-wohochuth hegai wohokam mat g Jesus am i em-tashogi . ” Neh , bo kaij g anghil . K ihtha wohokam d hegai mo ab amjed an u'ukch g e-amichuthadag g Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam .
Jiosh ha'ichu hab elitha o pi ta machima am t-wehhejed . K wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wehs s-mahch ch am i t-tashogith .
Kumt ab wo si has el nat pi pi huwi g e-thoakag mat hab wo juh g Christ tatchui k wo i ni-wehmt em-wehhejed .
Ahpim a'al amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-jehj chum hekith . Ith o d tatchuij g Jiosh .
Jiosh o si s-hemajim ab t-mahkch g gewkthag . Kuch heg hekaj si s-ap himchuth g t-thoakag ith thahm jewed ch pi ha'ichu sha'i em-iattogith ch hab pi t-kudut . Ith o ab t-mahkch g s-ap tahhathkam .
“ Am o e chehgith mo ab si ni-tatchua hegam matp hedai ab wo bei g ni-chehanig k hab wo junihith . Kunt ab ha wui wo si pihk ni-elithath g ni-ohg wehm ch ab ha wui wo i ni-tashogi . ”

o pi woho d ha'ichu amichuthadag . Bo em-ahgith mamt heg oithk wo e mihshmethath ch wo e sho'igchuthath ch hab ab wo e sho'igchuthath Jiosh wui . T wabshaba ith pi wo sha'i thotholimagi g pi ap em-tatchui .
Ihtham mat ia thatha o t-ahgith mapsh si pihk e elith ha hekaj . Kuni ab si i m-gewkemhun mapt ba'ich wo i ha wehmajk mat gm hu hasko ep wo i ahgachugath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga .
Bant ep wo chei mapt pi wo ha ne'owi hegam mat wabsh wo has hu kaijjith ch pi e mahch ch e ne'owin . S-mahch ap mat ith am wabsh wo ha u'apa kawhaina ch ed .

Pi o ab hu ma'ishpi g t-amichuthadag ahchim mach ab ihm g Christ . Kuch ab wui nea ch ab chehgithch g gewkthaj ch tonligaj hab sha masma mo g neithakud . K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am si gawul t-junihim . Tt hekaj ba'ich wo i wepo masmak g Christ .

Pegih , t ba'ich i ge'e ha'ichu hab t-juni g Christ mat am i e thagito Jiosh wui k am t-wehhejed e muhkith . Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o wa ab mahkch g gewkthag mat hab juh . K d hekia s-ap'ekam iagchulitha . Heki achd hu t-kudut heg hekaj pi ap t-chu'ichig . T wabshaba g Christ am iagchul g e-eh'ed Jiosh wui mat am wo i t-ap'ech . Kuch am hahawa g Jiosh wehhejed chikpan .

Neh , t ith amjed am si i e tashogi mat g Jiosh ab ha mah hegam gawul mahs hemajkam hegai mahkigdag mat ahchim ab t-mah mat hekith ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g t-kownalig Jesus Christ . Kunt pi has masma am hu wo sha'i kuh g Jiosh ith amjed . ” Neh , bash kaij g Peter .
Pi g am wo pi ap tahtchuth g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Tho hegai mo am t-eda ulinig . Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mat g Jiosh s-ap am wo i t-wahpki e-kihthag ed .

Am g wo s-chegitok mam wa haschu ab em-mashcham k ab wo i s-wohog elith k gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi . Kumtp pi wo sha nehnen , nt s-a'agi ia wo jiwia hab sha masma mo g s-chu ehskam . Kumt pi wo sha'i mahchk g ohla mant hekith wo i jiwia .

Ha'i o hab kaij mamt d wo s-ap'ekamk , chum hems pi am hu hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam . S-e g wo nen'oithk mat pi wo em-iattogi . Jesus o am t-chehgithch g hejel e-thoakagkaj matp hedai d wo s-ap'ekamk ch am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam .

Mu'i at an i wuwhag k hab chum e wua mo d ha mihshmaththam . K eda pi ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Kumt heg hekaj pi wabsh chum hedai ab wo s-ha wohochuth k ho'ip ha a'appe mas woho ha wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag .
Pegih , ni-wepnag , ith amt hekaj wo chum s-mahchk mat g Jiosh gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig
Mt wabsh wo si s-hehgigk mo d em-kownalig g Jesus Christ . Pi ani has sha'i ni-tahtk mant am ep em-o'ohani hegai mant wa heki hu em-o'ohani . Kut ith d wo i em-wehmtadagk .

Matp hema d wo bihugimkamk ch wo e gegos ab e-kih ab mat koi wo e ai g em-namki . Mt am hahawa pi heg hekaj ab hu wo e chu'ichigch . Am ant haha wo i ap'ech mam haschu ab ep i ni-kakke hekith i em-neithk .

D hab kaij g Pilate , “ Pegih , mt ahpim wo be k ab wo mah g s-ko'ok namkithadag mo has i mahs g em-himthag chehanig . ” D hab kaij g Tutuligo , “ Pegih , bo mahs g t-himthag chehanig mat wo e mua heg hekaj pi ap e-chu'ichig . K eda pi t-hiwgith g ge'e kownal ab Rome t ab machs hab wo juh . Tt heg hekaj ia u'apa mapt ahpi am hab wo juh . ”
K wabshaba ha'i ihtham mahkigdag ba'ich d i ha wehmtadag g t-wehm wohochuththam . Kutt heg hekaj ba'ich wo i tatchua matt wo hekaj hegam . K eda g pihk elithadag wehs ba'ich d i si ha'ichu .
Tatchua ach g si s-ap uhgchu pahl . K g Jesus woho hab masma ch d hekia s-ap'ekam ch i e gawulkathch ab ha amjed g pi ap'ekam . Ithani o an thaha Jiosh wehm an thahm kahchim ch ed .
Jesus Christ o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag . Nt heg hekaj wo ni-nako mant s-ap am hab wo junihith g Jiosh tatchui .
Jiosh o em-tatchuith mamt ab wo si i e gawulkai pi ap'ekam amjed k wo si e nuhkuth g hejel e-wehm kihkam wehhejed .
Ahpim wehs g chum hekith wo e ho'ige'ithahunath ch ab ep wo i ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh .
“ Tsh am i kah g Mosesbad ihtha k ha hekaj gm hu i e mehkoth ab Egypt amjed k gm hu i jiwia mash am d Midian jewed . Sh am ha'i o'othhamag . Kutsh am ha hohnt k gohk chechoj a'alitht

Kumt ahpim chechoj pi ab hu wo ha ma'ishchith g e-mohmi e mihshmathch no pi g Jiosh am t-eda chehgithch g e-gewkthag . Mt wabshaba ahpim u'uwi ab wo e ma'ishchith nam pi ab wecho g chechoj ch ab chehgithch g ha-gewkthag .
Christ o ab em-makiog g s-ap tahhathkam . Ab g wo i ho'ige'ithath heg hekaj ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui nam pi d hemako heg wehm hab sha masma mam d honshpadaj .

Wehs ha'ichu o d Jiosh nahtoi ch wehhejed an hab chu'ig . T heg si s-hemajim am i ap'ech mat g Jesus wo e sho'igchuth k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia matt d wo a'aligajk ch am hahawa chum hekith wo wehmajk si s-kehg kihthaj ed . Jiosh hab elitha o wehs s-ap'e .
Ha'ijj amsh am a'ai e kam'on ch e cheggia mam eda d chum e tho'ibiakam . Nt wo em-ahgi mam hab masma hab e wua nam pi ha'ichu s-behimk mo pi ab hu d em-wuikam
Am ash ha'ichu hab ep chu'ig em-shahgith ch d si ge'e pi ap'ekam . Msh eda si e hahaschuth . Hema ash wabsh hohnig g e-ohgbad hohnig . Eda chump g Jiosh pi wohochuththam pi hab sha'i masma .

Wehs hegai a'appema mo ab t-aihim o chum hedai ab a'ahe . K wabshaba g Jiosh hab kaij matsh wo t-nuhkuthath ch heg hekaj pi hiwgith mas wo t-a'appe am thahm matt he'es wo i t-nako ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag matt wo nakog k wo t-tho'ibia heg amjed .
Ab at ha'i wo i wahp em-shahgith mat hab masma wo s-ta ehbithamak am em-wehhejed mo g sheh'e am ha wehhejed g kahwal k wo chum s-em-u'im .

Kuch heg hekaj si s-ap t-tahtk ch wehsko ha ahgithahim g t-wehm wohochuththam ab em-amjed . Msh am em-sho'igchuth nam pi ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh . Kumsh eda s-ap ab nakog g e-sho'igthag am wehhejed g Jiosh .
Pi ach hedai hekith sha'i neith g Jiosh g t-wuhpuikaj . K wabshaba heg ab t-mahkch g si ge'e pihk elithadag . Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo t-wehmaj .
Ni-wepnag mam am kih Galasia jewed ch ed : Am ant wo i em-o'ohani ahni Paul mat g Jesus Christ am i ni-kei g e-ohg Jiosh wehm .
Mu'i ha'ichu at ab nako g Jesus k ab ep nako g keh'ithadag ab ah amjed g pi ap hemajkam . Pegih , mt ahpim am hab wa'ap wo si e nakog k pi wo sha'i ha'asa .
Ab att i t-hemakoj heg wehm mat am t-wehhejed muh . Kut hekaj ab t-mah g wechij thoakag . Ith o wepo masma matt am wehmaj ko'o k wehmaj ep t-chechegito .
K an hab ep chu'ig : Ahpim amt ep wo s-hehgigk gawul mahs hemajkam t-wehm ahchim Tutuligo .

Si o tasho am i ni-tashogith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat ab wo i e ai g tash mat mu'i wo thagito g e-wohochuthadag . Ha'i at wo ha mashcha g iattogi nat pi g jijawul wo i ha wahmuth . T mu'i hemajkam ab wo ha wohog el .

Pt am wo ha ahgithath g wohochuththam mat has wo chum masmak . T wo s-ha wohog elithath g e-kokownalig ch am oithk hab wo e junihith g chehanig ch chum hekith wo e nahtokchith mat wo s-ap chikpanath ch hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam .
Ihtham o hab s-e junimk mo pi mahch mo ith d wohokam matsh wa g Jiosh am neok k am nahto g thahm kahchim ch jewed . Ihtha jewed atsh ab i wuhsh shuhthagi t amjed k g shuhthagikaj e nahto .

Jesus Christ o d hekia s-ap'ekam ch wa eda e sho'igch . Pegih , tt ahchim hab wa'ap wo t-sho'igch . E at muhkith g Jesus Christ am t-wehhejed ahchim mach d pi ap chu'ijkam mat am wo i t-ui Jiosh wui . Chuhkugaj amt hi wa chum mua . T wabshaba g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ba'ich i mah g gewkthag .
Ab o ha mahkch g Jiosh g ha'ichu e-ahga . K wabshaba ba'ich i s-ap'e mat hems pi wo kah matp wabsh gm hu wo s-ohhoth .

Heki ach hu em-mashcham mamt wo s-wapagimak . K eda ha'i hegam mo d wohochuththam s-papadma ch pi am hu oithch hab e junihim g t-mashchama . Ch ab em-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus Christ gewkthagkaj mamt pi am hu wo ha wehmajk .

Ab atsh ha'ichu cheha g Jiosh hegai mo d wehpeg o'othham ch hab chehgig Adam . Tsh heg mulin k hab i shonwuich g pi ap'ekam jewed thahm . Tsh hekaj am i shonwua muhkig . Tsh g Jiosh pi hab ep juh g chehanig am hugkam matsh an i wuhsh g Mosesbad . Sh eda wehsijj hab wua g pi ap'ekam . Kush heg hekaj g muhkig wehsijj ab ha a'ahe , chum as pi mulin g chehanig hab masma matsh wa g Adambad . Jiosh oki am ha'ichu t-chehgithch ab amjed g Christ ith hekaj Adambad .

Jiosh ash wa hab ha ahg matsh haschu hab wo juh . Kutsh ab i s-wohochuth k hab e juh . Ha'ijj atsh g nahnko mahs jejewed ha gewito k hab wua g s-ap'ekam . Tsh g Jiosh ab ha mah mash haschu ha ahgith mat ab wo ha mah . Ha'i atsh wa e tho'ibia ab ha amjed g maipith
Mu'ikko am t-sho'igchuth . K wabshaba g Jiosh chum hekith t-wehmaj . Hebai am hi wa chum si s-ko'okam has t-wua . Ch wabshaba pi t-ko'ijith .
Ha'ijj am tatchua g pi ap'ekam ch hekaj d obgaj g Jiosh .

Tsh am gahi wuwha g Phrygia jewed ch Galasia jewed ihtham Paul k am ahgahim g ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Jesus . Tsh wabshaba pi ha hiwigi g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mas am wo i ahgahi am Asia jewed ch ed .

K oi wa tasho mat pi hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wehs wo himath . K eda in ha'ichug g tho'ibiathag ahga . Kush heg hekaj hab kaij g Jiosh matt ab wabsh wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo i hiwigi . Kut am wo i t-ap'ech hejel e tahgio . An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed : Pi g hab wo i e ahgi mat hedai am wo em-behijitham g tho'ibiathag thahm kahchim wui .

Tki g wehpegkam anghil am him k am iawua an thahm g jewed hegai mo wasibch e-hoas-ha'a ch ed . Kutki g si s-ko'ok ch s-ta ehbithama hihiwthag ha ai hegam mo ab ha ab hab chu'ig g s-ta Ehbithamakam cheposig ch ihtham mat i shul ab wui g wepogithaj .

T ha hekaj ab wui i shul hegam gi'ik ha'ichu thoakam ch hegam gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged . K ihtham wehsijj ge ahlipa ch ohla hohas-haha'a . K hegam ha eda hohas-haha'a s-ap uhw shuhthagi ch ith d ha-ho'ige'ithahuna g Jiosh hemajkamga .
Thach Jiosh a'aliga wehsijj ahchim mach s-wohochuth mo g Jesus d alithaj g Jiosh ch d si Kehshaj . Kutt ab a'ai wo si t-tatchuath nach pi d t-wepngam . K g Jiosh d t-ohg .
Pi att wo ge t-haschuthath ch pi a'ai wo t-kudutath ch pi wo chu hehgamk .

Pi g ab wabsh si chehmoth g keli o'othham k wabshaba ab wabsh wo s-ap ha'ichu kakke hab masma mapt g hejel e-ohg hab chum masma hab wo juhkchith . Wechij o'othham apt hab masma ab wo ha neithath mo d m-wepnag .

k wabshaba hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam . T hab wo nei g s-ap ha'ichu hab em-juni hegam matp hedai ab ha'ichu em-abchuth . T ab wo i e ai g ge'e lothaita tash . T ihtham hemho wa wo wohokamch mat g Jiosh si s-kehg ha'ichu hab juh am em-thoakag ed .
Ha anid sho'igchuth hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus Christ nani pi hab ha elith mo ab wui gegok g t-chehanig . Neh , banid wa masma hab ni-wua ch hekaj hab ni-elith mani pi ha chu'ichig .
Sh am hahawa ha kakke , “ He'ekia ohla k ed at ab i ap'etahi . ” Sh hab kaij g piongaj , “ Tho i hemako ohla tako mat jumal gei g s-tonjig ab ab . ”

D am e nakog g hemajkam mat wo e mihshmath nat pi g ba'ich tash d wo shahwaik ch d wo ge'e tashk . Kutsh g haha'ichu ab kakke g Pilate mat wo e ohmi g ha-kakhio hegam mad am nahngia . T hab wo e oiwigi g ha-muhkig mat gm hu wo i e u'u k pi ab wabsh wo kia nahngiak t-mihshmetha tash ed , wahm mat ith d wo si ge'e t-tashgak .

D am i kah g Pilate ihtha k am ep i wuhsh ha wui k am chum si e nako mat wo thagito . D wabshaba si s-babgam hihnk hegam haha'ichu ch hab kaij , “ Neh'e , ihtha hemajkam o hab e ahg mo d si ge'e kownal ch heg hekaj ab wui kehk hegai mo d si ge'e kownal ch ab Rome t ab . Kupki ahpi hab wa'ap ab wui kehk g si ge'e kownal mapt wo sha thagito ihtha . ”
D hab ep kaij g Jesus , “ Pi g wo sha'i e kudut . Ab g wabsh i s-wohochuth mo an ha'ichug g Jiosh k ahni ab ep wo i s-ni-wohoch mani d si Kehshaj .
Pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath hegam mo ab em-wui gegok . T heg amjed wo s-mahchk mat ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag . Mt ahpim ab wo bei g e-tho'ibiathag ab amjed g Jiosh .

Pi amt hejel e elith k am wo i gegokiwua ni-wehhejed . Ahni ant am i em-chuhcha mamt am wo hihim k hab wo juh g ge'e chikpan . Kut pi hekith wo huhug hegai mamt hab wo juh . T g ni-ohg am hab wo em-juni mamtp haschu ab wo i tai am ni-chehchegch .

Hema ash wa hab chehgig Abel ch ash ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch hekaj ab s-wohog elith k ab wui iagchul g ha'ichu thoakam e-mu'a . Tsh wabshaba g wehngajbad Cain pi hab masma hab e juh . Tsh g Jiosh ab si s-hohho'i g Abelbad natsh pi hab juh g tatchuij . Ith ach an ne'okchulith Jiosh o'ohana ed . K ith heg wa wepo mo g Abelbad am wabsh kia neok ch am ha'ichu t-ahgith .
Thach wabsh piongaj g Christ . K heg t-nuhkuthachuth matt am wo i tashogi g s-a'agi ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh . Kumt hab masma wo s-t-mahchk .
Tki g huhu'u i shul ab thahm kahchim amjed an jewed thahm hab sha masma mat g pi bakam suhna wo i shul ab e-jehj amjed mat g s-gewk hewel wo si u'ugij .
Pegih , ni-wepnag mani si em-tatchua , pi g ab hu wui wo sha'i e ho'ige'ithahunath hegai mo haschu pi d Jiosh .
T wo t-gehg g pi ap'ekam mattp wo hejel t-agwua . Kutt wabshaba wo gehg g pi ap'ekam mattp ab wo namkith g s-ap'ekamkaj .
Am g i ha chegitochuth ihtha mani wa m-ahgith k ab ha shohbith g Jiosh gewkthagkaj mat pi wabsh pehegi wo neneokath ch pi wo e cheggiath . Ith at wo ha padch hegam mat wo kaiha .

Ab g wo i miabith g Jiosh . Kut ab aigo epai wo i em-miabi . Am g wabsh wo thagito g pi ap ha'ichu hab e-juni ahpim mam ge gohkpa chegito mamtp woho wo s-kaim g Jiosh . T g Jiosh wo i ap'ech g em-thoakag .
Mt wo melchkwuhith g Jiosh chehanig mamtp ab a'ai wo i ha ga'agwulkathath g hemajkam ab ha neithch mo has i mahs .
Jiosh at pi hab ahgk ab i t-gawulkai machs am hab wo junihith g s-uam ha'ichu . Tho tatchuij matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekamk .

Ab o t-wui i e tashogith g Jiosh . K wabshaba mu'i hemajkam gm hu hab i juhkch ch hab junihim g pi ap'ekam . K ihtha pi ap'ekam an kuhpahim mat wo s-e mai g wohokam . T g Jiosh heg hekaj s-ko'okam wo ha namkith .
Ab att wo chum si pihk t-elithath a'ai t-wui no pi g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g pihk elithadag . Mamtp woho wo s-mahchk g Jiosh ch d a'aligaj ch wo si pihk e elithath .
Am o wabsh kia him s-chuhugam k ed matp hedai s-keh'ith g e-wehnag , chum as hab wo kaijjith mo hab wua g s-ap'ekam .
Mtp hems s-ko'okam has wo em-ahgath nam pi ab si ihm g Christ . Kumt wabshaba wo si s-ap e tahtkkath no pi am em-wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag .
T g Paul ab wehs i ha ho'ige'ith k am hahawa si s-ap ha ahgith wehs ha'ichu mat g Jiosh s-kehg am hab juh am gahi wuhshanim am ha shahgith g gawul mahs hemajkam .
Neh , namt hig wo e nako mamt am wo wohokamch mas haschu d i pi ap ni-chu'ichig ? Pegih , ab o em-ab mamt ab wo s-ni-wohoch nani pi em-ahgith g wohokam .
K hab ep kaij : Am ant hu wo pi chegito g pi ap ha-chu'ichig k pi thahm am hu ep wo sha'i i chegito .
M heg hekaj s-mahch mo haschu s-ap'e ch s-ap ha'ichu am hab junihim ch s-ap ha'ichu k amjed neneok .

Tham ni-wehm wohochuththam g t-kownalig Jesus Christ . K g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab em-mahkch g gewkthag mamt wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam . Kuni heg hekaj ab em-tahni mamt ab wo si e sho'igch Jiosh wui
D ab si neneok g hemajkam ch hab kaij , “ P haschu ahgch hab kaij mam s-m-mu'amk ? Jiawul o an u'ukch g m-chegitoithag . ”

Jiosh at am i ap'ech mat g alithaj wo e muhkith am t-wehhejed k hekaj gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig mattp hedai ab wo i s-wohoch . Ab o wabsh s-ha ho'ige'ith hegam heki hu hemajkam mo ab s-wohochuth ch pi chegima g ha-chu'ichig
D eda s-hehpith . D hekaj am ge nahthch g pion ch cheopi nuhkuththam ch am gegok ch e huhkalith . D g Peter am him k am ha wehm i kekiwua k e huhkal .
Ab g wo i hekaj hegai mo haschu g Jiosh ab em-mahkch k hab wo e nako mamt ab wui wo gegokiwua g ge Jiawul s-a'agi cheggiadag .
D hab kaij g Peter , “ Nt haschu ahgk pi wo ni-nako mant wo m-oi hemuch ? Ni-nahtokch ani mant wo m-wehhejed muh . ”

T g Jiosh ab wo em-mahkath g s-ap tahhathkam . K ihtha s-ap tahhathkam pi ta amichuthama ch wabshaba wo chehmo g t-thothakag . Kutt hab pi ha'ichukaj wo t-kudutath ahchim matt ab i t-hemakoch g Jesus Christ wehm .
Hebaichujj ach i thagitokch g t-nehni am Jiosh wui ch hekaj hehgchulith ch eda hebaichujj has ha ahg g hemajkam . K eda g hemajkam d Jiosh nahtoi . T e wepo masma chum ha nahto .
“ Bani wa wa elith mant am wo si i ni-nakog k wo shohbi g himthaj hegai Jesus mo ab Nazareth t amjed .

Heg o wa'i tatchua mat g u'uwi an wo ha neithath ch pi ap ha'ichu am wo chegitoth . Shahag wepo mo pi ha huhuge g pi ap ha-tatchui . S-u'imk o hegai mo pi ab hu d ha-wuikam ch im hu hab pi apko i ha wanimed hegam mo pi gewpkthag . Jiosh o heki hu ab ha mohto'ithch g s-ko'ok namkithadag .

“ Neh , kahwal ha nuhkuththam at chum hems ha wehhejed wo e muhkith . Hegai mo d wabsh ha-pionag at am wabsh wo i ha thagito k wo meh mat am wo jiwia g sheh'e . T g sheh'e am wo wahk k wo mu'a k wo ha gantad .
Pi g wo s-e hohtkith mamt ha'ichu hab wo chei . Ba'ich o i s-ap'e mamt wo ha'ichu kaihamath . Pi g am wabsh pehegi ha'ichukaj wo babgat .
Pegih , k hab wa'ap masma am t-chehani g t-kownalig Jesus hemu . Ahchim mach am ahgachug g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh attsh ab amjed wo i nei g t-thagio'ithadag .
Ia ant jiwia ith thahm jewed k hab sha masma mo g tonlig am em-wehhejed nani pi am tashogith g wohokam himthag . Kumt s-ap wo himath g e-thoakag hab masma mam am tonlig ch ed mamtp ab wo ni-hiwgath .

D am hahawa g Jesus s-neitham k am cheh ge'e cheopi ch ed k hab ahg , “ Neh , thoa apt . Pi g am hu hab i ep junihim g pi ap'ekam nat pi ha'ichu ba'ich i pi ap hab wo e juh am m-tahgio mapt am hab ep wo i junihi g pi ap'ekam . ”
ch ab wo e chehgithch wehs ha'ichu k ed mam ab si pihk e elith wehs ha hekaj .
“ Am g hab wo junihith g ni-chehanig mamtp woho ab wo si ni-tatchuath .

Neh , nahnko masma o ab t-wui neok g Jiosh ithani . Kumt pi gm hu wabsh wo s-ohhoth g ne'okij . Hegam mash wa pi ab hu kaiham hegai mash am ha ahgith g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ash wa pi e tho'ibia . Kutt ba'ich wo i bei g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mattp pi ab hu wo kaiha hegai mo ab neok thahm kahchim t amjed .
Heki am hu pi mahch g Jiosh ahpim go'ol hemajkam ch ab ha'ichu e jijoshchuth ch ab ha ihm mo eda pi d sha'i hegai thoakam Jiosh .
“ Neh , t wa woho hab e juh mat am i kei g e-alithag Jesus . T heg wehpeg ab i s-t-ho'ige'el ahchim Tutuligo k ab t-wui him k ab i t-mah g ap'ethag matt ab wo i t-nohnogi ab amjed g pi ap'ekam . ”
“ Kuch ahchim am wehmajkahim ch g si t-wuhpuikaj neith hegai mo haschu hab junihim am wehsko t-jewedga ed ch am Jerusalem ch ed . Kumt an be k mua ab naggiak kots t ab .

T-kownalig Jesus Christ o ab ni-mahkch g gewkthag mant wo ha'ichu em-cheha . Kunt hekaj wo em-ahgi mamt pi ab hu e wui wo gegokiwua k wabshaba ab wo i hemakoj g e-chegitoithag k wo s-ap e tahtkk ab a'ai e wui .
Mehk am wa ab amjed g Jiosh ch d obgaj nam pi pi ap ha'ichu chegito ch pi ap ha'ichu hab junihim .

Pegih , pi g am i e thagito pi ap'ekam ch ed k am s-ap wo i e gewkathch s-ap'ekam k ed ch am hab wo junihith mapt haschu wo ha ahgi ch wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha hekaj ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab ha wui g e-wehm wohochuththam . T hegam mo ab ihm g Jiosh ch s-ap ha'ichu chegito m-wehm hab wo masmak .

Jiosh at ab t-mah g wechij thoakag ahchim matt ab ihm g alithaj mo d t-tho'ibiakam . K ith heg wa wepo mat ab i t-wuwhas muhkig t amjed hab masma mat ab i wuhshath g e-alithag . Hemuch o an thaha g alithaj s-apkojed hugithaj an ch am t-wehhejed ap'echuth matt wo wehmajk . Kutt heg wui am wo i t-gewpkai .

Tki g wehpeg anghil am si kuhu g e-kuikudkaj . Tki g chea ch mehi wehnathch g eh'ed ab i e iawua an thahm g jewed . Kutki hemako tahpani mei g jewed mo waik e tahpanch ( ⅓ ) . Kutki g kukui hab wa'ap masma ha'as meitto . Tki g washai wehs meitto .
ch hab kaij : “ T-kownalig Jiosh , chum ap hekith an ha'ichug ch am hahawa wehs i chehgi g e-gewkthag k am i himch g e-kownaltalig . Kuch heg hekaj ab si m-ho'ige'elith .

Sh g Jesus hab epai kaij ab wui , “ Ahpi apt aigo ab wo ha'ichu ni-tai maptp wo s-mahchk mani hedai wud ch haschu i m-makiog . Hegai mani m-makiog o ab Jiosh d amjedkam ch heg wepogithas mo g shonkam shuhthagi . ”
Ia at ep wo i wuhsh g Christ jewed thahm . Kutt am wehmaj wo i wuwhag k wepo masma wo si s-kehgajk .
Nt ith in hi wa ha o'oha mamt ab amjed wo s-wohoch mo g Jesus d Jiosh si Kehsha ch d alithaj k hab masma ab wo bei g wechij thoakag .

Pi o ab hu t-kaiham mach chum neneok ab amjed g Jiosh no pi pi mahch g Jiosh . Hegam o ab wa'i t-kaiham mo hedai s-mahch g Jiosh . Bach masma s-mahch mo hedai edgith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Heg o am ha tashogith g wohokam .

Kah ani mash ihtham s-chu i'attomkam am em-wehm e gegosith ch am chum em-uamhun . Neh , pi at am hu wo i em-wehmajk g chewagi matp gm hu wabsh wo wi'ichkwua k pi wo ha juh . T hab wa masma pi am hu wo i em-wehmajk ihtham mo wabsh hejel i e chegito . Neh , t wabsh wo e huhp g ha'ichu babhetham uhs matp pi ab hu wo ha babheth mat eda wo chum e ai mat ab wo bai . Kut ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa masma wabsh wo huhug no pi pi sha'i e chehgith g ha'ichu s-ap'ekam ab ha amjed .

Kumtsh am i ha wuwhas g kok'otham am i neithok mo haschu has junihim g Jesus chuhchai k an kahya oithk ha wahpakusch hab elithch mat chum hems g Peter ehkathag ab hab wo e juh ha ab mat wo e thothaj .

Jiawul o chum s-em-padchuthamk hab sha masma mat wo ha mehi g hahpod k hekaj wo em-mummu . Mt wabshaba s-wihnam wo u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag hab wa masma mamt g kawad am e tahgio wo ulinichith . T hab pi has wo em-juh .

Pi o d wa'i o'othham mo em-chikpnachuth ch wabshaba d t-kownalig Jesus . Ab o him g tash mamt an wo wehmajk . T heg ab wo em-namkith heg hekaj em-chikpan . Kumt heg hekaj woho'i e-tatchui ab am hab wo junihith g e-chikpan .

Am g wo s-e nen'oithath mamt pi wo e uamhu g pi ap'ekamkaj wabsh pehegchuthch g Jiosh ha'ichu hab masma matsh wa hab e juh hegai mash hab chehgig Esau . Ith ash d ge'echu ha-alithag . K heg hekaj ha'ichu d chum ap'ethaj . Kush wabshaba pi ab hu has sha'i elith ch gagda mat si hemho gegosig ab i nei heg amjed .
D si s-kaitham hihnk ch hab kaij , “ Pi hegai . Barabbas ach tatchua . ” D eda d s-chu ehskam ch d ha mu'akam ihtha Barabbas .
Mu'i at pi ab hu wo ha tatchuath hegam mo d chum ha-naipijju ch has am wabsh wo si e wuath ch pi ab hu wo tatchuath g Jiosh ch wabshaba g pi kehg s-tahhathkam ab wo tatchuath .
T g Jiosh ab i wamgith k am ba'ich i si uhgkaj thahm kahchim ch ed k ab mah g gewkthag wehs ha'ichu thahm .

Ia atsh ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ jewed thahm . T g gewkthaj am ep wo e chehgi . Wohokam ach am em-ahgith ith amjed ch pi g hoho'oki a'agitha ahchim machd heki hu am neith g si s-tondam gewkthaj g si t-wuhpuikaj .

Bo wa masma hab chu'ig wehs o'ohanaj ed mo am ha o'ohanith g a'ai hemajkam ith amjed . Hahasko o s-hasigam hab kaithag g o'ohanaj . K pi ap am hu i tashogith hegam mo pi amichuth g e-wohochuthadag ch pi wihnam gegok heg eda mo hab wa masma hab ep wua g heki hu o'ohanaj g Jiosh . Ho o wabsh hejel ab e mohto'ith g pi ap chu'ichig . T im hu hab wo i ha juh g Jiosh .
Kutsh ith pi ha hohho'ithach . Tsh hab ab si wantsh g e-wehschuga k am si wohp ha shahgith g hemajkam k si hihnk ch hab kaij ,
Chum o hekith am hab junihim g Jiosh mo has i kaij . T heg hekaj ia jiwia g Christ mat am hab wo t-juni ahchim Tutuligo hegai moki haschu g Jiosh ab ha ahgith g t-shohshonbad .
Hegam mo hedai hab kaij mo d Jiosh wohochuththam ch eda wo pi ap neneokath o wabsh hejel e iattogith . K g ha-himthag pi ha'ichu wehhejed s-kehgajk .

Mt wo s-chegitok mani wa hab em-ahgith mat pi hebai g pion hab wo chum e elithath mas ba'ich d i ge ha'ichu mo g e-ahmo . T wo em-sho'igch hegam mo ni-sho'igchuth . Kut ab wo s-em-wohog el hegam mo ab s-ni-wohog elith . Hegam mo pi mahch g ni-ohg o ni-sho'igchuth ch hab wa'ap wo em-sho'igchuthath nam pi ab ni-wui e thagitokch .
D heg hekaj hab kaij g Jesus ab ha wui hegam mat ab i chum s-wohoch , “ Mtki woho ab i e thagito ni-wui mamtp am hab wo i junihi g ni-mashchama .
“ Tsh wa haha wabsh gei g bihugig k ha sho'igch g hemajkam wehsko Egypt jewed thahm ch iia Canaan jewed thahm . Tsh pi sha'i e amich hegam Abrahambad mat hebai wo bei g ha'ichu hugi .
Si ani s-ap ni-tahtk ch ia ha'i ha neith g em-wehm kihkam . K ihtham an u'ukch g wohokam hab masma mo ab t-chehani g Jiosh .
Hegam mat pi wo ha nuhkuth g e-hajuni o ba'ich d i pi ap'ekam mo g mischini .
Hekai ach hu t-kudut g pi ap t-chu'ichigkaj . T wabshaba ab i t-kegchuth k gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig . Kuch heg hekai ab si hiwig ch d hekiakam ch ab wo i miabi g Jiosh .
Ihtham wabsh kah mo ha'i hab kaij , “ Hegai mo wa t-sho'igchuth o am hahawa ahgachug ihtha Jesus ha'ichu ahga mo wa heki hu chum s-keshwuimk . ”
Mt ab hig wo ha'ichu hug k ab wo i e gewpkai . Hemho wa amt wehsijj wo e tho'ibia . ”
Ab amt s-bahbagi nako g sho'igthag ni-wehhejed k pi sha'i ha'asa .

Pt wo ha ahgi g kekel o'othham mat d wo si o'othhamk ch pi wabsh wo i e wahmuth k wabshaba wabsh wo i e bahbgi wehs ha'ichu k ed . T wabsh shelinim wo oithath g e-wohochuthadag ch wo pihk e elithath ab wehs ha wui ch s-e tahtk ch ab wo nakogath ha'ichu .

Heki o hu pi mahch g hemajkam g Jiosh tatchui . K g Jiosh si s-hemajim am ha nakog . Ni wabshaba hemu em-ahgith mo hahawa ab si i ha chehani g hemajkam wehsko mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi .
D am gegok g je'ej ch jiskaj g Jesus miabithch amai mo am naggia . Kud gohk am ep ha wehmaj mo hema d hegai Mary mo g wehmaj kihkam d Clopas ch hema d ep Mary Magdalene .
K g lihwaj d wabsh i eh'ed . Kum hab a'aga Jiosh Ne'oki no pi g Jiosh am gahi wuhshanim neok ab t-wui .
Chum as hi wa s-ap'e hejel em-wehhejed mamt wo huh ch wabshaba pi ap'e mamt wo huh matp heg hekaj wo e kudut k wo i shul hegam mo pi hab masma s-mahch ihtha .
K hab ep masma an o'ohanas mash hab kaij g Jiosh ab e-alithag wui : B ant wo m-mah hegai si hekia s-kehg ho'ige'ithadag mani wa am si ahgith g Davidbad .
Ia'i amjed amt wo s-mahchk mach d hemako g ni-ohg wehm k ch ep wo s-mahchk mamt ahpim ab i e hemakoj ni-wehm .
Tt wo s-mahchk mach woho'i s-mahch g Jiosh matt am hab wo junihith mo haschu ab i t-chehani .
Kum eda pi ni-wohochuth mani d ge ahni . Ni heg hekaj am em-ahgith mamt wo koi pi e tho'ibiak . ”
Neith ani mat sha'i si s-ap e taht ihtha uwi mat e ko'ij hegam mat pi thagito g Jesus . Heg o wa wepo mat nawm i'ok g ha-eh'ed . Kunt am i neithok wabsh woho'i si has ni-taht .
S-mahch am matsh am hahawa chum gawul juh g pi ap e-chegitoi k chum shoak . Tsh wabshaba g ohgaj am hahawa pi e nako mas ab wo mah g Jiosh ho'ige'ithalig .
D eda an s-ju'ujpij neneok g hemajkam ch hab kaij , “ Tho si s-ap o'othham . ” D ha'i hab ep kaij , “ Pi o ap d o'othham no pi t-iattogith . ”
Tsh g Jiosh am i gewkai g ha'ichu ha-ahga . Kutsh mu'ijj hegam hemajkam ab i s-ha wohochuth k ab i e thagito Jesus wui .

Jiosh at t-a'appem k am i t-chuhcha matt wo i ahgahi g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj . Kuch heg hab wa'i junihim mo haschu d tatchuij ch pi wabsh g hemajkam ha-tatchui hab junimk . Jiosh o am t-mamche mach haschu ahgch hab ha'ichu junihim .
Hegam mo woho d si hehe'ejel wihpkam o heg ab wa'i hiwig Jiosh ch chum hekith ab tahni g i wehmtadag . Ihtham amt wo ha nuhkuthath
Pi am koi hekith ni-chehcheg am e ho'ige'ithahunch . Am g hab wo i e juhni . T g ni-ohg am hab wo em-juni . T ab wo si e shuhthath g em-thoakag g s-hehgigkaj . ”
Mamtp hedai d wo ha-neneholigak ith thahm jewed ch wabsh pi heg hekaj wo si e eh'el ab s-wohochuthk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Tp wabshaba am wo sha s-em-ap'et mamt wo e wuhpul'o , mt am hab wo e juh .
T am wo tashok mo ihtham pi sha'i e thagitokch am wui g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag no pi am hab junihim g hejel e-tatchui ch hab chum em-wua mamt ab a'ai e wui wo gegokiwua .
Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g e-ho'ige'ithadag am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag . Kunt si ni-toths mamtsh s-hohtam thagito g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj k ab s-wohoch g gawul ha'ichu ahga .
Am g wo i e nakog k wehs s-ap ab wo ha neithath g hemajkam ch am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ha'ichu namt pi hab wa'i masma am wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed .

D hab hahawa kaij , “ An g wo tha'ichuth g e-chuagia inhab s-apkojed g e-wahlko k wo ha'i ha ui . ” Kuchd wa woho hab t-juh k pi t-nako machs ab uhpam wo i cheshaj nad pi sha'i si mu'i am e ba'iha g waptopi .

o ha'ichukaj ab wo i ha gewkemhunath . Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt ab wo ha'ichu ha ho'ithath g e-wehm wohochuththam . Am g s-ba'ama hab wo wuath ch s-ha ho'ige'ith . Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt d wo ha wanimedthamk . Kumt wo si chikpanath ch s-gewkam am hab wo junihith . Ha'i o d em-mahkigdag mamt wo s-ha ho'ige'ith k wo i ha wehmt hegam mo e sho'igchuth .

Sh g Paul ab ha kakke , “ Namt am wa bei g gewkthag ab amjed g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mamt hekith ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ? ” Sh hab kaij hegam , “ Pi ach koi hebai sha'i kah mas am ha'ichu d Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . ”
ch wabshaba wabsh wo thagito hegai matp hedai pi ab hu wo wohog elithath ihtha mani ia em-chehani . Tp hems ab wo wa bei g si edathag k am wo i e ap'ech .
Pi at an hu wo sha'i i wah thahm kahchim ch ed ihtha jewed thahm t-hon mo aihim g muhkig .

Pi g am wo si e kudutath wabsh g ha'ichu hugikaj ch wabshaba heg wo chum s-behim mo d pi ha huhugetham . Ahni ani em-makiog g pi ha huhugetham thoakag . Heg at hekaj am i ni-kei g Jiosh k am ni-wohokamch . ”
T wabshaba g Jiosh pi ab hu wo em-mah mam haschu i tahni matp g em-tatchui pi wo ap'ek .
ch chum hekith ab wo ho'ige'ithath g Jiosh t-ohg wehs ha'ichukaj am chehchegch g t-kownalig Jesus Christ .
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed : Abrahambad at ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh . K g Jiosh heg hekaj hab masma ab neith mo s-ap'e .
Pi o an hu ha'ichug g tash ch mashath . Jiosh o an wehsko tonlithch g kihhim heg wehm mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch g si ge'e e-gewkthagkaj .

Ch wabshaba ahchim pi g hejel t-tatchui hab wua . Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am t-eda hab chu'ig . Kuch heg tatchui hab wua . Hegam mo pi am hu ha eda g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o pi d Jiosh hemajkamga .
Jiosh at ab uhpam ep wo ha ui hegam Tutuligo mat ab wo i s-wohoch .
Pi oki hekith ha'ichu ha iattogith ch pi ha chu'ichig .

“ M o hi wa woho mani ab ihm g Jiosh am oithch ihtha himthag mo ihtham hab elith mo pi d wohokam . K eda d wa'i Jiosh mani ab ihm ch d ha-Jioshga g t-shohshon . Kuni wehs ab s-wohog elith g t-chehanig ch hegai mat g kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam an o'oha .

Pi att hedai wui wo chum t-wulshchith ch wabsh s-ap wo ha namkithath . Ith att wa'i hekaj wo chum t-wulshchith matt ab a'ai t-hekaj wo si pihk t-elithath . Ith o d Jiosh chehanig . Kuch ab s-wohog elith g chehanigaj ab a'ai si pihk t-elithch .
T eda ihtham pi gm hu s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi . Jiosh o ha hiwgith mat wo e sho'igch . K heg hekaj ab si s-ko'okam has ahg ch pi ab hu has elith g gewkthaj .

An kihhim wehgaj o hab chu'ig g uhgk kolhai . K ith eda hab chu'ig g gamai gohk kihkijeg . K g gamai gohk anghil ab ha nuhkuth g kihkijeg . An o kihkijeg t an hab chu'ig g ha-chechgig hegam gamai gohk thakam Tutuligo hemajkam .

Kuch wabshaba wehsijj d pi ap chu'ijkam . K ab t-wui him g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag . T g Christ ab bei t-wehhejed gm hu i e gawulkathk ab amjed g Jiosh no pi an o'ohanas : Gm at hu i e gawulkai ab amjed g Jiosh matp hedai ab e naggia uhs t ab .
Thani Tuhligo . Kumki heki hu kah mani wa hab masma ab ihm g Jiosh mo g ni-wehm o'othham ch si ha sho'igchuth hegam mo ab ihm g Jesus ch am chum s-keshwuimk g ha-hehemaptha .
K am thaha g Nehbig Hujud ch d ge Jiawul ch hab chehgig Satan . Tki g anghil an si wulshp
Sh am hema kih g o'othham mash hab chehgig Simon ch heki hu wa'i amjed am hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu ch hab chum e wua mo d ge mahkai .
Ni hahawa tatchua mant wo si s-mahchk g Jesus Christ ch ab wo taht hegai gewkthaj mat hekaj i wuhsh ab muhkig amjed , chum anis hems hab wa'ap wo ni-sho'igch .
Pi g am wabsh si s-e hohtkith mapt am wo hema i kei mat wo chikpani g Jiosh . Tp hems d pi ap chu'ijkam . Kut d wo m-chu'ichig mapt s-hohtam am i kei .
Kupt hab wa'ap wo ha ahgi g o'oki mat wo s-thotholimak ch wo e chehgithch mo am oithch hab e junihim g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo nawkko'oth ch pi wo pi kehg neneokath ab hedai k amjed .
Pegih , am o wa s-ap'e mamt wo ha hiwigi ch hi wa ba'ich i s-ap'e mat pi wo ha kunt .
Pi g am wo hejel e iattogithath mamt wabsh wo kaihamath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch eda pi am hu hab wo junihith .
Am amsh chum s-mu'amk g Jesus Judea chekshani ch ed . D hekaj pi am hu himimk . Kuchd an oiopo Galilee chekshani ch ed .

Heg at ab i t-wehnath g Christ matt ab i s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed . T g Christ t-tho'ibia ab amjed g pi ap'ekam k am i t-ap'ech wehhejed g Jiosh matt d wo hekia s-ap'ekam hemajkamgajk , Bo masma ab t-chehgithch g Jiosh ha'ichu amichuthadag .
k am ge was wakonakud ch ed k ab i wapkonahi g t-tahtad k heg hekaj ha thagio tuaya mat ab e bahshodath .
Kuni wa heg hekaj ha sho'igchuth ch ha koktha hegam mo an u'ukch ihtha wechij ha'ichu ahga ch wa an ha u'u g chechoj ch u'uwi ch am ha shulig kukpaikud ch ed .
D heg hekaj ab a'ai e wui gegokiwua g hemajkam .

Am o ha'i em-nuhkuthachuth g Jiosh g hemajkam . Kumt wo si s-ap ha nuhkuthath hab masma mat g kahwal ha nuhkuththam hab wo ha juh g e-kahwaliga . S-mahch am mo pi ha shahthahim ch wabshaba s-ap ha wanimed . Kumt ahpim hab wa'ap wo ha wanimedath g hemajkam ch am wo ha chehgi g e-thoakagkaj mat has wo chum masmak . Pi o hab chum chu'ig mams ab wo ha'ichu si i ha chehanith . K pi hab chum chu'ig mams wo si tatchuath g e-namkithadag heg hekaj chikpan . Mt wo chum si tatchuath mamt si s-ap wo ha nuhkuthath .

Em-kaisthag o si ge'ej ch wohokamchuth mam pi ap ha namkith g e-pionag . Hegam o d wabsh sho'igkam ch am em-ahgith g pi e-ap'ethag ch shoani . M wabshaba pi ab hu ha kaiham ch chum hems ab ha'ichu ha abchuth ch ha koktha . K ihtham pi e nakog mas wo e tho'ibia . K wabshaba g Jiosh ab ha kaiham ch wo ha tho'ibia . Ahpim mam e kakaischuth ha sho'igchuthch am ab aihim g lothaita hab masma mat g wipsilo wo e gi'ichuth k ab wo ai mamt wo ha koktha .
Neh , bo chu'ig . K d hegai ha'ichu ahgaj mat am em-wui e u'apa . Gam g hu hab wo i juhni g s-padhog elithadag ch iattogitha ch hehgamthadag ch has ahgadag .
Matp hedai wo e hohont k d wo e-wehm kihkamk am hugkam mat hekith hema wo i muh . K am hahawa s-ap'e mat ep wo bei g wehm kihkam , heg hi wa mat g e-wehm wohochuththam an wo bei .
Pi o hi wa has chu'ig matp hema heki hu wo e pahl hikuch o pi wo e pahl hikuch . Tho wa'i ihtha mamt ab wo i s-wohoch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wo chehgithch g si pihk e-elithadag am i ha wehmajch .
Bat wa masma am i ap'ech g Jiosh mat hab wo juh g pi ha huhugetham tho'ibiathag wehsijj t-wehhejed mattp hedai ab wo s-wohog el .

Ith ant hab wo ah heg amjed lial mamt am wo to'awath ha wehhejed hegam e-wehm wohochuththam mo am kih Judea jewed ch ed . Bani ha ahg hegam wohochuththam mo am mu'ikpa kih Galasia jewed ch ed mat am wo to'awath g e-lialiga .
Ahpim u'uwi amt ab wo i e thagito e-kuhkun ha wui . Ith o ab d em-wuikam nam pi d Christ wohochuththam .

D hab ep kaij g Jesus ab ha wui g hemajkam , “ Thani ge'e tonlig am wehs ha wehhejed g hemajkam . Kut s-ap am wo himath Jiosh ap'ethag ed ch pi hekith ha'ichukaj wo pi e amich hegam mat hedai ab ni-wui wo e thagitokchith . ”
Am g wo s-chegitok mo haschu i em-ahgith hegam mo d chuhchaij g t-kownalig Jesus Christ .
Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g thoakag ch wehs ha'ichu . K pi am hu ha'ichu d sha'i hegai mas ab i si tatchua ab amjed g o'othham mat ab wo mah chikpank .
Neh , ab ach s-wohochuth g o'othham mat ab ha'ijj wo t-ahgi mo si s-ap s-mahch . K g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ba'ich i s-gewkthag mat heg am wohokamch g e-alithag .
Tho si t-kownalig g Jesus Christ . Kutt ab wui wo i t-thagito matt pi am hu hab wo junihith g pi ap t-tatchui .
Neh , an ash wa uhgk hohothai kolhaidag g Jerico kihhim . Kutsh wa g Jiosh hab ha ah g t-shohshon matsh an wo e himtchul . Tsh ab i s-wohochuth k hab e juh . Tsh hekaj i shul g Jiosh hegai kolhai .
Kush g Jiosh am si i wehmaj g Paul mash am hab junihim g s-hasigam ha'ichu .
D g Jesus hab kaij , “ Wehs am d nenehol mamtp hedai hab i junihim g pi ap'ekam nam pi heg hekaj e wulshch .
Am o wa tasho mo ab t-wui si pihk e elith g Jiosh . Pegih , ni-wepnag , ahchim att hab wa'ap wo chum si pihk t-elithath ab a'ai t-wui .
Am apt i ni-chehgi mant has masma uhpam ep wo i wuhsh ab muhkig t amjed . Chum apt hekith wo ni-wehmajk . Nt heg hekaj wo si s-hehgigkath .
Am g i e nakog mapt am wo wa ne'okchulithath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga am ha-namki ed ch wo ha mashchamath ch am wo i ha gewkemhunath .
Mu'ikko ach ha'ichukaj t-kudut . K wabshaba pi ha'ichu t-shohbithch . Hebai ach ha'ichu pi a'amichuth ch wabshaba am wabsh ba'ich i t-gewpkath .
Sh wabshaba ha'ijj wabsh nahnko ha ahg ch hab kaij , “ Tki wabsh nawkk ihtham . ”
K hegai kolhai heg hekaj hab junis hothai mo hab e a'aga jasper . K g kihhim d wabsh gai tondam ohla .
Tki ab i wuwha g wewa'ak anghil k u'a g wewa'ak si oithchkam sho'igthag ab amjed g cheopi . Ihtham anghil oki si s-kehg s-tohtam e enigadathch ch g ohla babshodag an hab juhkch e-babsho an .
Ab g wo i tahni g Jiosh mat ab wabsh wo i s-ha ho'ige'el hegam mo em-sho'igchuth . Pi g wo sha'i has ha ahgath .
K g tahtdaj si s-wegima tonod hab masma mo g kohwli hahgig . K g ne'okij hab masma hab kaithag mo g si ge'e shuhthagi an med .
Am ant m-mahtchul ha wui k am ba'ich wo i m-mahtchul ha wui . T hab wo si pihk e elithath ni-hekaj hab masma map ahpi . Nt ahni am wo i ni-hemakoch ha wehm . ”
Pi at sha'i t-tha'i g Jiosh g e-alithag . Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mat pi ha'ichu ep wo sha'i t-tha'i . Alithaj at ab wui e iagchul am t-wehhejed .
Bo wa kaij ab em-wui , “ Am at ha'i wo i wuwha em-shahgith mo eda e aihim g si ha oithch tash k hab wabsh wo junihith g hejel e-tatchui ch wo nahnko em-ahgath . ”
Mt pi wo e haschuthath mat gm hu hab i ha juh . Jiosh at hab em-juh mamt hab haha wo masmak mam d Abrahambad amjedkam . Pi am d ha-shohshon ch wabsh heg wa wepo mam d mahmhadag .
Pi o hab chum chu'ig machs ahchim am wo em-nu'ichkwuhith em-wohochuthadag ed . Ba'ich o i s-ap'e matt am wo i em-gewkemhu em-wohochuthadag ed . Kumt hab wo s-gegokkath heg eda .
Am ad wa hema kih Bethany kihhim t am ch hab chehgig Lazarus ch am hu hebai haha wabsh mumku . Lazarusbad u'uwiga ad d Martha ch Mary .
K heg hekaj ab t-mahkch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Hegai matp hedai wo s-ohhoth ihtha mashchama at wo s-ohhoth g Jiosh .
Ahchim o wa'i t-wehmaj g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mach hedai wohokamchuth mo g Jesus d Jiosh alithag ch ia mahsi k d o'othham hab masma mach ahchim .
Ihtham s-chu i'attomkam mo am ha'ichu chum em-mashcham ash ha'ichu chehchk ch heg oithch am hab e junihim ch hekaj e uamhun ch pi ab hu wohog elith g Jiosh ch nahnko ha ahg g anghil .
Hemho wa amt wo s-ohhoth g pi ap'ekam k am hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam ch am wo i e nako mamt wo s-ap e tahtkkath ab wehs ha wui .

mamtp am wabsh i s-gewkam wo wohochuthath g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj ab amjed g alithaj ch pi gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed . Ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga o wehsijj ab d ha wuikam g hemajkam ch heg hekaj an wehsko chehmohim g jewed .
Neh , d gn hu i u'ihi g hohothai mat hekaj wo ma'ichkwua g Jesus . D wabshaba wabsh s-a'agi am ha shahgith him k gm hu i wuhsh ge'e cheopi amjed .

Jiosh o ab t-mahkch g wechij thoakag . K ihtha thoakag wepo masma mo g Jiosh thoakag ch am e chehgithch mo heg wa'i tatchua s-ap'ekam . Am g wo himath g e-wechij thoakag ch am wabsh wo thagito g pi ap'ekam .
Ith att hekaj hemho wo wa si s-chu nakogath ahchim mach d Jiosh hemajkamga ch ab s-wohog elith g Jiosh chehanig ch am s-gewkam oith g Jesus .
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab uhpam i wuhshath muhkig amjed .
nani pi s-wohom d em-nuhkuththam .
Am amtp hu wa'i kah mo ab ni-wui si s-hemajima g Jiosh ch ab ni-mah ihtha chikpan mant hekaj wo i em-wehmajk .
Gokko apt wo s-ha tha'i hegam mat hedai wo chum a'ai ha ga'agwulkai g wohochuththam . Hegam mat pi ab hu wo m-kaiha o pi ap'e . T g pi ap ha-chu'ichig am wo ha chehgi . Kumt wabsh wo ha thagito .
D am ep a'ai e ne'owi g hemajkam heg hekaj mo has i kaij .

Jiosh at am cheha g e-alithag mat ia wo jiwia jewed thahm k s-ba'ama ab mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . K g alithaj heg hekaj ahg g ne'okij .Pegih , kuch heg hekaj s-ap ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ne'oki ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth g alithaj ahga .
Pegih oi g wo , tt hig am wo si i t-nako matt wo si s-ap'ek am Jiosh tahgio k wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath ab a'ai t-wui . T g Jiosh s-ap ab wo t-neithath .

Ab g wo e ho'ige'ithahun , t-wepnag , k ab wo tai g Jiosh mat pi ab hu wo e shohbi g ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed t-kownalig Jesus . T mu'ijj ab wo si has i elith k ab wo s-wohog el hab masma mo am hab e wua em-shahgith .

Pegih , bach wa masma ab s-wohochuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch hekaj am ahgachug . Jiosh at wa ab i wuhshath g t-kownalig Jesus muhkig amjed . Kuch s-mahch mat hab wa'ap ab wo i t-wuwhas ahchim wohochuththam k ab wo i t-wahpki matt am wo wehmajk kihthaj ed .
Nam am hu ha'i kok'o ? Bo chum mahs mamt ab wo i ha wai hegam mo am d ge'eged em-shahgith . T hegam ab wo em-huhu g e ko'atham a-saithihkaj k wo e ho'ige'ithahu em-wehhejed
“ Batsh wa masma am i ge'etha g Mosesbad k am i ai g gi'ikko wehst-mahm ( 40 ) a'ahithag . Tsh am hu hebai hab i e ah mat am wo i ha chehgim g e-hahajuni .

nat pi g ge'e ha'ichu has e juh . Tutuligo at am wabsh hema si be k chum alo mua . Kunt s-mai mo ihtha ab u'ukch g e-shel hab masma mo g Rome t am kihkam . Kutt hekaj g ni-shonthalig ha wehm am tho'ibia .
Sh wehsko kaithag g ha-hihinki ch wehs ha babgach g kihkam . Tsh gohk ha ui hegam mash am wehmaj g Paul k am ha u'apa chichwikud ed . Hegam mamtsh ha ui ash d Gaius ch Aristarcas .
Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mo s-ha ho'ige'elith ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap ha-chu'ichig mat ab i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj .

Pegih neh , ni-wepnag , pi at wo sha'i heki e wua matt haschu am hab wo junihith g t-kownalig Jesus wehhejed . Kumt heg hekaj s-wihnam wo gegokkath e-wohochuthadag ed ch chum hekith wo si chikpanath wehhejed .
Kuni ab i em-gewkemhun mamt am hab wo junihith mani wa haschu am em-chehgith .

Jiosh at hab masma hab t-juh matt pi hedai wo sha'i t-nako machs hejel wo s-mai g Jiosh k wo t-tho'ibia . Ha'i o pi ha'ichuchuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . K wabshaba hab d elithaj matt ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k hekaj wo t-tho'ibia .

T g Christ ab uhpam i t-ui e wui k s-ap nuhkuth g t-thoakag hab sha masma mat g kahwal ha nuhkuththam hab wo juh g heb hu himkam kahwal . Ahpim u'uwi amt ab wo e thagitokch hehe'ejel e-kuhkun ha wui k ch s-ap wo ha nuhkuthath chum hems hegam mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh . Tp hems ab wo i s-wohoch
Neh , kuch si s-hemajim ab em-waith am wehhejed g Christ mamt ab wo i hiwigi g Jiosh mat am gawul wo i em-juh mamt hahawa pi d wo obgajk .
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab i wuhshath ab amjed g s-ko'ok muhkig nat pi am hab wa'ap i ap'ech mat ep wo e chegito . Kut hemho wa am hab wo e juh .
ch s-ko'okam has ahg hegai mach ab ihm mo d t-tho'ibiakam .
Pi o hab chu'ig mas wo nawkko'oth o s-hohtam wo babgatath o wo ha kawnith o heg wa'i lial ab wo si tatchuath .
T wabshaba pi hekith wo huhug hegai mani ahni m-makiog . Heg at am wo m-edak ch hab wo masmak mo g shonkam ch ab wo m-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag . ”
Ahchim mach hab wua g Jiosh tatchui ach woho'i ab si tatchua . Ith at am wo t-chehgi mach woho d a'aligaj .

Niki hahawa ep neith g waik pi kehg gewpkthag . K ihtham hab mahs mo g babath ch d jijawul ch ab i wuwha ha-chihchini amjed g Nehbig Hujud ch g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch g s-chu Iattomkam Ha'ichu i Tashogiththam ch hab wua g s-hasig ha'ichu .
Am g hab wo junihith g Jiosh chehanig mo hab masma an o'ohanas : Ab amt wo si pihk e elithath wehs ha wui g hemajkam hab masma mam has i masma hejel e wehhejed si pihk e elith .
Pi ach hejel t-amjed ha'ichu ahgachug . Jesus Christ o d t-kownalig . Kuch heg amjed an ahgachug ch d wabsh em-pionag wehhejed .
Mt wo e iattogith k hab wa'ap wo masmak mo hegam mamtp ab wo ha kaihamath .

Ahni ani hab wa'ap ab ha'ichu tahni g Jiosh mat hab wo em-juni . S-mahch am mat g t-kownalig Jesus e muhkith mat wo i t-ap'ech Jiosh wehhejed . T g Jiosh ab i wuhshath muhkig t amjed s-hohho'ithch mat has e juh . Kut g hab elithaj hahawa pi hekith gawul wo e juh . Jesus at chum hekith wo t-nuhkuthath .

Bamt masma wo himath g e-thoakag mamt wo ha'ichuch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Christ . Nt haha wo kah mam am e hemakochuthch ch s-ap ahgachug mat g hemajkam ab wo s-wohoch g s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj g Jiosh , chum anis hems pi am hu ep wo em-nei .
Jiosh at ab uhpam i wuhshath g t-kownalig Jesus ab muhkig amjed k hab wa'ap wo i t-wuwhas ahchim heg hekaj e-gewkthag mat hekaj ab i wuhshath g Jesus .

Pt wo s-chegito matt ab toa g t-nohnhoi m-ab k am m-wehhejed t-ho'ige'ithahu . T g Jiosh ab m-mah g gewkthag k am m-chehgi mapt has i mahs chikpan hab wo junihith wehhejed . Pegih , pt wo i e gewkath k am hab wo junihith .
E ash wa ahgahim g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga chum hems wa hegam ha wui mat ithani heki hu koi matp hems ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag k an haha wo wehmajk g Jiosh .
Jiosh at ab uhpam t-u'apa e wui heg hekaj e-alithag muhkig . Pegih , pi att hegai wo sha'i hiwigi mas wo t-shohbi mach d piongaj g Jiosh .
Am hu hebai ehp , sh ha'ijj pi ap has ahg g Jiosh hab kaijch mash pi ap ha thagio'ith . Tsh heg hekaj am ap'ech matsh g anghil wo ha hugio . Mt heg hekaj pi am hu ha oithch hab wo e junihith .

Kut pi wo e nako mat am hab wo juh hegam mo wabsh pehegichuth g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch wabsh s-u'imk g lial . Ahchim Christ pionag ach hi pi hab sha'i masma ch pi em-iattogith ch wabshaba s-ap am ahgachug ihtha wohokam mo g Jiosh ab t-mahkch .
Pi att wabsh hejel am wo t-chegitoth ahchim mach ab wabsh s-ap s-wohochuth g Jiosh ch wabshaba ep wo ha chegitoth hegam mo pi am hu i si s-amichuth mo ha'ichu s-ap'e .
Bani elith mo d tatchuij g t-kownalig Jesus mant ahni am hab wa'ap wo i him k wo em-nei .

Ntki haha wabsh ha nei g gi'ik anghil . K hema ab kehk si'alig tahgio ch hema ab huduni tahgio ch hema ab wakolim tahgio k ch hema ab juhpin tahgio . Kuki ihtham an u'ukch g gi'ik hewel mat pi an hu wo hewedath jewed thahm o an kahchki thahm . Kuki gm hu wabsh i pi hoini wehs ha'ichu .
Tash amt am hihi pi ap'ekam ch ed mam ab jioshga ihtha jewed t ab ha'ichu ch nawkko'o ch wabsh e totontochuth ch ha wehm wo'iwup hegam mo pi d em-wehm kihkam .
Kuki g mehi ab i wushke ha-chihchini amjed ch ha koktha g ha-obga . Kut hedai wo i chum s-ko'okam has ha juh k wo e koktha .
K hab kaij g Paul , “ Ni-hajuni , mant hems wo s-mahchk mokis d uhgchu pahl , nt pi hab wo sha'i chei , no pi hab chu'ig g Jiosh o'ohana : Pi g am wo sha'i pi ap has ahgath g e-ge'ejig . ”

K wabshaba am jeg ed hab chu'ig hegam mo s-uam ha'ichu hab wua ch hegam mo hab wua g hihoina ch s-totontomkam ch ha mu'akam ch hegam mo jijoshchuth g hemajkam ha'ichu ha-nahtoi ch hegam mo s-hohho'ith g ha'ichu iattogi ch ha'ichu ha iattogith .

“ K wabshaba am ha'ichu d hegai mani pi hoho'ith am em-shahgith . Am o ha'i em-wehmaj ch am hab wua hegai mat wa haschu ha mashcha g Tutuligo ihtham Balaambad ch Balakbad . Ihtham at wa ha mashcha mat wo huh hegai ha'ichu hugi mo wa ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshchutha ch ehp mat hab wo wuath g s-tohntom ha'ichu . Ith o wehs d pi ap'ekam am ni-tahgio .
Chum ach hekith ab si ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-hekaj , t-wepnag . Am amsh si i gewkahim e-wohochuthadag ed ch ba'ich i si pihk e elith ab a'ai e wui .
Ithani am hahawa s-mahch mam wa ha'ichukaj am i e wanimed mam eda ab has ha elith mam haschu i chum jijoshchuth .
Ahpim chechoj amt hab masma ab wo si ha tatchuath g e-hohonig mo g Christ ab si t-tatchua . Heg o ha'as ge'e ab si t-tatchua mat am t-wehhejed e thagito mamt wo mua .
Am g hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam wehs ha wui ch pi ab hu uhpam wo i nodagi g pi ap'ekam hegam ha wui mat ab em-wui hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam .
Pegih , mt ab wabsh wo i e sho'igch Jiosh wui . Kut heg ab haha wo si em-ha'ichuch mat hekith am wo s-ap'et .
K wabshaba chum hekith hab chu'ig mo am e chehgithahim no pi s-kehg ha'ichu hab em-junith ch ab em-mahkch g juhki ch ab bahijith g ha'ichu em-e'es mamt wo s-kokwogk ch wo si s-ap e tahtkkath . ”
U'uwi chikpantham at hab wa'ap s-ap d wo u'uwik ch pi wo chu ahgamk ch pi wo nawkko'oth ch pi wo chu iattomk .
Ab ant wa he'es i mah g tash mat gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi . K wabshaba pi hohho'ith mat wo thagito g pi ap'ekam .

Tsh am hebai i cheka . Kutsh wabsh woho'i bagat g Herod ab ha wui hegam mash am kih Tyre ch Sidon t ab . Kutsh ab wui hihi matsh wo chum ap'ech mash haschu i pi ap'e nash pi am chum huniop . Sh am hema d kownal kehsha ch nuhkuth g kihj ch hab chehgig Blastus . Kutsh heg wehpeg ab si i s-nawojima k amjed am wui hihi g Herod k ab kakke mat wabsh ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el .
D hab kaij g Jesus , “ Pi o woho mam has i kaij . Pi ani d sha'i jiawul . Ab ani si ha'ichuchuth g ni-ohg . M wabshaba ahpim wabsh pi ni-ha'ichuchuth .
D g s-gewk hewel ab i med k ab i kudu g shuhthagi .
Si atsh ge'e ab wo has t-elithath g Jiosh . Kutt hab pi wo sha'i kuint g al t-sho'igthag ia jewed thahm .
Pi ant hab ahgk am wo em-o'ohani mams pi mahch g Jiosh . Gm at hu hab i juh g em-chu'ichig . Kum s-mahch .

Tho Jiosh mat t-tho'ibia ab pi ap'ekam t amjed . Pi att has masma has wo t-juh k wo t-tho'ibia . Gd hu i si wehpeg at am i ap'ech mat wo s-t-ho'ige'el am gahi wuhshanim g e-alithag Jesus Christ matt d wo Jiosh hemajkamgak .

D am i nei g u'ugchu papal ch cheopi nuhkuththam k si s-kaitham hab wabsh ge kaij mu'ikko , “ Mu'ani ! Mu'ani ab kots t ab ! ” D g Pilate hab kaij , “ Pegih , k wo be k ahpim ab wo mua kots t ab . Ahni ant hi pi ha'ichu sha'i cheh mas melchkwua g kownal chehanig mat wo e muhkith . ”
Hegam mash d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam oki wa an o'ohan matsh an wo em-ai ihtha tho'ibiathag ha'ichu ahga ch eda an ep chum hoanahim g e-o'ohana ch an chum mamche
Mu'i at an i wuwha mo chum s-ha mashchamamk g hemajkam ch eda d wabsh s-chu i'attomkam ch d obgaj g Jiosh alithag no pi pi ha mashcham mat ia mahsi k d o'othham hab masma mach ahchim .

“ Am att cheh ihtha o'othham . Kuki wa wehsko sha'i si ha kudut g t-wehm o'othham ch am i ha chu'amun mat wo cheggia g kownal ch pi apko ha wanimed mat ab wo i hema s-wohoch mo pi d wohokam ch ab Nazareth t amjed .

Pi o wa ta machima matt has masma wo s-ap'ekamk am Jiosh tahgio . T wabshaba ith am i t-tashogi g Jiosh . K d wohokam ihtha mo an hab chu'ig ne'i ed : T-wepo at hab e juh g Jiosh alithag k an e mahsith . T g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag am wohokamch mo d s-ap'ekam . S-ta neithamam at hab e juh , chum hems g anghil ha wehhejed . S-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed o an e ahgahim nahnko mahs hemajkam ha wui . T mu'i hemajkam ab s-wohoch . Kut am uhpam ep i bei g Jiosh thahm kahchim wui . Neh , pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas wo pi wohokamch ihtha wohokam .

Tki g sha'i si ge'eged chea an wo i shul . Ihtham oki hehemako am hu i siant s-wehch ch atki ab wo i shul thahm kahchim amjed am ha thahm hegam pi ap'ekam hemajkam . Kutki ihtham ab wo si pad neneo Jiosh wui .
Sh wabshaba g Jiosh hab kaij mat heg i thahm am haha wo nahto g wechij thahm kahchim ch wechij jewed . Tsh g s-ap'ekam an hab wo wa'i e junihith anai . Neh , ith ach ab si nenida .
Tki g thahm kahchim ab wabsh i huhug hab sha masma mat g tapial wo i e holiwkath k gd hu wo e cheh . Tki wehs g thohtha'ag ch g al si'iskod jejewed am shuhthagi ch ed gm hu gawulko i e uh'ul .
Tho Jiosh hab elitha mat g alithaj wo e muhkith am t-wehhejed . Kut wa woho hab e juh k hab masma wehs gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig .
Chum ach hekith ab ho'ige'ith g Jiosh em-hekaj ch em-wehhejed t-ho'ige'ithahun .
Tki ab hema ep i wuhsh g kawyu k ge s-wegi . K ab hema cheshaj . Kumt ab mah g gewkthag mat hab wo juh g cheggiadag an jewed thahm mat g hemajkam wo a'ai e koktha . Kumt g ge'e is-pahyo ab mah .
Hegam wohochuththam mo d nenehol at ab wo si has ha elithath g e-a'amo . T heg hekaj pi hedai wo has ahgath g Jiosh ch pi wo has ahgath g t-mashchama .
ch pi ha'ichu wo ha iattogithath . Wehs at mukito ihtha hab mahs ha'ichu ab em-ab .

“ K wabshaba am ha'ichu d hegai mani pi hohho'ith am em-shahgith . Am am wabsh hiwgith hegai uwi mo e wepogith g Jezebelbad ch hab e a'aga mo d Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam . Ith o ha mashcham g ni-ihmtham mat am hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ha'ichu ab a'ai e wehm ch ep wo ko'ath hegai ha'ichu hugi mo ab e to'ith g ha-jijoshchutha .

Kekelibad Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam o heki hu s-mahch ch an o'oha mat g Jiosh am hab wo ha juh g go'ol hemajkam mat ab wo i s-wohochuth k wo i e ap'ech am tahgio . Kush hab kaij g Jiosh am wui g Abrahambad : Nt wo s-ha ho'ige'el wehs nahnko mahs hemajkam matp hedam ab wo i s-ni-wohoch hab masma mant ahpi hab m-juh .

Pi g am wo pi chegito mo ab si i em-gewkemhun g Jiosh ch hab masma ab em-wehm neok mam d a'aligaj mash wa hab kaij : Ni-a'aliga , s-gewkam ani em-shohbith heg hekaj pi ap em-chu'ichig nani pi si em-tatchua . Mt heg hekaj am wo si i oithahim k s-gewkam wo e nakogath .

Ab g wo s-ha wohog elithath g e-wanimedtham . Ihtham o chum hekith am nuhkuth g s-ap'ekam em-thothakag nat pi hemho wa am wo i ahgahi g e-chikpan am Jiosh wui . Kumt ab wo ha mah g s-ap tahhathkam ha-chikpan ed mamt ab wo ha wohog elithath . Pi at ha'ichu em-wehhejed wo s-kehgajk mamt ab wo ha mah g pi ap tahhathkam .

ch am wo i ha wahpki ith eda Canaan jewed . Sh eda g wewa'ak kawod thakam hemajkam ia kih . Tsh g Jiosh ha hugio k g ha-jewedga am a'ai i ha tahpjel g t-shohshonbad mash hab masma heki hu ahgith g Abrahambad .

Ith apt hemho wa wo i ha mashcham k hekaj wo ha mihshmath mani wa m-ahgith .Ho o wabsh chum si e hahaschuth ch d wabsh pi ha'ichu mahchim hegam mat hedai i pi heg hekaj wo ha mashcha t-kownalig Jesus Christ mashchama . Heg o d wohokam t-mashchama ch am t-tashogith g s-ap'ekam himthag . K ihtham wabsh tatchua mat wo ha ne'owinath ch wo ha kawnith . Ith o wabsh i wahmuth g hehgamthag ch bagatalig ch pi ap has ahgadag .

Kumt heg hekaj pi ab hu wo ha kaihamath hegai mat hedai wo chum s-em-mashchamam k eda pi wo ahgachugath g Jiosh alithag mashchama . Pi g am hu wo i ha wahpkith e-kihki ed k chum hems pi hab wo chei ab ha wui . “ Jiosh at wo wa em-wehmajk , ”
M o wa woho mach hebai t-sho'igchuth mach d Jesus Christ wohochuththam . K wabshaba g Jiosh ba'ich i t-gewkemhun heg hekaj mat haschu g Jesus Christ am hab t-juni .

Jiosh at s-ko'okam wo ha namkith no pi pi ab hu wohog elith . Heki o hu mash wa hema d Cain ch mua g e-wehnag . Kush eda g wehngaj d s-ap'ekam . K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam am hab wa'ap e wua . Hema ash wa d Balaam ch am ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga heg wabsh hekaj mat wo ui g lial . K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa'ap e wua . Hema ash wa d Kora ch ab wui kehk g Jiosh . K ihtham s-chu i'attomkam hab wa'ap e wua . T heg hekaj g Jiosh im hu hab wo i ha juh ab e amjed .
Sh wabshaba hegam s-chu i'attomkam nahnko ahg mo haschu i pi amichuth ch hab wua mo haschu i tatchua hab masma mo g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch hab masma e uamhun .

Noahbad atsh ab i s-wohoch g Jiosh k ab si has elith . Jiosh ash wa am ahgith mat hema hab wo juh g si ge'e wahlko natsh pi wo ha wi'in . Tsh ihtham Noahbad woho hab e juh k heg eda e tho'ibia g e-wehm kihkam wehm ch e-a'aliga ha wehm . Bat masma am mahsko wua g Jiosh g hemajkam ha-chu'ichig natsh pi hegam pi ab hu wohoch . Kush hab kaij g Jiosh mash ihtham Noahbad d s-ap'ekam nash pi ab s-wohochuth .
Neh , bash wa masma wehs apchuthas ihtham ha'ichu . Sh g papal am i wahpk wehpeg kih ch ed wehs tashkaj ch am hab wua g e-chikpan .

Neh , bash kaij g Jiosh .“ Kush wabshaba g t-shohshonbad si e sheshemachuth ch pi chechkaithag ch pi ab hu kaiham g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Jiosh ash am i ha wuwhasith g ha'ichu i tashogiththam . Kush wa g t-shohshonbad ha sho'igchuth ch ha'i ha koktha . Kum ahpim hab wa'ap chu'ig ch ab wabsh wui gegok g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Jiosh ha'ichu i tashogiththam ash am ahgachug mat wo jiwia g Jiosh si pionag k d wo si wehs s-ap'ekamk . Kut wa woho jiwia . Kumt wa gagda mat wo e muhkith .

Heki ant hu wa am em-o'ohanith k em-ahgith mamt pi ab hu wo ha nawojk hegam mo ha wehm wo'iwup mo hedai pi d ha-wehm kihkam ch hegam mo s-bahbanma ch hegam mo melchkwuhim g chehanig kch hegam mo heg ab ihm ch ab wui e ho'ige'ithahun mo pi d Jiosh ch d ha-nahtoi g hemajkam . Pi ani hegam hab ha ahg mo pi d t-wehm wohochuththam ch hab chu'ig . Ihtham o an wehsko hab chu'ig . Kumt pi has masma pi ab hu wo ha miabi .
T wabshaba g Jiosh s-ni-ho'ige'ith k am heki hu i ap'ech mant eda koi mahsi mant d wo piongajk .

Pi o wa ta amichuthama g ni-thoakag am ni-wehhejed mani wa eda wabsh hejel ab ni-hiwig . S-mahch ani mo haschu d s-ap'ekam ch wabshaba pi am hu hab junihim ch heg hab wa'i junihim mani haschu i pi hohho'ith .
Am att hig wo i t-nako matt ab ba'ich wo i mahchith g t-tho'ibiakam kownal Jesus Christ ch ba'ich wo i bei g i wehmtadag ab amjed . Heg ach ab si hehgchulith ch chum hekith ab wo si ihmath .

Ahpim am hab e elith mam d si ha'ichu s-mahchim ab amjed g Christ ch si s-gewpkthag ch ab d si has ha-elitha hegam mo pi mahch g Jiosh . K eda ihtham pi kehg has t-elith ahchim mach ahgachug g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch hab t-elith mach pi ha'ichu mahch ch pi ha gewpkthag .
Wehsijj g em-wehm wohochuththam o ab nakog ihtha hab mahs sho'igthag . Kumt heg hekaj s-wihnam wo gegokkath e-wohochuthadag ed ch ab wui wo gegokkath g Jiawul .
Ahpim mam d ha-pionag amt ab wo s-wohog ha elithath g e-a'amo woho'i e-tatchui ab heg wabsh hekaj mam ab si has elith g Jiosh ch pi heg hekaj mas am wo em-nei g em-a'amo k wo s-hohho'i g em-chikpan .
“ Hegam wehst-mahm a'ag map neith o hab d ahga mat wehst-mahm kokownal ab ep wo i wuwha . Ihtham at he'es ab wo i wehmt hegai s-ta Ehbithamakam
T wabshaba g Jiosh ab t-mah g Hekai S-ap'ekam Gewkthag mat am t-eda wo ulinig ch am wo i t-tashogithath mo haschu ab t-makiog g Jiosh .

Ab g wo kaiham mant haschu wo o'oha mamtp hedai s-e kakaischuth hab wuathch g pi ap'ekam . Bamki chum e elith mamt ge'e ha'ichu wo edgithath kekeltk . T wabshaba g em-kaisthag wabsh wo huhug . Kumt wo shoanith ch ab wo ai g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag .

“ Pi g am wo sha'i ehbithath mamtp haschu i s-ko'ok ab wo nako . Neh , mt wo em-kuh . K wabshaba d wabsh Jiawul chi'oitha ihtha . Kut am wa'i wehst-mahm tash hab wo mahsk ihtha em-kudutadag . Am amt wo hihimath e-wohochuthadag oithch am hugkam mamt hekith wo i koi . Kunt ab wo em-mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hab masma mamt g gihko wo mah hegai mat wo ha gewito .

Pi g hab masma hab e juhni mo hegam mani am ha ahg nap pi d Jiosh chikpanthamga . Ith apt eda am wo i e nako s-ap'ekam ch e-wohochuthadag ch pihk elithadag ch ha'ichu nakogadag ch hemajimatalig mapt wo wepo chu'igk mo g Jiosh .
Kuki an wehgaj hab ep chu'ig g gokko gamai gi'ik kownal thathaikud . Kuki an ha ab thadha g gokko gamai gi'ik ge'eged ch s-tohtakaj e enigadathch ch g ohla gigiko ab wahpkch .

Ab g wo mahki g ha'as sho'igthag ch pi ap tahhathkam mo wa he'es hejel ab e mahkch g ab si has e-elithadag ch kaisthag . T wo si e sho'igch hab masma mo g hejel wi'ikam uwi k eda hab e elith mo d kownal ch pi hekith wo e sho'igch .

Ahpim chechoj amt ab wo has ha elithath g e-hohonig nam pi s-mahch mo pi am hu hugkam s-gewkthag mam ahpim . Bamt masma s-ap wo e ho'ige'ithahunath g e-hohonig ha wehm . T g Jiosh ab wo em-kaihamath . Am g wo s-chegitok mam e wehm u'ukch g pi ha huhugetham thoakag no pi g Jiosh ab em-mahkch .
Ahni ani pi sha'i ha hiwgith g u'uwi mas wo ha mashcha g chechoj o am ha thahm wo e uh'ulinchith .

Pi at hab ahgk ab i em-wai g Jiosh mat gd hu wabsh wo i si em-thagsh heg hekaj e-chehanig k wabshaba hab ahgk mamt d wo a'aligajk . Pegih , mt heg hekaj ab wo si pihk e elithath ab a'ai e wui ch pi wabsh g hejel e-tatchui hab wo junihith .

T wabshaba g Jiosh gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig mat wo t-tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok t-namkithadag mat hekith wo t-lothai . Pegih , tt hemho wa hab masma hab wo t-junihith ch hab wo kaijjith mach d t-tho'ibiakam ch ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'ithath g hemajkam . Pi at ab hu wo i ha ho'ige'el g Jiosh hegam mat pi ab hu wo ha ho'ige'ithath g hemajkam .
K g t-kownalig Jesus am ap'echuthch matt has masma am hab wo junihith .

Ahchim ach wa t-sho'igchuth am i em-wehmajch mamt wo e tho'ibia . K g Jiosh am i t-gewkemhun matt hab wa'ap am wo i em-gewkemhu . Mt hab ab wo bei g gewkthag mamt s-ap wo nako hegai hab mahs sho'igthag mach ahchim nakog .
Tho Jiosh mat am i t-gewpkathch Christ himthag ed ab t-mahk g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . K heg am wohokamchuth mach d hemajkamgaj ch wehs wo bei hegai mo ab t-makiog .
Sh hab hahawa kaij hegai mo ab neok , “ Pi g hab sha'i elith mas pi ap'e hegai mo haschu g Jiosh hemu am m-chehgith mo s-ap'e . ”
Hegam kokownal mo wehmaj hab junihim g pi ap'ekam at wo si shoanith wehhejed am i neithok mamt mei .

D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui , “ Hegai mo hedai ab si ni-tatchua at wo wohog el g ha'ichu ni-ahga . Kut hahawa ab wui wo si pihk e elithath g ni-ohg . Kutt g ni-ohg wehm am haha wo i t-maskogi wui k am wo wehmajkath .

Jiosh o d wohokam . Kutt wo si s-ap t-tahtkkath ab a'ai t-wui am oithch hihimathch g wohokam . Kut heg gm hu hab wo i junihith g pi ap t-chu'ichig nat pi heg hekaj t-wehhejed muh g alithaj . Heg o wa wepo mo g alithaj eh'ed gm hu wakon g pi ap t-chu'ichig .
nach pi hahawa pi d wabsh piongaj . T ab wo i t-mah g Jiosh mat haschu i ap'ech am t-wehhejed mach d a'aligaj .

Kush wabshaba g Jiosh alithag am wehmaj wehs ha'ichu thahm . Kush g Jiosh ab wui hab kaij : Thap Jiosh . Kut pi hebai wo ha hugk g m-kownaltalig mani ab m-hiwgith . K g m-chehanig chum hekith s-ap'e .

D hab kaij g hemajkam , “ Pi ach heg hekaj s-m-ma'ichkwuimk s-ap'ekam ch wabshaba heg hekaj map pad neok . Thap wabsh o'othham ch eda hab chum a'aga g Jiosh mo d si m-ohg ch hab ab chum e wepogith g Jiosh . ”

T g kuhbthaj hegai mehi mat s-ko'okam wo ha mehi am wo wuhshanith uhgk ia'i amjed ch chum hekith . Pi o am hu ha'ichug g ulinihogig ha wehhejed hegam mat ab i shul wui g s-ta Ehbithamakam ch ab wui g wepogithaj k ab e chepos heg hekaj chehgigaj . ” Neh , bo kaij ihtha anghil .
Ab o s-t-ho'ige'ith g Jiosh ch ab t-chehani matt am wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj . Heg ach hekaj pi ha'ichukaj t-shohbithch ch heg am hab wua .
Pegih , tt ab hig wo si i t-gewpkath k hab wo chei : Jiosh o i ni-wehmaj . Kunt pi hekith ha'ichu wo sha'i ehbithath . Pi at hedai has wo ni-juh , heg hi wa mat g Jiosh wo hiwigi .
Kutt pi a'ai has wo t-eh'el heg hekaj mach haschu i ko'a nat pi g Jiosh ab i t-ui .

Tho Jiosh mo ab i t-gewkemhun matt s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo nenida g t-ap'ethag . Kuni ab tahni mat hab wo em-juh mamt am oithch hab wo e junihith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ k ch wehs e wehm ab wo ihmath g ohgaj Jiosh ch hab s-ap wo e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui .

Pi o wepo masma hegam mo d u'ugchu papal am heki hu t-chehanig ed . ( a ) Hegam o d pi ap chu'ijkam ch wehpeg ab wo ha'ichu iagchul hejel e-chu'ichig wehhejed k ab haha wo iagchul g hemajkam ha-chu'ichig wehhejed . K wabshaba g Jesus pi ha chu'ichig . ( b ) Hegam o chum hekith ab ha'ichu iagchulith Jiosh wui . T wabshaba g Jesus hemho hab juh . T heg wehs am i ap'ech g pi ap ha-chu'ichig . ( c ) Hegam o ab ha'ichu chum namkith g Jiosh . T wabshaba g Jesus hejel am i e thagito mat hekaj ab wo iagchul .
Pi o sha'i pihk e elith ab Jiosh wui hegai mat hedai ha'ichu wo s-edgithath ch pi heg hekaj ab hu wo i wehmt g e-wehnag .
Kuch wabshaba ba'ich i chum tatchua matt an wo i t-chihwiapath wehmaj , chum achs wo thagito ihtha t-chuhkug .
Pegih , ni-wepnag , pi am ia hu d si kihkam jewed thahm . Chum o hems g hejel em-tatchui cheggia g em-tho'ibiathag . Kunt wo si em-ahgi mamt pi ab hu wui wo i e thagito
Ab g wo ihmath g Jiosh ch ab wo si has ha elithath g kokownal ch s-ap ab wo ha neithath g hemajkam ch ab wo si pihk e elithath ha hekaj g e-wehm wohochuththam .
k hab e ahg mat g hajunij wo chum s-mahchk mat g Jiosh wo hekaj k wo ha tho'ibia . Sh wabshaba g hajunij pi hab masma hab elith ha'ichu .

Ha'i o hab junihim g pi ap'ekam ch eda chum ahgahim mamt hab wo junihith g chehanig ch hab wo i e ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio . Mt wo si s-e nen'oithk ab ha amjed . Bo masma pi ha'ichu amichuth mo g gogogs .

Ihtham o hab kaij mo s-mahch g Jiosh ch wabshaba hab e wua mo pi mahch no pi s-ta keke'ithama ch pi chechkaithag . K g ha-thoakag pi kehg hab mahs . K pi ab hu sha'i ha ab ulini mas hab wo juh g s-ap'ekam .
Hegam o tatchua mat am wo i e ap'ech Jiosh tahgio ch wabshaba pi ap mahch mas has masma hab wo e juh .
Heg o am i t-gewkemhun wehs t-kudutadag ed . Kuch heg hekaj t-nakog matt am epai wo i ha gewkemhunath hegam mo nahnko mahs ha'ichukaj e kudut heg wa hekaj mat haschu g Jiosh hekaj i t-gewkemhu .
Am g si i e nakog mapt d wo si s-ap piongajk g Jiosh ch si s-ap am wo ha mashchamath g Jiosh wohokam mapt pi wo sha'i si e elithath .
