Ahpim jehj amt pi wabsh wo si s-gewkam ha shohbithath g e-a'aliga mamt wabsh wo ha babgach . Tho Jiosh tatchui mamt am wo i ha mashcha ab amjed g Christ hab masma mam ha gegosith k ab wo i ha shohbi pi ap'ekam amjed .

Neh , ttp hems hebai hab wo i el mat am i ha'asa si pihk e el g Christ ab t-wui . K wabshaba ith pi woho . Ab o si pihk e elith g Christ t-wui ch ab t-mahkch g gewkthag . Kuch wehs gewitoghim g t-kudutalig .
Kutt wehsijj i shul am jewedo . “ Kunid ahni kah mad ab hema neok ni-wui g ni-ne'okikaj ch hab kaij , ‘ Saul , s-wohom ap hig chum ni-sho'igchuth ch wabshaba hejel s-ko'okam has e wua . ’

S-mahch ani mam e kudut . Tham hi wa chum sho'igkam iia ch wabshaba d s-kakais am Jiosh tahgio . S-mahch ani mo ha'i si pi ap has em-ahg g Tutuligo . Ihtham o hab e elith mo d Jiosh hemajkamga ch eda wa chum pi woho no pi d wabsh Jiawul hemajkamga .
k pi wo hohho'i g pi ap'ekam k wabshaba si s-ap wo t-tahtkk ab kahkch g s-ap'ekam
Gam g hu hab wo i juhni wehs ha'ichu mo s-bihtagi am em-chegitoi ed ch am em-thoakag ed . Ab g wabsh wo i e sho'igchuth Jiosh wui k ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj . Kut heg hekaj wo em-tho'ibia .

Heg o wa wepo mani ahni am esh g ha'ichu kai am wehpeg ahgch g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . K g Apollos am wapga g esha am ba'ich i ahgch . K wabshaba d Jiosh ch am i wuhshath g t-esha mamt ab s-wohochuth k am he'es i oi g ha'ichu ahgaj mach am ahgachug .

Tki am hahawa hema ep i oi hegai wehpeg anghil k hab kaij , “ I at gei ihtha ge'e kihhim . Wehs hemajkam o am hab wua g pi ap'ekam a'ai e wehm ith hekaj kihhim . K heg hekaj hab e a'aga Babylon . Shahag wepo mo ha nawkkoichuth . ” Neh , bo kaij hegai gokkokam anghil .
Ahpim am d ni-naipijju mamtp hab wo junihith g ni-chehanig .
Kumt pi ha'ichu ep wo jioshchuth k pi hedai ep ab hu wui wo e ho'ige'ithahunath .

Ha'i at am wabsh ep wo si i wahpkath ha-kihki ed ch wo s-ap ha iattogi g u'uwi . T hegam mo pi gewkpthag am e-wohochuthadag ed ab wo ha kaihamath no pi tatchua g pi ap'ekam ch e kudut g e-chu'ichigkaj
Am att wo ahgath g wohokam ab pihk t-elithch ha wui ch am wo i ge'ege'ehogat matt hab wo masmak mo g Christ . Heg o wa wepo mo g Christ d t-mo'o .
Ab at i t-hemakoch g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Pegih , mt wo si s-ap e tahtkkath ab a'ai e wui mamt pi gm hu a'ai wo i e ga'agwulkai .
Sh si has elith g Saul ch hab kaij , “ Thohp wud ch ab neok ? ” Kush hab kaij hegai mo ab neok , “ Thani ahni Jesus . Kup ha sho'igchuth hegam mo am oith g ni-himthag .
Ab g wo has elithath g t-kownalig Jesus Christ ch chum hekith wo e nahtokchith mamt s-ap wo ahgi mat hedai ab wo i em-kakke mam haschu wui ab e gewpkathch .
Tsh hahawa si gigiwuk g Mosesbad k si s-ehbeni mat am wo i nei . “ Sh hab ep kaij g Jiosh ab wui : Ab g has i ni-elith k wuashulig g e-kaikia shuhshk nap pi ia kehk ni-wui .
Mt am wabsh wo i wohochuthath ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahga mam ga hu i wehpeg amjed kaichug . Kut heg hekaj chum hekith am wo em-wehmajk g Jiosh g e-alithag wehm .
Nt wo si shel em-ahgi mat pi hekith wo huhug hegai mat hedai ab wo si i bei g ha'ichu ni-ahga . ”
Ni hahawa ep neith mo g si ge'e s-toa kownal thaikud am kehk . K ab thaha g Jiosh . T g jewed ch thahm kahchim heb hu wohp ab amjed k pi hekith ep sha'i e neith .

Ha'i amsh hab chech'e , “ Ha'ichu hugi o ab d wuikamaj g t-wohk ch g wohk g ha'ichu hugi ab d wuikam , ” ch hab chum ahg mo wehs s-ap'e mach haschu i tatchua am wehhejed g t-honshpadag . K wabshaba ith pi woho mamsh has chum ahg . Pi att wabsh wo huhug hab masma mat ihtham ha'ichu k heg hekaj wo si t-nuhkuth . Neh , mo g cheoj tatchua mat ab wo i miabi g uwi nat pi hab masma nahto g Jiosh . K wabshaba pi hab d ahga ihtha mas wabsh chum hedai wehm wo wo'iwua , Pi at hab ahgk t-nahto g Jiosh machs pi ap wo hekaj g t-honshpadag k wabshaba hab ahgk matt g t-kownalig Jesus wehhejed wo hekaj nat pi heg am t-wehhejed muh .
Pegih , mt wo chum kuhgi g pi ap'ekam e-thothakag ed k d wo thothakamk wehhejed g Jiosh ab i e hemakochuthk g Jesus Christ wehm .

Kuni heg amjed ab si ihm g Jiosh mat am i ap'ech hegai mo pi ap'e am em-shahgith . Jiosh o chum hekith ab t-mahkch g gewitoithag hekaj hegai mat g Christ am t-wehhejed hab juh . Ha'ichu t-ahga ab amjed g Christ o an wehsko e gantan hab sha masma mat g s-ap uhwchu wehsko wo e hewagi mat hebai wo e mehi .
Jesus o am t-ahgith mash g Jiosh d hekia tonlig .
T wabshaba wehs ab ni-wui wo i e thagito hegam mat g ni-ohg am ha eda wo i chikp . Nt pi hedai wo sha'i ohhoth mat ab wo i e thagito ni-wui .
Neh , ab am a'ai e wui si pihk e elith hab masma mam d e-hajunim ab ihmch g Jesus Christ . Pegih , pi g wo sha'i thagito ihtha .
Kut wo e nako mat wehs wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat am gahi wuhshanim ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui nat pi chum hekith d wo thoakamk ch am ha wehhejed ab wo tahnith g Jiosh mat am wo i ha wehmt .

D ab ep si s-babgam hihnk ch hab kaij , “ Mu'ani ! Mu'ani ab kots t ab ! ” D hab kaij g Pilate , “ Aha nam tatchua mant wo mua g si uhgk em-kownalig ab kots t ab ? ” D hab kaij g u'ugchu papal , “ Heg o d wa'i si uhgk t-kownalig mo ab thaha Rome t ab . ”
Neh , bash wa kaij g Jiosh . K ia'i ithani am hab wabsh i masma . Ab at ha'i s-t-ho'ige'el g Jiosh ahchim Tutuligo k ab i t-gawulkai . Kuch ab s-wohochuth .

Kokownal wehsko jewed thahm at heg hekaj hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam . T g hemajkam wehsko jewed thahm wo noda hab juhkch g s-tohntom ha'ichu hab masma mamt wo nawkk i'ok g nawait . Neh , nt am wo m-chehgi mat has masma ab wo bei g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag ihtha pi ap'ekam kihhim . ”
Ab g wo si ha tatchuath g e-wehm wohochuththam ch ab has wo ha elithath , chum as aigo pi ab hu has wo em-elithath .
Ab at t-mah g Jiosh g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . K heg am t-wanimed . Ch hab s-mahch mach d Jiosh a'aliga

Am atki hahawa ha'ichu ep i e chehgi thahm kahchim ch ed . Niki am neith matki am hema i wuhshani k e wepogith g ge'e nehbig hujud ch ge s-wegi ch ge wewa'ak mohmi ch wehst-mahm a'ag . K g gigiko an hab chuhchu'ig wehs ha ab g mohmij .
Jiosh at ab wehs mah g e-alithag g e-ho'ige'ithalig k hab wa'ap wo t-mah nach pi hab wa'ap d a'aligaj . Kutt wabshaba wehpeg ab wo nako g sho'igthag hab masma mat heg hab e juh mo d si alithaj .
Am g wehs ha ahgith mat ab wo si has i ha elithath hegam mo d kekel em-wanimedtham ch s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan , wahm hegam mo si chikpan ch hab junihim g mashchama ch mihshmetha .

Pegih , msh ha'i hi wa s-mahch mo g ha-jijoshga pi d ha'ichu am t-wehhejed ch hekaj pi has e elith ch wabsh ko'a hegai mo an e to'aw ha wehhejed . Sh ha'i g em-wehm wohochuththam pi am hu s-ap s-mahch mo pi d ha'ichu g ha-jijoshga no pi heki hu wa'i amjed ab has ha elith . Kumsh ko'a hegai mo am e to'aw . Sh ihtham am em-neith ch am em-oithch hab e junihim ch eda hekaj e kudut no pi hab elith mo pi ap'e .

Hegai i'ibhonigaj at ab wo chum bahithagt . Mt ahpim hab wa'ap s-kehg ha'ichu hab wo chum junithahith g Jiosh . E'es nuhkuththam at an wo si hikkumia hegai i'ibhonig mat pi ab hu wo bahithagt k wo i kegch hegai mat ab wo bahithagt . T hab ba'ich i mu'i ab wo bahithagt .
Si ach em-tatchuith mamt wo s-mahchk g wohokam ab ha amjed hegam mat heki hu koi . T hahawa pi wo i em-bijim g pi ap tahhathkam hab masma mat hab wo ha juh g pi wohochuththam .

Kush g Jiosh hab ha ahg g Tutuligo mat am gahi wo i huhud S-wegi Kahchki oithch . Kutsh ab i s-wohochuth k hab e juh . Kutsh am i tahp g shuhthagi . Tsh am wabsh s-gaki jewed oithk hihi . Tsh g Egypt t am shonthal am chum ha oithk heb e juh . Tsh ha ma'ish g shuhthagi k wehs ha koktha .
Kutsh eda mahsi g Mosesbad k si s-kehg d ali . Kutsh am i nuhkuth g jehjij waik mashath ab
Pegih , tt wo thagito g pi ap'ekam k g s-ap'ekam am hab wo junihith . E o aihim matt s-ap wo t-tho'ibia .
Ahpim mam d a'amo amt wo s-ap i ha nuhkuthath g e-pionag ch pi wo ha ebkiothath . Am g wo s-chegitok mam e wehm ahmo an thahm kahchim ch ed . Kut ihtha ahmo wehs t-wepo masma wo t-lothai .
Ab g wo si ha wehm s-hehgigk hegam mo s-hehgig ch ha wehm pi ap e tahtk hegam mo pi ap e tahtk .
K wabshaba mu'ijj pi ab hu kaimk g Jiosh ch pi sha'i pihk e elith hekaj . Ihtham o ba'ich i ge'e ab e mohto'ithahim hegai s-ko'ok namkithadag mat wo nam ge'e lothaita tash ch ed .

Tsh am hahawa ha'i thatha hegam mash wa am ha sho'igchuth Antiok t am ch Iconium t am k am i ha nu'ichkwua g hemajkam . Kutsh ab wui gegokiwua g Paul k ma'ichkwua k am i chewaimed k gm hu i wuhshath ab kihhim t amjed k am wua hab elithch mat muh .
D am hahawa si e kudu g Jesus k hab t-ahg , “ Pi ant ap ni-taht k wo em-ahgi mamt hema ahpim wo ni-gagda . ”

An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed mo wehs hemajkam d pi ap chu'ijkam ch pi wo sha'i e nako mas hejel wo e tho'ibia . T heg hekaj wo ha tho'ibia g Jiosh k ab wo i ha mah g pi ha huhugetham thoakag hegam mat ab wo hiwgath g alithaj .

Tki am wo i nahto g e-chikpan . Tki ab hema wo i wuhsh g s-ta ehbithamakam o'othham ge shuhthagi t amjed k e wepogithch g mischini ha'ichu thoakam ch wo ha cheggia k wo ha gewito k wo ha koktha ihtham gohk .
Thach s-wohom Christ hemajkamga mattp an wo si u'ukchith g t-wohochuthadag wehs t-thoakag oitham .

T ahchim am i t-ap'ech g Christ am tahgio g Jiosh k ab t-mah g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag . Kuch heg hekaj edgith g wechig thoakag , chum as hi wa g muhkig ab wehs ha aihog g hemajkam g pi ap ha-chu'ichigkaj .
o s-behimk g ha'ichu ha-eniga o nawkko'o o s-tohntom has e wua . Hegam mo hab masma ha'ichu hab wua at pi am hu wo i wahp Jiosh kihthag ed .
Ab g wo i s-ni-wohochuth mani eda ia wabsh kia ha'ichug k hab masma tonlig ch ed wo hihimath . ” Neh , bad kaij ch gm hu hahawa i e mehkoth ab ha amjed .
Jiosh atsh heki hu am i kei g Mosesbad ha thahm g e-hemajkamga . Kush heg s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan . Pegih , sh g Jesus hab wa'ap s-ap am hab junihim g e-chikpan am Jiosh wehhejed .

Sh hema d Joseph ch ab Cyprus jewed t ab d kihkam ch d chum papal ha wehm chikpantham nash pi ab d Levibad amjedkam . Sh ith hab ep chechcheg g Jesus chuhchai Barnabas mo hab d ahga I ha Gewkemhuntham .
Pi g sha'i ha'asa hab wo junihith g s-ap'ekam . Jiosh o am wa ap'echuthch g tash mat ab wo i em-mah g em-gehgewadag .
Chehanig o s-hasig . Kutt pi wo t-nako machs am oithk hab wo t-junihith ch am wo i t-ap'ech . Nt heg hekaj am i ni-thagito Jiosh wui mat am wo i ni-ap'ech k am hahawa d wo thoakamk wehhejed .
Kumtki ab hahawa hema ni-mah g kuintakud uhs k hab ni-ahg , “ I g wuhshani k an kuint g Jiosh cheopiga ch g iagchulithakud k wo ha kuint hegam mo am e ho'ige'ithahun Jiosh wui amai .

Ihtham oki d hegam mat pi sha'i ha hohont k si e nuhkuth mo pi ha wehm wohppo . Kut am ha wehhejed e muhkith hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch k ha tho'ibia . Kuki ihtham an oithahim mo hebai i oimmed ch d wehpegkam e tho'ibiakam .
Kuki ihtham shosh'o hab mams mo hegam kakawyu mo e hekaj am cheggiadag ch ed . Kuki g ha-mohmi hab mams mo g u'uwi ha-mohmi . K an ha-mohmi an wahpkch g ohla gigiko .

Ab at i em-wuwhas g Jiosh heki hu em-himthag amjed . Mt hab masma am hab wo e junihith mam d e tho'ibiakam ch d si piongaj g Jiosh ch wabshaba pi wo hekaj g e-ap'ethag mams am hu hab wo juh g pi ap'ekam .

Jiosh at wehs wo ha tho'ibia hegam mat ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj k am wo i e gewpkai wui . Kuch ab s-wohochuth ch heg hekaj am si t-nakog ch mu'i ha'ichu ab nakog matt wo ha ahgi hemajkam ab amjed ihtha .

Kumt ba'ich i s-ko'ok namkithadag ab wo bei mamtp pi ab hu wo ha'ichuch g Jiosh alithag . Heg at iawua g e-eh'ed k e muhkith mat gm hu hab wo i chum juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig . Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o chum si s-hemajima ab em-wui . Kumt wabshaba wo si s-nen'oithk
D hab ep kaij ab t-wui , “ Am g wabsh wo s-ap e tahtk . Am ant i em-chuhcha hab masma mat g ni-ohg am i ni-kei . Kumt hab wa'ap am wo ahgachugath g ha'ichu ahgaj . ”

Ihtham s-chu i'attomkam o chum hekith a'aga g pi e-ap'ethag ch hab wua g pi ap e-tatchui . Ge o e hahaschuth ch hab wabsh e wua mo ab ha'i si ha haha'ichuchuth mat hekaj ab aigo wo si ha haha'ichuch .

Ni ha neith matki wehs chum e e'esto g hemajkam , chum hems g kokownal ch si s-has haha'ichu ch shonthal ha-ge'ege'ejig ch s-gewpkkam ch hegam ehp mo d sho'igkam ch hegam mo d nenehol . Am atki chum e e'esto chehcho ch ed ch am hohothai wepcho

T wabshaba wo e nehnich mei kahchki ch ed g s-chu ehbithkam ch pi wohochuththam ch hegam mo loligog ch chum e u'uwichuth o chum e chechojchuth ch ha mu'adkam ch totonto ch s-chu hihoinkam ch s-chu i'attomkam ch hegam mo wabsh g o'othham nahtoi ha jijoshchuth . Hegai mei kahchki o d gokkokam muhkig . ”
Pt ha hekaj wo i e nakog k wo e pahl wako ab ihmathch g Jesus . T heg gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap m-chu'ichig . ’ Neh , bo ni-ahg .
Kuki g ha-wuhpiosha sha o'othham ha-wuhpiosha mams . Kuki g ha-tahtami hab mams mo g mawith tahtami .
Jiosh pionag at pi wo chum ha kawhainath ch wabsh wo si s-hemajimak ab wehs ha wui ch wo si s-ap ha mashchamath
Pi ani am hu ha'ichug em-wehm ch wabshaba chum hekith am em-chegito . Am amsh a'ai i e wehmt ch s-gewkam ab s-wohochuth g Jesus Christ . Kuni heg hekaj si s-ap ni-tahtk .
T g Jiosh wo em-nuhkuthath ch ab wo kaihamath g em-ho'ige'ithahuna . Mtp wabshaba hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam , t g Jiosh ab em-wui wo kehkkath .

Mt wabshaba ahpim wo e tho'ibia ab amjed g s-ko'ok e-namkithadag . Si o pihk e elith g t-kownalig Jesus Christ em-hekaj . Kumt am wehmaj ab wo e ha'ichuchuthath . Gd hu i si wehpeg at am i ap'ech g Jiosh mat g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag ab wo i em-gawulkai wehhejed . Kumt ab i s-wohoch ihtha s-kehg ha'ichu ahgaj mach wa am em-ahgith . Ith ach hekaj ab i ho'ige'ith g Jiosh .

“ Pi at hedai wo sha'i e nako mas am gawul wo e juh mat hekith wo e ai ihtha . Hegam mo d p ap'ekam at d wabsh wo pi ap'ekamk . T hegam mo d s-ap'ekam am hab wabsh wo i chu'igkath ch am hab wo wa junihith g s-ap'ekam . ”

Sh hab kaij g Peter ab ha wui , “ Hehe'ejel g gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k wo e pahl-wapko ab chehchegch g Jesus Christ . Kut gm hu hab wo i juh g Jiosh g pi ap em-chu'ichig . T amjed wo si em-wehmajkath g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag
Pi g am uhpam wo agwua mat hema s-ko'okam wo em-juh k wabshaba chum hekith am wo i e nakogath mamt s-ap ha'ichu hab wo wuath ab a'ai e wui ch ab wehs ha wui g hemajkam .
K g chechoj pi ha hohont ch e wehm hab wa'ap wua g s-ta edam ha'ichu . Kut heg hekaj wo si s-ko'okam ha namkith g Jiosh .
Pegih , ahpim g ep wo si s-ap e tahtk ni-wehm matp g Jiosh hab wa masma wo ha'ichuch g ni-chikpan .
Pegih , oi g gm hu wo s-ohhoth g pi ap e-chegitoi k ab wo i e nohnogi Jiosh wui . T heg wo s-em-ho'ige'ith k gm hu hab wo i juh g pi ap em-chu'ichig k ab wo si i wechijith g em-thothakag .
T g kihkijeg chum hekith ab wabsh wo kuhkpi'okask . Pi at hekith wo s-chuchkagath . T heg hekaj pi ab hu wo i e kuhkp g kihkijeg .

Ab amt wo i s-wohoch mant wo iawua g ni-eh'ed k wo muh em-wehhejed k hab wo edagi g pi ha huhugetham thoakag . Ith at heg wo wa wepok mamt wo huh g ni-chuhkug k wo ih g ni-eh'ed . Kunt ab wo i em-wuwhas muhkig t amjed mat hekith wo kuhgit g jewed .
D hab kaij g Jesus ab wui , “ Jiosh at ab m-mah hegai gewkthag . K heg hekaj si pi ap hab e wua ihtham Caiaphas mo m-pi'ichuth mapt pi ap wo hekaj g e-gewkthag . ”
Pi ach woho wohochuth g Jiosh mattp pi am hu hab wo junihith g tatchuij .

Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs am hu hab wo junihith g chehanig ch hekaj wo t-tho'ibia nach pi d wabsh o'othham . T wabshaba g Jiosh am i kei g e-alithag mat wo t-tho'ibia . T heg ia i wuhsh jewed thahm k hab masmakahim mach ahchim ch wabshaba pi ha chu'ichig ch gm hu hab i juh g pi ap t-chu'ichig .

Tp hab wo mahsk mamt wo e sho'igch am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam , mt wabsh wo s-ap e tahtkkath nat pi g Jiosh ab wo wa s-em-ho'ige'el heg hekaj . Pi g wo sha'i ha ehbithath hegam mat wo em-sho'igchuthath .
Kumt ahpim ha-jehj pi am wo si ha babgachuthath g e-a'aliga mat pi wo heb hu wua g e-chegitoithag .
K am si s-kaitham neok ch hab kaij : “ I at gei ihtha ge'e kihhim mo hab masma mo g chehpa'awi . Jijawul o ebkioth . Nahnko mahs s-u'amakam ch pi a'amkam u'uwhig o am kih eda .
Hegam mo hab kaij mo g Jesus pi d Jiosh alithag o wehs ha ba'ich d i s-chu i'attomkam ch d obgaj . Heg o hekaj e chehgith mo pi ab hu wohochuth g Jiosh .

Pegih , tt am wo si hejel i t-mamche machs wa woho ab ha'ichuchuth g t-kownalig Jesus k am hab haha wo juh g chemait hugi . Tsh ab wo moht g chu'ichig matp hedai pi ap hab wo wuath ihtha chemait hugi no pi pi ha'ichuchuth mat am thagito g e-hon kots wui k am iawua g e-eh'ed mat t-wehhejed muh .
K heg hekaj tasho mo pi woho wohochuth g Jiosh hegam matp hedai pi hab wo junihith g e-wohochuthadag . Am ant ha'ichu ep wo em-ahgi mant hekaj wo si tasho em-chehgi ihtha .
Jiosh at hemho wa am hab wo juh mo haschu i t-ahgith . S-mahch ach mat ab wo i em-mah g gewkthag k wo em-nuhkuth mat pi wo em-gehg g Jiawul .
k gm hu hahawa i wuhshath . T g kownal uwi alithag am chehg k ab i bei hab masma mo d madaj .
Tki am hahawa bei g mehi ab amjed g iagchulithakud heg hekaj ohla ha'a k am iawua jewed thahm . Kutki am sha'i si kop g tataniki k si s-kaithag . Kuki g wepgi an tohonnod ch g jewed si u'ugij .

Bat wa masma e padch g kihhim nat pi mu'i ha padch g hemajkam g pi ap'ekamkaj . Heg o wa wepo mat ha nawkkoich . T am wehmaj ab wo bei g s-ko'ok namkithadag . T g kokownal wehsko hab juh g pi ap'ekam ith hekaj kihhim mo g chehpa'awi wepogithas . T g s-kakais wehsko jewed thahm ba'ich i s-e kakaisch heg hekaj pi ap'ekam mo am hab e wua . ” Neh , bo kaij g anghil .
Neh , k d ihtha mad heg hekaj an ni-bei g ni-wehm o'othham am ge'e cheopi ch ed k chum alo ni-mua .
k g wohokam mashchama wo thagito k ab wo hiwgath g hoho'oki a'agitha .
Kum eda ha'ijj pi ab hu ni-wohochuth . ” Neh , bo kaij g Jesus no pi s-mahch mat hedam pi ab hu wo wohoch ch ep s-mahch mat hedai wo gagda mat wo e muhkith .
D hab kaij ab ni-wui , “ Hegai mant wehpeg ab wo bih o d hegai . ” Kud wa woho am ge bia g hithod k ab mah g Judas Iscariot .

Si g s-ap nuhkuth hegai mamt ab m-nuhkuthach . Pi g am hu ha wehmajk hegam mo wabsh pehegi e ne'owin heg hekaj mo hab chum elith mo d ha'ichu mahchig . Ith at pi wo sha'i i t-wehmajk matt ba'ich i s-ap wo s-mai g Jiosh .

Ab att wo tahnith g Jiosh mat gm hu hab wo i juh g ha-chu'ichig g t-wehm wohochuththam matp ab wo e shohbi . Kut hab wo juh mach haschu ab tahni . Pi ani em-ahgith mams wo e ho'ige'ithahu ha wehhejed hegam mat pi ab hu wo sha'i e shohbi .
Jiosh o ab ni-mahkch g ha'ichu e-ahga . Kuni ab epai em-mahk . K heg hekaj ab s-ap ni-neith ch ab s-ap neith g Jiosh hegam mat hedai ab wo s-ap em-neithath . ”

Pegih , tt ab wo si i ho'ige'el g Jiosh mat ab i t-ui ith eda kownaltalig mat pi ha'ichu wo e nako mat wo u'ugij . Ab att hig wo si ihm g Jiosh am hohho'ithaj oithch ab has elithch ch ab ep s-wohog elith .

Sh eda an ha'i ep oiopo g Tutuligo ch hab chum e wua mo im hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed g hemajkam . Kush am hema g uhgchu pahl hab chehgig Sceva ch wewa'ak a'alithag . Sh ihtham hab wa'ap chum im hu hab i ha wua g jijawul ab ha amjed g hemajkam . Am hu hebai , sh ihtham am hema neith g o'othham mash g jiawul an u'ukch ch hab kaij , “ Ab g i thagito ihtha o'othham , ahpi jiawul . Bani si m-ahgith heg gewkthagkaj Jesus mo g Paul ab amjed ha mihshmath . ”
Tsh wabshaba g Paul g Silas am epai bek mat wo oi . Kumtsh am e ho'ige'ithahun k am i ha thagito Jiosh hemajimatalig ed .
Kumt heg hekaj wo s-e nen'oithk mamt pi gm hu hab wo i e juh ab amjed g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga k wabshaba wehs wo bei mo haschu ab em-makiog g Jiosh .

Ab oki mahks g ap'ethag mat wo kuh g thahm kahchim . T pi wo ha juhkath heg oitham mat am wo ahgath g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Ab oki ep mahks g ap'ethag mat wo eh'edch g shohshonkam shuhthagi k an wo i wuhshath g nahnko mahs si sho'igthag ch mumkithag ia jewed thahm .
Pi o sha'i ap'e g m-chegitoi am Jiosh tahgio . K heg hekaj pi ab hu d sha'i m-wuikam ihtha chikpan .
Hegam o d wa'i m-hemajkamga mat ab wo ni-hiw mant wo ha tho'ibia . T g ni-gewkthag ab wo e chehgi ha ab .
Wehsijj at i e mehkoth ab amjed g Jiosh k am hab junihim g pi ap'ekam . Pi o hedai hab sha'i wua g s-ap'ekam . Pi hedai .
Pi amt wo s-chu tha'ath ch pi wo chum ge e ha'ichuchuthath . Ab amt wabsh wo i e sho'igchuthch ab a'ai e wui ch pi wa'i si hejel am wo e chegitoth .
K am ha shahgith hema kehk ch hab mahs mo g Jiosh si Kehsha . K g lihwaj gd hu si ais g tahtdaj . K g ohla giwud an hab juhkch e bahsho .
K pi an hu ha'ichug hegai mo pi hohho'ithachuth g Jiosh . Am at wo ha'ichugk g Jiosh kownal thaikud . Kut an wo thakath hegai mo kahwalkaj ab e chehgithch . T g piongaj ab wo si has elithath
E o aihim mat wo huhug g jewed . Kumt wo si e nuhkuth ch wo si s-e tahtkkath ch hab s-ap wo e ho'ige'ithahunath .
Tsh am i e nahto g ha-chikpan . Kutsh am gahi i shul ge shuhthagi ch ed an ge'e wahlko ch ed k gm hu thatha hegai Antiok t am mamtsh am i ha thagito Jiosh hemajimatalig ed .
K wabshaba pi d pi ap'ekam mamtp an wo bei g wehm kihkam . Hi wa g hohnta at ab ba'ich wo i wuhshath g ha'ichu pi ap'ethag . Kuni heg hi wa chum pi hab elith mams ab hu wo nam .
Pi ach g hemajkam ha cheggia ch wabshaba hegam ha cheggia mo d si pi ap'ekam gewpkthag in t-thahm ch ha-kokownalig ch ha-haha'ichuga ch g jijawul .
Ha'ijj amtp hems ha'ichu pi amichuth . Kuni am em-ahgith mamt ab wo tai g Jiosh g amichuthadag . T ab wo i em-mah . Jiosh o si s-ba'ama ab ha mamka g hemajkam mo haschu i tatchua ch pi ha keh'ith .
Pi g am hu wo shohbith g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag .

Ith ash wa an e eda kuhpi . K hegai wehpeg kih hab e a'aga ‘ Hekia S-ap'ekam Kih . ’ Sh ith eda am ha'ichug g lalampa chuhchakud ch mihsa . Sh heg ab mihsa g papal am tho'aw g pahn ch hekaj ab si has elith g Jiosh .
Ab g wo i e thagito ni-wui k hab masma wo edagi g s-wohom kaisthag ch s-kehg wehschuga ch kulani am wehhejed g em-wuhpui . Kumt hahawa pi wo sho'igk ch pi wo s-thathpk ch wo s-neneak .
Ith ant am em-o'ohani ahpim mam ab ihm g Jiosh alithag mamt hekaj wo s-mahchk mam edgith ihtha wechij thoakag .
Hegai mat wo ah g hejel e-mahchig at wabsh wo chum si e haschuth k atp hems d s-chu iattomkam . Nt wabshaba ahni ab ha'ichuchuth g Jiosh ch am ahg g wohokam .

Thach wabsh chum hemajkam . K eda g Jiosh ab t-mahkch g e-gewkthag . T hab wo s-e mahchk mo d wa Jiosh gewkthag ch am t-eda . Kuch heg hekaj hab sha masma mo g bith haha'a mat hema g lai am ha eda wo to'akchith g s-e-kaisthag .
Pi g am wo hejel e agwuan . Jiosh at am hab wo wa em-juni . Neh , bo chu'ig an o'ohanaj ed g Jiosh : Ahni o ab ni-ab mant em-wehhejed hab wo juh g agwuithag .
D hab kaij g Jesus , “ Nt wabsh wo pehegi neokath mantp ab hejel wo chum si ni-haschuthath . Heg o ab si has ni-elith ni-ohg mam e-Jioshga ahg .

Tho Jiosh tho'ibiakam g t-wehm wohochuththam . Pegih , pi g ha'ichu hab wo juhni mas hekaj wo heki hihi . Wehs ha'ichu hugi o hiwgithas . K wabshaba pi ap'e machs wo ko'ath matt haschukaj wo ha heki hihimch g t-wehm wohochuththam .

S-e ad hohtkith nad pi hudunihim . D ba'ich tash d t-mihshmetha tash . K eda an mia cheotas hothai ch ed mamt am hab juh g hiha'ini k wabshaba koi sha'i hekaj . K an wehgaj eshas g u'us . Kumd am i bei g honshpadag k am i hobino g s-kehg ikuskaj heg wehnathk s-ap uhw ha'ichu mach hab masma hab ha wua g ko'i k am cheh heg eda hiha'ini k gm hu hihi .

Ab am ha wehm nakog g sho'igthag hegam mat e kuhpach . Ab am wa wabsh s-ap e tahtk mat wa chum wehs em-wohppo'i g ha'ichu em-eniga heg hekaj mam s-mahch mo ba'ich d i si ha'ichu hegai mamt ab bei mat ith pi hekith wo ha huhug .
“ Sh hab ep kaij g Jiosh matsh am hema wo i kei g Davidbad amjedkam matsh d wo t-tho'ibiakamk . Kut wa woho hab e juh g Jiosh . K g Kehshaj hab chehgig Jesus .
An o hab chu'ig Jiosh o'ohana ed : Pi o hedai sha'i neith o kah o chegito mat he'es i s-kehg ha'ichu am i ap'ech g Jiosh am ha wehhejed hegam mo ab si tatchua .
Kut am uhpam ep wo t-chegitoich g Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag hab masma mat hab juh g Christ .
Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag o am t-tashogith mach d a'aligaj g Jiosh .

Pi amt wo e nako mamt wo iattogi g Jiosh . Hejel am e iattogith mamtp hab elith mat pi wo em-namkith g Jiosh heg hekaj mam haschu hab i junihim . Nat hig pi wo ui g eshtham hegai hab mahs kai mat haschu wo ei ? Pegih , k hab wa masma am t-thoakag wehhejed .

Jiosh at wo si s-hemajimak ab em-wui mamtp ab wo s-wohochuthath ch wabshaba ab em-wui wo kekiwua mamtp ab uhpam wo i e nohnogi pi ap'ekam wui . Pegih , ab g wo i oithahim ihtha k an wo u'ukchith g Jiosh hemajimatalig .
Pegih neh , ahpim ni-wehm wohochuththam , am g wabsh wo s-e tahtk ch nenida mat ep wo jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus Christ . Am g wo neith mo has masma nenida g eshtham g juhki mat wo i wuhsh g eshaj .

K wabshaba g Onesiphorus pi has e elith mani d lihso ch an i ni-gahghi ia jiwiak Rome kihhim t am am hugkam mat ni-cheh k mu'ikko ia i ni-chehgimed k ab ni-mamka g s-ap tahhathkam . Kuni ab tahni g Jiosh mat ba'ich ab wo i s-ha ho'ige'el hegam Onesiphorus .
ch hab masma pi wo si e el mat hekith ep wo jiwia .

Pi o wepo chu'ig g o'othham tatchui ch Jiosh tatchui . Kumt ab wo e thagitokchith Hekia S-ap'ekam Gewkthag wui . T heg ab wo em-shohbithath ch wo i em-wanimedath . Mt hab pi hab wo junihith g hejel pi ap e-tatchui .

Neh , hema hab che'ithag o hab chu'ig . “ Ia at jiwia g t-kownalig Jesus jewed thahm mat wo ha tho'ibia g pi ap chu'ijkam . ” K ith d si wohokam nat pi ab si s-ni-ho'ige'el . Ni eda shahag wepo mani wa wehs ha ba'iwechkim d si pi ap chu'ijkam mani wa cheggia g t-tho'ibiakam Jesus ha sho'igchuthch hegam mo ab s-wohochuth . T heg ab wabsh ni-bahbgi mat wehs am wo ha chehgi g hemajkam mat ab wabsh wo ha bahbgi . Tp hems hab wa'ap ab wo i s-wohochuth k ab wo bei g pi ha huhugetham thoakag .
Hemako ha'ichu ant hab ep wo chei . Ab g wo i e gewpkathch Jesus t ab no pi heg ab em-mahkch g ge'e gewkthag .
Ha'ijj amsh hab e elith mam s-gewpkthag am e-wohochuthadag ed . Mt wabshaba wo si s-e nen'oithk mamt pi wo i e jushathkath k pi wo i gei am pi ap'ekam ch ed no pi wehsijj t-a'appem g Jiawul .
Pegih , t hemho am e iagchul t-wehhejed k hekaj i ha ap'ech ia'i amjed wehs hegam mat gm hu oa g pi ap'ekam ha-ihbthag ed .
D g hemajkam am ep u'ihi g hohothai mat wo ma'ichkwua .
Mt wabshaba wo chum s-mahchk mo g cheoj am thahm g uwi . K g Christ am thahm g cheoj . K g Jiosh am wehs ha'ichu thahm .
Ha'ijj amsh wa s-ko'okam has ha ahg ch ha gewittan k ha'i ha wupulsh k gd hu si ha kuh .

Jesus atsh am heki hu i wah thahm kahchim ch ed . Kuch heg hekaj s-mahch mat am wo i t-wahpki ahchim mach ab s-wohochuth . Jiosh atsh am i kei matsh d wo uhgchu t-pahligk chum hekith . Pi ash heg hekaj d pahl mas d papal ha amjedkam . Jiosh atsh am i kei hab masma matsh wa heki hu am i kei hegai mash hab chehgig Melkisedek .

Pi amt am hu wo ha wehmajk hegam mo hab junihim g pi ap'ekam . That wo s-ta edam ha'ichuk mamt chum hems heg ab wo neneokath mo haschu s-a'agi hab wua ihtham . Kumt wabshaba wo ha ahgi mo pi ap hab e junihim .

Pi g am wo a'ai has e ahgath , ahpim ni-wehm wohochuththam . Hegam mat hab wo e junihith o ab wui gegok hegai chehanig mo hab chu'ig matt ab a'ai wo si pihk t-elithath . Heg o wa wepo mo hudawk mas s-ap'e g Jiosh chehanig . K eda hab chum mahs matt hab wabsh wo junihith .

K g gamai gohk kihkijeg d hegai hothai mo hab e a'aga pearl . Wehsijj hegam kihkijeg o hab junis ab hehemako pearl amjed . K g kahya am kihhim ch ed d wabsh ohla ch am wabsh gai tonod hab masma mo g mi-lihtha .

Kush eda g Jesus d Jiosh alithag ch d si kehshaj matsh wehs am wo ha thahmkath g hemajkamgaj . Kuch ahchim d hemajkamgaj mattp pi wo thagito g t-wohochuthadag k wabsh s-ap t-tahtkk ch wo nenida mat hab wo t-juni mo has i kaij .

Pi g hab wabsh wo s-e junimk mam ab pihk e elith hedai i ha wui ch wabshaba si s-wohom ab si pihk e elith ab ha wui . Pi g hab wo junihith g pi ap'ekam ab hedai i wui ch wabshaba g s-ap'ekam hab wo wa'i junihith ab ha wui .

Tki am wa'i hekaj am si s-gewkam wo u'ugij g jewed . Kutki g hemako tahpani mo wehst-mahm e tahpanch ( 1/10 ) g kihhim wo i gei . Kutki wewa'ak mihl ( 7000 ) hemajkam wo e ko'ij heg eda jewed u'ugij . Kutki hegam ha'i matki am wo wih wo sha'i si s-ehbeni k ab wo si has el g gewkthaj g Jiosh .
Kush hema g o'othham am ha wehhejed neok g Jiosh ch hemajkam matsh eda am i ap'ech hegai chehanig . Sh wa eda g Jiosh si hejel am ahgith g Abrahambad g ha'ichu e-ah'atha .
D hab ep kaij g Pilate ab wui , “ Aha , napt pi has wo chei ab ni-wui k eda s-mahch mani gewkthag mant wo m-thagito o ab wo m-mua kots t ab ! ”

Kush eda ith an ne'okchulith mo hab chu'ig an Jiosh o'ohana ed : T am hema wo i wuhsh g o'othham mat wo e wepogi g kahwal . Neh , pi at wo shosha g kahwal mamt hekith wo sho'igchuth k wo mua . Pegih , t hab wa masma pi has wo sha'i chei ihtha o'othham

Kush g t-shohshonbad ab si tahni g Jiosh matsh am hema wo i kei mat d wo ha-kownaligk . Tsh g Jiosh am i kei hegai Saul mash d Kishbad alithag ch ab d Benjaminbad amjedkam . Kush heg d ha-kownalig gi'ikko wehst-mahm ahith ab .

Heki at hu mu'i i wuwha hegam mo chum s-keshwuimk g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga ch ha iattogith g hemajkam ch heg hekaj ab ha wanchkwup mat wo ui g lial , wahm hegam mo d ni-wepo Tutuligo o'othham . Kumt heg hekaj wehs e wehm am wo i ha shohbi .
Sh ith eda am ha'ichug g nahnko mahs ha'ichu thoakam ch wahammad ch u'uwhig .
M-gewkthag o d ep ni-gewkthag nach pi d hemako . Kuni ab ha mahkch g t-gewkthag mat t-wehm d wo hemakok .
Ab ani m-mashcham mo has chu'ig g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . Kupt heg wo wa'i ahgahith nap pi heg s-wohochuth ch ab si tatchua g Christ ch d hemako heg wehm .

K eda d t-himthag ahchim Tutuligo mach mu'i ha'ichu has masma wapkon . D g hohothai haha'a chuhthp am thadha mamt ab wo chum wa'ig k am hab wo junihith g t-himthag . D ihtham haha'a hemako am hu i waikko wehst-mahm walohn shuhthagi am wo e toa .
Ha'ijj amki pi mahch g Jiosh . K ith d si em-edathag . Am g wabsh wo thagito g pi ap e-chegitoi k s-ap ha'ichu wo chegito .
Pi g am wo chum si e ha'ichuchuthath ch wabshaba wo s-hehemajimak ch chum hekith ab wo s-e bahbgik ch ab a'ai wo e tatchuath . Am g wo e chehgithath mam ab a'ai e tatchua .
k am wo i ha ahgi g Jiosh ha'ichu ahga . T hab wo e tho'ibia ab i s-wohochuthk . Kumt wabshaba wo s-e nen'oithk mo haschu pi ap hab wua mamt ahpim hab wa'ap pi heg hekaj wo e uamhu .
Ab at i t-wai g Jiosh matt d wo hemajkamgajk . Kuch ab wui si pihk t-elith . K g Jiosh heg hekaj wehs ha'ichu am i ap'echuth mat t-wehhejed wo s-ap i wuhsh ha'ichu .

Kumsh eda ahpim ab si s-wohog elith g s-kehg ha'ichu ahga ab amjed g Christ . Kuni heg hekaj ab si s-hehgig em-hekaj ch am s-em-ahgithamk mamt wo s-ap s-mahchk g s-ap'ekam ch pi wo mahchk g pi ap'ekam .

Ith ash eda am ha'ichug g ohla iagchulithakud . Kush ith ab g papal an memheith g s-ap uhw ha'ichu . Kush am ep ha'ichug hegai uhs washa mash d chehgitha mach d chum Jiosh hemajkamga ahchim Tutuligo . Ith ash wehsko e ma'ishch g ohlakaj . Am ash ith eda e thahshch g ohla ha'a . Sh ith eda ha'i nuhkuth hegai ha'ichu hugi mash hab e a'aga ‘ manna . ’ Kush am e chekch hegai Aaronbad usaga mash wa ab i i'iwgi . Kush wa am ep e to'akch hegai gohk ko'okmalk hohothai mo an ab o'ohanas g Jiosh chehanig .

Neh , k pi ha'ichu d sha'i hegai machs hekaj wo chum si t-haschuthath . Pi att wo sha'i t-nako machs wo i t-ap'ech am Jiosh tahgio am hab junihithch g s-ap'ekam . Jiosh at am wo i t-ap'ech e wui matt hekith ab wo i s-wohoch g ha'ichu ahgaj .
Ahni kch ni-ohg ach d hemako . Kupki pi koi ab hu s-wohochuth ihtha . ” D hab ep kaij ab wehs t-wui , “ Ni-ohg o ab ni-ahgith mant has wo che'e k has wo ni-juh .
T wehsijj hegam mat ab i e hemapai ab i ha wehmt k ab ha wui gegokiwua g Paul ch Silas . T g haha'ichu gm hu wuashul g ha-wehschuga k am ha'i ha chehani mat wo ha gewitta .
“ Hemu ant ab wo em-mah g wechij chehanig . K d ihtha mamt ab a'ai wo si pihk e elithath hab masma mani ahni hab em-juhkch .

Ihtha t-chuhkug o heg wa wepo mo d wabsh uhksha nat pi wabsh wo e padch . Kutt wabshaba wo edgithath g ba'ich i s-kehg honshpadag an thahm kahchim ch ed . T ith g Jiosh hab wo t-juni . Kut hab wo masmak mo g si s-kehg kih ch pi hekith wo e padch .
Jesus ad am ep ha jehnigith ch si s-kaitham hab kaij , “ Matp hedai ab wo i s-ni-wohochuth k hab wa'ap s-wohochuth g ni-ohg Jiosh .
Sh hab kaij g Ananias , “ Ni-kownalig , ihtha o'othham atsh mu'i ha sho'igch g m-hemajkamga am Jerusalem ch ed . Mu'ijj o hab ni-ahgith ab amjed .

Hemajkam at wo s-chu tha'ath ch wo si pihk e elithath g lialkaj ch wo chum si e hahaschuthath . Mu'i hemajkam at wo a'ai s-ko'okam has e ahgath ch pi ab hu uhpam wo i nodgithath g s-ap'ekam . Mu'i at wo has ahgath g Jiosh . T g a'al pi ab hu wo wohog ha elithath g e-ge'egedga .
Kuch hab s-mahch mat hahawa pi heg hekaj ab hu wo t-namkith .
Ab ach s-wohochuth g t-kownalig Jesus ch hekaj chum s-mahch mo wehs g ha'ichu hugi hiwgithas matt wo huh . Tp wabshaba hema hab wo elithath mo pi hiwgithas , pegih , k pi ap'e mas an wo bei .

Thapt wo s-ap'ekam piongajk g Jesus Christ maptp am wo i ha ahgi g t-wehm wohochuththam ihtha ha'ichu mashchama . Kupt an wabsh s-ap wo u'ukchith g e-wohochuthadag ch wehs ha'ichu mashchama ab amjed map hab hi wa masma hab e wua .
